   Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā	PaQcaviMSati sAhasrikA PrajQApAramitA
   evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūte	evam mayA Srutam ekasmin samaye BagavAn rAjagRhe viharati sma gRDra kUte
   parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair bhikṣusahasraiḥ sarvair	parvate mahatA Bikzu saMGena sArDam paQca mAtrEH Bikzu sahasrEH sarvEH 
   arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niḥkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ	arhadBiH kzINa AsravEH niHkleSEH vaSIBUtEH su vimukta cittEH
   suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair	su vimukta prajQEH AjAneyEH mahA nAgEH kRtakRtyEH kRta karaNIyEH 
   apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ	apahRta BArEH anuprApta svaka arTEH parikzINa Bava saMyojanEH
   samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramitāprāptaiḥ	samyak AjQA su vimukta cittEH sarva cetaH vaSi parama pAramitA prAptEH
   pañcamātrair bhikṣunīśatair upāsakair upāsikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ sarvair	paQca mAtrEH BikzunI SatEH upAsakEH upAsikABiH ca sArDam sarvEH 
   dṛṣṭadharmair aparimāṇaiś ca bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ	dRzwa DarmEH aparimANEH ca boDisattva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrEH sArDam
   sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ śūnyatāvihāribhir ānimittagocaraiḥ	sarvEH DAraNI pratilabDEH SUnyatA vihAriBiH Animitta gocarEH
   praṇidhānākalpitaiḥ kṣāntisamatāpratilabdhair asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhair	praNiDAna akalpitEH kzAnti samatA pratilabDEH asaFga DAraNI pratilabDEH 
   acyutābhijñair ādeyavacanair akūhakair alapakair apagatajñātralābhacittair	acyuta aBijQEH Adeya vacanEH akUhakEH alapakEH apagata jQAtra lABa cittEH 
   nirāmiṣadharmadeśakair gambhīradharmakṣāntipāraṅgatair vaiśāradyaprāptair	nirAmiza Darma deSakEH gamBIra Darma kzAnti pAraFgatEH vESAradya prAptEH 
   mārakarmasamatikrāntaiḥ karmāvaraṇapratiprasrabdhair	mAra karma samatikrAntEH karma AvaraNa pratiprasrabDEH 
   dharmapravicayavibhaktinirdeśakuśalair	Darma pravicaya viBakti nirdeSa kuSalEH 
   asaṃkhyeyakalpapraṇidhānasusamārabdhaiḥ smitamukhaiḥ pūrvālāpibhir	asaMKyeya kalpa praNiDAna su samArabDEH smita muKEH pUrva AlApiBiH 
   vigatabhṛkuṭīmukhair gāthābhir gītālapanakuśalair apagatalīnacittair	vigata BRkuwI muKEH gATABiH gIta Alapana kuSalEH apagata lIna cittEH 
   anācchedyapratibhānair anantaparṣadabhibhavanavaiśāradyasamanvāgatair	anAcCedya pratiBAnEH ananta parzad aBiBavana vESAradya samanvAgatEH 
   anantakalpakoṭīniḥsaraṇakuśalair	ananta kalpa kowI niHsaraNa kuSalEH 
   māyāmarīcidakacandrasvapnapratiśrutkāpratibhāsapratibimbanirmāṇopamadharmādhimuktaiḥ	mAyA marIci daka candra svapna pratiSrutka apratiBAsa pratibimba nirmANa upama Darma aDimuktEH
   sattvagaticaritasūkṣmanānādhimuktyavatārakuśalair apratihatacittair	sattva gati carita sUkzma nAnA aDimukti avatAra kuSalEH apratihata cittEH 
   adhimātrakṣāntisamanvāgatair yāthātmyāvatāraṇakuśalaiḥ	aDimAtra kzAnti samanvAgatEH yATAtmya avatAraNa kuSalEH
   sarvabuddhakṣetrānantavyūhapraṇidhānaprasthānaparigṛhītair	sarva budDa kzetra ananta vyUha praNiDAna prasTAna parigRhItEH 
   asaṃkhyeyalokadhātubuddhānusmṛtisamāhitasatatasamitābhimukhībhūtair	asaMKyeya loka DAtu budDa anusmRti samAhita satata samita aBimuKIBUtEH 
   aparimitabuddhādhyeṣaṇakuśalair	aparimita budDa aDyezaNa kuSalEH 
   nānādṛṣṭyanuśayaparyavasthānakleśapraśamanakuśalaiḥ	nAnA dRzwi anuSaya paryavasTAna kleSa praSamana kuSalEH
   samādhivikrīḍitaśatasahasranirhārakuśalaiḥ. tadyathā bhadrapālena ca	samADi vikrIxita Sata sahasra nirhAra kuSalEH. tat yaTA BadrapAlena ca
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ratnākareṇa ca sārthavāhena ca naradattena ca	boDisattvena mahAsattvena ratna AkareNa ca sArTavAhena ca naradattena ca
   varuṇadattena ca śubhaguptena ca (PvsP1 1: 2) indradattena ca uttaramatinā	varuNa dattena ca SuBaguptena ca (Pu sP1 1: 2) indradattena ca uttara matinA
   ca viśeṣamatinā ca vardhamānamatinā ca amoghadarśinā ca susaṃprasthitena	ca viSeza matinA ca varDamAna matinA ca amoGa darSinA ca su saMprasTitena
   ca suvikrāntavikrāmiṇā ca nityodyuktena ca anikṣiptadhūreṇa ca	ca su vikrAnta vikrAmiNA ca nitya udyuktena ca anikzipta DUreNa ca
   sūryagarbheṇa ca anupamacintinā ca avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena	sUrya garBeNa ca anupama cintinA ca avalokita ISvareNa ca mahA sTAma prAptena
   ca mañjuśriyā ca vajramatinā ca ratnamudrāhastena ca nityotkṣiptahastena	ca maQjuSriyA ca vajramatinA ca ratnamudrA hastena ca nitya utkzipta hastena
   ca maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena, evaṃ pramukhair anekair	ca mEtreyeNa ca boDisattvena mahAsattvena, evam pramuKEH anekEH 
   bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdham.	boDisattva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrEH sArDam.
   atha khalu bhagavān svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkaṃ	aTa Kalu BagavAn svayam eva siMhAsanam prajQapya nyazIdat paryaFkam
   baddhvā ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya abhimukhīṃ smṛtim upasthāpya samādhirājaṃ nāma	badDvA Rju kAyam praNiDAya aBimuKIm smRtim upasTApya samADi rAjam nAma
   samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma, yatra sarvasamādhayo 'ntargamān saṃgrahaṃ	samADim samApadyate sma, yatra sarva samADayaH antargamAn saMgraham
   samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti.	samavasaraNam gacCanti.
   atha khalu bhagavān smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃs tasmāt samādher vyutthāya	aTa Kalu BagavAn smRtimAn saMprajAnan tasmAt samADeH vyutTAya
   divyena cakṣuṣā sarvalokadhātuṃ vyavalokya sarvakāyāt smitam akarot,	divyena cakzuzA sarva loka DAtum vyavalokya sarva kAyAt smitam akarot,
   tasyādhastāt pādatalayoḥ sahasrābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ	tasya aDastAt pAda talayoH sahasrAByAm cakrAByAm
   ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ, daśabhyaḥ pādāṅgulibhyaḥ	zazwi zazwI raSmi kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi niSceruH, daSaByaH pAda aFguliByaH
   ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ, evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir	zazwi zazwI raSmi kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi niSceruH, evam zazwi zazwiH 
   gulphābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jaṅghābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jānumaṇḍalābhyām, evaṃ	gulPAByAm zazwizazwiH jaFGAByAm zazwizazwiH jAnu maNxalAByAm, evam
   dvābhyām ūrubhyāṃ kaṭinābhimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pārśvābhyāṃ	dvAByAm UruByAm kawinA aBimaNxalAByAm dvAByAm pArSvAByAm
   hṛdayaśrīvatsān mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāt, evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir daśabhyo	hRdaya SrIvatsAn mahApuruza lakzaNa at, evam zazwizazwiH daSaByaH 
   hastāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyām	hasta aFguliByaH zazwizazwiH dvAByAm bAhuByAm zazwizazwiH dvAByAm
   aṃśābhyām, evaṃ grīvāyāś catvāriṃśadbhyo dantebhyo dvābhyāṃ ghrāṇābhyāṃ	aMSAByAm, evam grIvAyAH catvAriMSadByaH danteByaH dvAByAm GrANAByAm
   dvābhyāṃ śrotrābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ cakṣurbhyāṃ madhyād ūrṇāyā upariṣṭād uṣṇīṣāt	dvAByAm SrotrAByAm dvAByAm cakzurByAm maDyAt UrNAyAH uparizwAt uzNIzAt 
   ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ. yai raśmibhir ayaṃ	zazwi zazwI raSmi kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi niSceruH. yEH raSmiBiH ayam
   trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsito 'bhūt parisphuṭaḥ, pūrvasyāṃ	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasraH lokaDAtuH avaBAsitaH aBUt parisPuwaH, pUrvasyAm
   diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā	diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena mahatA raSmi avaBAsena sPuwA
   avabhāsitāś cābhūvan, evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām	avaBAsitAH ca aBUvan, evam dakziNasyAm diSi paScimAyAm uttarasyAm
   uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām	uttara pUrvasyAm pUrva dakziNasyAm dakziNa paScimAyAm paScima uttarasyAm
   adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā	aDastAt uparizwAt diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena mahatA
   raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan, ye ca sattvās tena mahatā	raSmi avaBAsena sPuwAH avaBAsitAH ca aBUvan, ye ca sattvAH tena mahatA
   raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitās te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ	raSmi avaBAsena sPuwAH avaBAsitAH te sarve niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau.	samyaksaMboDO.
   (PvsP1 1: 3)	(Pu sP1 1: 3)
   atha khalu bhagavān punar eva sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ smitam akarot, ekaikataś	aTa Kalu BagavAn punar eva sarva romakUpeByaH smitam akarot, ekEkatas 
   ca romakūpāt ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ, yair ayaṃ	ca romakUpAt zazwi zazwI raSmi kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi niSceruH, yEH ayam
   trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsitaḥ sphuṭo 'bhūt, taiś ca	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasraH lokaDAtuH avaBAsitaH sPuwaH aBUt, tEH ca
   pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamāḥ sarvalokadhātavo 'vabhāsenāvabhāsitāḥ	pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamAH sarva loka DAtavaH avaBAsena avaBAsitAH
   sphuṭāś cābhūvan, evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ	sPuwAH ca aBUvan, evam dakziNasyAm paScimAyAm uttarasyAm uttara pUrvasyAm
   pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād	pUrva dakziNasyAm dakziNa paScimAyAm paScima uttarasyAm aDastAt uparizwAt 
   diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavo 'vabhāsenāvabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāś	diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamAH lokaDAtavaH avaBAsena avaBAsitAH sPuwAH 
   cābhūvan, tena ca raśmyavabhāsenaye sattvāḥ spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā	ca aBUvan, tena ca raSmi avaBAsenaye sattvAH spRzwAH te sarve niyatA
   abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.	aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO.
   atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yā sā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prakṛtiprabhā	aTa Kalu BagavAn punar eva yA sA budDAnAm BagavatAm prakRti praBA
   tayā prabhayā trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsayāmāsa, yāvat	tayA praBayA tri sAhasra mahA sAhasram lokaDAtum avaBAsayAmAsa, yAvat 
   sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tayā	sarvAsu daSasu dikzu ekEkasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tayA
   prabhayā avabhāsitā abhūvan, ye ca sattvās tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭās te sarve	praBayA avaBAsitAH aBUvan, ye ca sattvAH tayA praBayA spRzwAH te sarve
   niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.	niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO.
   atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayāmāsa, yenemaṃ	aTa Kalu BagavAn tasyAm velAyAm jihvA indriyam nirNAmayAmAsa, yena imam
   trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇācchādayāmāsa,	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasram lokaDAtum jihvA indriyeNa AcCAdayAmAsa,
   trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇa sphuritvā tasmāj	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasram lokaDAtum jihvA indriyeNa sPuritvA tasmAt 
   jihvendriyāt smitam akarot, yato 'nekāni raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi	jihvA indriyAt smitam akarot, yatas anekAni raSmi kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi
   niśceruḥ, raśmimukhe caikaikasminn uttamamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni	niSceruH, raSmimuKe ca ekEkasmin uttama mayAni suvarNa nirBAsAni
   sahasrapatrāṇi padmāny utpannāny abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā	sahasra patrANi padmAni utpannAni aBUvan, tezu ca padmezu budDa vigrahA
   niṣaṇṇāḥ saṃsthitāś cābhūvan dharmaṃ deśayanto yad uta imām eva	nizaNNAH saMsTitAH ca aBUvan Darmam deSayantaH yat uta imAm eva
   ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām, te pūrvasyāṃ diśi	zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSa nAm, te pUrvasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadībālukopamavyativṛttāsaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ	gaFgA nadI bAlu kopama vyativRtta asaMKyezu lokaDAtuzu gatvA sattvAnAm Darmam
   deśayanti sma, evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ	deSayanti sma, evam dakziNasyAm paScimAyAm uttarasyAm aDastAt UrDvam
   digvidikṣu, ekaikasyāṃ ca diśi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu	diS vidikzu, ekEkasyAm ca diSi daSasu dikzu gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu
   aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma, yad uta	aparimANezu lokaDAtuzu gatvA sattvAnAm Darmam deSayanti sma, yat uta
   imām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām, ye ca sattvās tāṃ	imAm eva zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSa nAm, ye ca sattvAH tAm
   dharmadeśanāṃ śmvanti te niyatā bhavanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.	Darma deSanAm Smvanti te niyatAH Bavanti anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO.
   (PvsP1 1: 4)	(Pu sP1 1: 4)
   atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ nāma	aTa Kalu BagavAn tasmin eva siMhAsane nizaNNaH siMha vikrIxitam nAma
   samādhiṃ samāpede, tathārūpaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma	samADim samApede, taTArUpam ca Rdhi aBisaMskAram aBisaMskaroti sma
   yathārūpeṇarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro	yaTArUpeNa RdDi aBisaMskAreNa aBisaMskRtena ayam tri sAhasra mahA sAhasraH 
   lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāram akampata prākampata saṃprākampata, acalat prācalat	lokaDAtuH zaz vikAram akampata prAkampata saMprAkampata, acalat prAcalat 
   saṃprācalat, avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat, araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat,	saMprAcalat, aveDat prAveDat saMprAveDat, araNat prAraNat saMprAraNat,
   akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat, agarjat prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat, ante	akzuByat prAkzuByat saMprAkzuByat, agarjat prAk arjat saMprAgarjat, ante
   unnamati madhye avanamati, madhye unnamati ante avanamati, mṛdukaḥ	unnamati maDye avanamati, maDye unnamati ante avanamati, mRdukaH
   snigdhaḥ sarvasattvasukhajanano 'bhūt.	snigDaH sarva sattva suKa jananaH aBUt .
   atha khalu tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre	aTa Kalu tena kzaNa lava muhUrtena ye asmin tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre
   lokadhātau nirayā vā tiryagyonayo vā yamalokā vā te sarve samucchinnāḥ	lokaDAtO nirayAH vA tiryagyonayaH vA yama lokAH vA te sarve samucCinnAH
   śūnyā abhūvan, sarvākṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan, ye ca sattvās tābhyo	SUnyAH aBUvan, sarva akzaNAH ca astamitAH aBUvan, ye ca sattvAH tAByaH 
   narakatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve tenaiva prītiprāmodhyena	naraka tiryagyoni yama loka gatiByaH cyutAH te sarve tena eva prIti prAmoDyena
   manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan, evaṃ cāturmahārājikānāṃ	manuzyANAm saBA gatAyAm upapannAH ca aBUvan, evam cAturmahArAjikAnAm
   devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ	devAnAm trayastriMSAnAm yAmAnAm tuzitAnAm nirmANa ratInAm
   paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan.	paranirmita vaSavartinAm devAnAm saBA gatAyAm upapannAH ca aBUvan.
   atha khalu te manuṣyās te ca devā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvajanmāny	aTa Kalu te manuzyAH te ca devAH BagavataH eva anuBAvena pUrva janmAni 
   anusmaranti sma, anusmṛtya ca tenaiva prītiprāmodyena yena bhagavāṃs	anusmaranti sma, anusmRtya ca tena eva prIti prAmodyena yena BagavAn= 
   tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir abhivandya	tena upasaMkrAntAH, upasaMkramya BagavataH pAdO SiroBiH aBivandya
   bhagavantaṃ prāñjalayo bhūtvā namasyanti sma, evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi	Bagavantam prAQjalayaH BUtvA namasyanti sma, evam pUrvasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ	gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu dakziNasyAm paScimAyAm uttarasyAm
   vidikṣūrdhvam adhaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasmin digbhāge	vidikzu UrDvam aDas samantAt daSasu dikzu ekEkasmin digBAge

   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Cattra Dvaja patAkA vEjayantIBiH 
   yeneyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas	yena iyam saha AlokaDAtuH tena saMprAptaH, yena ca SAkya muniH taTAgata s
   tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte	tena upasaMkrAntaH, upasaMkramya BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya ekAnte
   'tiṣṭhat, ekānte sthitaś ca samantaraśmir bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ	atizWat, ekAnte sTitaH ca samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH Bagavantam
   śākyamunim etad avocat: ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ	SAkya munim etat avocat: ratna AkaraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm
   paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ	paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm
   ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatena (PvsP1 1:	ca paripRcCati, imAni ca tena BagavatA ratna AkareNa taTAgatena (PvsP1 1:
   9) nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni	9) nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni prezitAni
   bhagavataḥ.	BagavataH.
   atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te	aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH taTAgataH tAni padmAni gRhItvA yena te
   pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat, taiś ca	pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena prAkzipat, tEH ca
   padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā	padmEH te lokaDAtavaH sPuwAH aBUvan, tezu ca padmezu budDa vigrahA
   niṣaṇṇakāḥ, teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva	nizaNNakAH, tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti yat uta imAm eva
   prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām, yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ	prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSa nAm, yEH ca sattvEH sa DarmaH
   śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.	SrutaH te niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO.
   atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās	aTa Kalu te boDisattvAH te ca gRhasTAH te ca pravrajitAH te ca dArakAH 
   tāś ca dārikās tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātoḥ samantaraśminā bodhisattvena	tAH ca dArikAH tatas ratnAvatyAH lokaDAtoH samantaraSminA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ	mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH Bagavantam
   śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan.	SAkya munim satkRtya gurukRtya saMmAnya saMpUjya ekAnte nyazIdan.
   atha khalu dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya	aTa Kalu dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya
   tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ sarvaśokāpagato nāma tatrāśokaśrīr	teByaH yaH sarva avasAnikaH lokaDAtuH sarva Soka apagataH nAma tatra aSoka SrIH 
   nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa imām	nAma taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati, saH imAm
   eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.	eva prajQApAramitAm boDisattvAnAm Darmam deSayati.
   atha tatra lokadhātau vigataśoko nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam	aTa tatra lokaDAtO vigata SokaH nAma boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam mahAntam
   avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam	avaBAsam dRzwvA taQ ca mahAntam pRTivI cAlam taQ ca BagavataH asecanakam
   ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān aśokaśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas	Atma BAvam dRzwvA yena BagavAn aSoka SrIH taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDas
   tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ	tena upasaMkrAmat upasaMkramya tasya BagavataH pAdO aBivandya tam
   tathāgatam aśokaśriyam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya	taTAgatam aSoka Sriyam etat avocat: kaH Bagavan hetuH? kaH pratyayo? asya
   mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya ca	mahataH avaBAsasya loke prAdurBAvAya asya ca mahataH pRTivI cAlasya asya ca
   tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.	taTAgatasya Asecanaka Atma BAvasya saMdarSanAya.
   evam ukte aśokaśrīs tathāgato vigataśokaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat: asti	evam ukte aSoka SrIH taTAgataH vigata Sokam boDisattvam etat avocat: asti
   kulaputreta uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā	kula putreta uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya sahA
   nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas	nAma lokaDAtuH tatra SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDas
   tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ	tizWati Driyate yApayati, sa boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.	prajQApAramitAm saMprakASayati tasya ayam IdRSaH anuBAvaH.
   (PvsP1 1: 10)	(Pu sP1 1: 10)
   atha khalu vigataśoko bodhisattvo 'śokaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:	aTa Kalu vigata SokaH boDisattvaH aSoka Sriyam taTAgatam etat avocat :
   gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ	gamizyAmi aham Bagavan tAm sahAm lokaDAtum taQ ca SAkya munim taTAgatam
   darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān	darSanAya vandanAya paryupAsanAya tAn ca boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn
   bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān	BUyastvena kumAra BUtAn DAraNI pratilabDAn samADi nirhAra kuSalAn
   sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṅ gatān.	sarva samADi vaSi pAramitAF gatAn .

   atha khalu aśokaśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni	aTa Kalu aSoka SrIH taTAgataH nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa avaBAsAni

   kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ, evañ ca vadeḥ,	kula putra padmEH tam SAkya munim taTAgatam aByavakireH, evan ca vadeH,

   tena bhagavatā aśokaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni	tena BagavatA aSoka SriyA taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena padmAni
   prahitāni bhagavata iti, saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra	prahitAni BagavataH iti, saMprajAna kArI ca tvam kula putra tatra
   buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra	budDa kzetre BUyAH. tat kasya hetoH? durAsadAH hi te boDisattvAH ye tatra
   sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.	sahAyAm loka DAtO upapannAH.

   buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti sma, yad	budDa vigrahAH nizaNNakAH tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti sma, yat

   dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.	DarmaH SrutaH te niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO.

   prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.	prajQApAramitAm boDisattvAnAm Darmam deSayati.

   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Cattra Dvaja patAkA vEjayantIBiH 
   yeneyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas	yena iyam saha AlokaDAtuH tena saMprAptaH, yena ca SAkya muniH taTAgata s
   tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte	tena upasaMkrAntaH, upasaMkramya BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya ekAnte
   'tiṣṭhat, ekānte sthitaś ca cāritramatir bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ	atizWat, ekAnte sTitaH ca cAritra matiH boDisattvaH Bagavantam
   śākyamunim etad avocat: ratnārcir bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ	SAkya munim etat avocat: ratna arciH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm
   paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ	paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm
   ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnārciṣā tathāgatena	ca paripRcCati, imAni ca tena BagavatA ratna arcizA taTAgatena
   nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni	nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni prezitAni
   bhagavataḥ.	BagavataH.
   atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā (PvsP1 1:	aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH taTAgataH tAni padmAni gRhItvA (Pu sP1 1:
   13) yena te paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena	13) yena te paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena
   prākṣipat, taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu	prAkzipat, tEH ca padmEH te lokaDAtavaH sPuwAH aBUvan, tezu ca padmezu
   buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad	budDa vigrahAH nizaNNakAH tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti yat 
   utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām, yaiś ca sattvaiḥ	uta imAm eva prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSa nAm, yEH ca sattvEH
   sadharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.	saDarmaH SrutaH te niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO.
   atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās	aTa Kalu te boDisattvAH te ca gRhasTAH te ca pravrajitAH te ca dArakAH 
   tāś ca dārikās tata upaśāntāyā lokadhātoś cāritramatiṇā bodhisattvena	tAH ca dArikAH tatas upaSAntAyAH lokaDAtoH cAritra matiNA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ	mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH Bagavantam
   śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan.	SAkya munim satkRtya gurukRtya saMmAnya saMpUjya ekAnte nyazIdan.
   atha khalv uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya	aTa Kalu uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya
   tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur jayā nāma tatra jayendro nāma	teByaH yaH sarva avasAnikaH lokaDAtuH jayA nAma tatra jaya indraH nAma
   tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa imām eva	taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati, saH imAm eva
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.	prajQApAramitAm boDisattvAnAm Darmam deSayati.
   atha tatra lokadhātau jayadatto nāma bodhisattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ	aTa tatra lokaDAtO jayadattaH nAma boDisattvaH tam mahAntam avaBAsam
   dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ	dRzwvA taQ ca mahAntam pRTivI cAlam taQ ca BagavataH asecanakam Atma BAvam
   dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavāñ jayendras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas	dRzwvA yena BagavAn jaya indraH taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDas
   tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ	tena upasaMkrAmat upasaMkramya tasya BagavataH pAdO aBivandya tam
   tathāgataṃ jayendram etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya	taTAgatam jaya indram etat avocat: kaH Bagavan hetuH? kaH pratyayo? asya
   mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahatāḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya ca	mahataH avaBAsasya loke prAdurBAvAya asya ca mahatAH pRTivI cAlasya asya ca
   tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.	taTAgatasya Asecanaka Atma BAvasya saMdarSanAya.
   evam ukte jayendras tathāgato jayadattaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad	evam ukte jaya indraH taTAgataH jayadattam boDisattvam mahAsattvam etat 
   avocat: asti kulaputreto dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn	avocat: asti kula putra itaH dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn
   atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan	atikramya sahA nAma lokaDAtuH tatra SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH arhan
   samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa bodhisattvānāṃ	samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati, sa boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.	mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm saMprakASayati tasya ayam IdRSaH anuBAvaH.
   atha khalu jayadatto bodhisattvo jayendraṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:	aTa Kalu jayadattaH boDisattvaH jaya indram taTAgatam etat avocat :
   (PvsP1 1: 14) gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca	(Pu sP1 1: 14) gamizyAmi aham Bagavan tAm sahAm lokaDAtum taQ ca
   śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca	SAkya munim taTAgatam darSanAya vandanAya paryupAsanAya tAn ca
   bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān	boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn BUyastvena kumAra BUtAn DAraNI pratilabDAn
   samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṅ gatān.	samADi nirhAra kuSalAn sarva samADi vaSi pAramitAF gatAn .
   sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.	sa BagavAn Aha: gacCa tvam kula putra yasya idAnIm kAlam manyase.
   atha khalu jayendras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni	aTa Kalu jaya indraH taTAgataH nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa avaBAsAni
   sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni jayadattāya bodhisattvāya prādāt, etais tvaṃ	sahasra patrANi padmAni jayadattAya boDisattvAya prAdAt, etEH tvam
   kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ, evañ ca vadeḥ,	kula putra padmEH tam SAkya munim taTAgatam aByavakireH, evan ca vadeH,
   jayendro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ	jaya indraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm
   laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca	laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm ca paripRcCati, imAni ca
   tena bhagavatā jayendreṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni	tena BagavatA jaya indreNa taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena padmAni
   prahitāni bhagavata iti, saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra	prahitAni BagavataH iti, saMprajAna kArI ca tvam kula putra tatra
   buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra	budDa kzetre BUyAH. tat kasya hetoH? durAsadAH hi te boDisattvAH ye tatra
   sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.	sahAyAm loka DAtO upapannAH.
   atha khalu jayadatto bodhisattvo jayendrasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni	aTa Kalu jayadattaH boDisattvaH jaya indrasya taTAgatasya sakASAt tAni
   nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair	nAnA ratna mayAni padmAni gRhItvA suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi anekEH 
   bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair	boDisattva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrEH gRhasTEH pravrajitEH ca dArakEH 
   dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ uttarasyāṃ diśi teṣu	dArikABiH ca sArDam parivRtaH puraskRtaH uttarasyAm diSi tezu
   gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan	gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAn BagavataH satkurvan gurukurvan
   mānayan pūjayan	mAnayan pUjayan
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Cattra Dvaja patAkA vEjayantIBiH 
   yenāyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas	yena ayam saha AlokaDAtuH tena saMprAptaH, yena ca SAkya muniH taTAgata s
   tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte	tena upasaMkrAntaH, upasaMkramya BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya ekAnte
   'tiṣṭhat, ekānte sthitaś ca jayadatto bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim	atizWat, ekAnte sTitaH ca jayadattaH boDisattvaH Bagavantam SAkya munim
   etad avocat: jayendro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty	etat avocat: jaya indraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm paripRcCati 
   alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca	alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm ca
   paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā jayendreṇa tathāgatena	paripRcCati, imAni ca tena BagavatA jaya indreNa taTAgatena
   nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni	nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni prezitAni
   bhagavataḥ.	BagavataH.
   atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te	aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH taTAgataH tAni padmAni gRhItvA yena te
   uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena (PvsP1 1: 15)	uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena (Pu sP1 1: 15)
   prākṣipat, taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu	prAkzipat, tEH ca padmEH te lokaDAtavaH sPuwAH aBUvan, tezu ca padmezu
   buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad	budDa vigrahAH nizaNNakAH tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti yat 
   utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ, yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa	uta imAm eva prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSanAM, yEH ca sattvEH sa
   dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.	DarmaH SrutaH te niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO.
   atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās	aTa Kalu te boDisattvAH te ca gRhasTAH te ca pravrajitAH te ca dArakAH 
   tāś ca dārikās tato jayāyā lokadhātoḥ jayadattena bodhisattvena	tAH ca dArikAH tatas jayAyAH lokaDAtoH jayadattena boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ	mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH Bagavantam
   śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan.	SAkya munim satkRtya gurukRtya saMmAnya saMpUjya ekAnte nyazIdan.
   atha khalv uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya	aTa Kalu uttara pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya
   tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ samādhyalaṅkṛtā nāma tatra	teByaH yaH sarva avasAnikaH lokaDAtuH samADi alaFkRtA nAma tatra
   samādhihastyuttaraśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati	samADihastyuttaraSrIH nAma taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati
   dhriyate yāpayati, sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ	Driyate yApayati, saH imAm eva prajQApAramitAm boDisattvAnAm Darmam
   deśayati.	deSayati.
   atha tatra lokadhātau vijayavikrāmī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ	aTa tatra lokaDAtO vijaya vikrAmI nAma boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam
   mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato	mahAntam avaBAsam dRzwvA taQ ca mahAntam pRTivI cAlam taQ ca BagavataH 
   'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān samādhihastyuttaraśrīs	asecanakam Atma BAvam dRzwvA yena BagavAn samADi hasti uttara SrI s
   tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya	taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH tena upasaMkrAmat upasaMkramya tasya
   bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ	BagavataH pAdO aBivandya Bagavantam taTAgatam
   samādhihastyuttaraśriyam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo?	samADi hasti uttara Sriyam etat avocat: kaH Bagavan hetuH? kaH pratyayo?
   'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ	asya mahataH avaBAsasya loke prAdurBAvAya asya ca mahataH
   pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.	pRTivI cAlasya asya ca Asecanakasya taTAgata Atma BAvasya saMdarSanAya.
   evam ukte bhagavān samādhihastyuttaraśrīs tathāgato vijayavikrāmiṇaṃ	evam ukte BagavAn samADi hasti uttara SrIH taTAgataH vijaya vikrAmiNam
   bodhisattvam etad avocat: asti kulaputreto dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi	boDisattvam etat avocat: asti kula putra itaH dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra	gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya sahA nAma lokaDAtuH tatra
   śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate	SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate
   yāpayati, sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati,	yApayati, sa boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm saMprakASayati,
   tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.	tasya ayam IdRSaH anuBAvaH.
   atha khalu vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvaḥ samādhihastyuttaraśriyaṃ tathāgatam	aTa Kalu vijaya vikrAmI boDisattvaH samADi hasti uttara Sriyam taTAgatam
   etad avocat: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahālokadhātun (PvsP1 1: 16) tañ	etat avocat: gamizyAmi aham Bagavan tAm saha AlokaDAtun (Pu sP1 1: 16) taQ
   ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca	ca SAkya munim taTAgatam darSanAya vandanAya paryupAsanAya tAn ca
   bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān	boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn BUyastvena kumAra BUtAn DAraNI pratilabDAn
   samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramiṅ gatān.	samADi nirhAra kuSalAn sarva samADi vaSi pAram iF gatAn .
   sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.	sa BagavAn Aha: gacCa tvam kula putra yasya idAnIm kAlam manyase.
   atha khalu samādhihastyuttaraśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni	aTa Kalu samADi hasti uttara SrIH taTAgataH nAnA ratna mayAni
   suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāṇi vijayavikrāmiṇe bodhisattvāya	suvarNa avaBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmANi vijaya vikrAmiNe boDisattvAya
   prādāt, etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmaiḥ śākyamunin tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,	prAdAt, etEH tvam kula putra padmEH SAkyamunin taTAgatam aByavakireH,
   evaṃ ca vadeḥ, samādhihastyuttaraśrīr bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ	evam ca vadeH, samADi hasti uttara SrIH Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm
   paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānetāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ	paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAnetAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm
   ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā samādhihastyuttaraśriyā	ca paripRcCati, imAni ca tena BagavatA samADi hasti uttara SriyA
   tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,	taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena padmAni prahitAni BagavataH iti,
   saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya	saMprajAna kArI ca tvam kula putra tatra budDa kzetre BUyAH. tat kasya
   hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.	hetoH? durAsadAH hi te boDisattvAH ye tatra sahAyAm loka DAtO upapannAH.
   atha vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvaḥ samādhihastyuttaraśriyas tathāgatasya	aTa vijaya vikrAmI boDisattvaH samADi hasti uttara SriyaH taTAgatasya
   sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanibhāsāni	sakASAt tAni nAnA ratna mayAni padmAni gRhItvA suvarNa niBAsAni
   sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ	sahasra patrANi anekEH boDisattva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrEH gRhasTEH
   pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta	pravrajitEH ca dArakEH dArikABiH ca sArDam parivRtaH puraskRta
   uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ	uttara pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAn BagavataH

   śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat, ekānte sthitaś ca vijayavikrāmī	SirasA aBivandya ekAnte atizWat, ekAnte sTitaH ca vijaya vikrAmI
   bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat: samādhisastyuttaraśrīr	boDisattvaH Bagavantam SAkya munim etat avocat: samADi sasti uttara SrIH

   samādhihastyuttaraśriyā tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni	samADi hasti uttara SriyA taTAgatena nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa nirBAsAni

   sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni	sUrya maNxala praBAsA uttama SriyA taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena padmAni
   prahitāni bhagavata iti, saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra	prahitAni BagavataH iti, saMprajAna kArI ca tvam kula putra tatra
   buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra	budDa kzetre BUyAH. tat kasya hetoH? durAsadAH hi te boDisattvAH ye tatra
   sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.	sahAyAm loka DAtO upapannAH.
   atha khalu sūryaprabhāso bodhisattvaḥ sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśriyaḥ	aTa Kalu sUrya praBAsaH boDisattvaH sUrya maNxala praBAsa uttama SriyaH
   tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā	taTAgatasya sakASAt tAni nAnA ratna mayAni padmAni gRhItvA
   suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair	suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi anekEH 
   bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair	boDisattva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrEH gRhasTEH pravrajitEH ca dArakEH 
   dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi teṣu	dArikABiH ca sArDam parivRtaH puraskRtaH dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi tezu
   gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan	gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAn BagavataH satkurvan gurukurvan
   mānayan pūjayan	mAnayan pUjayan
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Cattra Dvaja patAkA vEjayantIBiH 
   yeneyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas	yena iyam saha AlokaDAtuH tena saMprAptaH, yena ca SAkya muniH taTAgata s
   tenopasaṃkrāmat, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte	tena upasaMkrAmat, upasaMkramya BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya ekAnte
   'tiṣṭhat, ekāntasthitaś ca sūryaprabhāso bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ	atizWat, ekAnta sTitaH ca sUrya praBAsaH boDisattvaH Bagavantam
   śākyamunim etad avocat: sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrī bhagavān bhagavantam	SAkya munim etat avocat: sUrya maNxala praBAsa uttama SrI BagavAn Bagavantam
   alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ	alpa AbADa tAm paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam
   sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni (PvsP1 1: 21) ca tena	suKa sparSa vihAra tAm ca paripRcCati, imAni (PvsP1 1: 21) ca tena
   bhagavatā sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśriyā tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni	BagavatA sUrya maNxala praBAsa uttama SriyA taTAgatena nAnA ratna mayAni
   suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.	suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni prezitAni BagavataH.
   atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te	aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH taTAgataH tAni padmAni gRhItvA yena te
   dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,	dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena prAkzipat,
   taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu	tEH ca padmEH te lokaDAtavaH sPuwAH aBUvan, tezu ca padmezu
   buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad	budDa vigrahAH nizaNNakAH tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti yat 
   utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ, yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa	uta imAm eva prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSanAM, yEH ca sattvEH sa
   dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.	DarmaH SrutaH te niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO.
   atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās	aTa Kalu te boDisattvAH te ca gRhasTAH te ca pravrajitAH te ca dArakAH 
   tāś ca dārikās tato vigatarajaḥsañcayāyā lokadhātoḥ sūryaprabhāsena	tAH ca dArikAH tatas vigata rajaH saQcayAyAH lokaDAtoH sUrya praBAsena
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair	boDisattvena mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH 
   bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte	Bagavantam SAkya munim satkRtya gurukRtya saMmAnya saMpUjya ekAnte
   nyaṣīdan.	nyazIdan.
   atha khalu paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya	aTa Kalu paScima uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya
   tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur vaśībhūtā nāma tatraikacchattro nāma	teByaH yaH sarva avasAnikaH lokaDAtuH vaSIBUtA nAma tatra ekacCattraH nAma
   tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa imām eva	taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati, saH imAm eva
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.	prajQApAramitAm boDisattvAnAm Darmam deSayati.
   atha tatra lokadhātau ratnottamo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam	aTa tatra lokaDAtO ratnottamaH nAma boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam mahAntam
   avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam	avaBAsam dRzwvA taQ ca mahAntam pRTivI cAlam taQ ca BagavataH asecanakam
   ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān ekacchattras tathāgato 'rhan	Atma BAvam dRzwvA yena BagavAn ekacCattraH taTAgataH arhan
   samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv	samyaksaMbudDaH tena upasaMkrAmat upasaMkramya tasya BagavataH pAdO= 
   abhivandya taṃ tathāgatam ekacchattram etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ	aBivandya tam taTAgatam eka= Cattram etat avocat: kaH Bagavan hetuH? kaH
   pratyayo? 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya, asya ca mahataḥ	pratyayo? asya mahataH avaBAsasya loke prAdurBAvAya, asya ca mahataH
   pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.	pRTivI cAlasya asya ca Asecanakasya taTAgata Atma BAvasya saMdarSanAya.
   evam ukte bhagavān ekacchattras tathāgato ratnottamaṃ bodhisattvam etad	evam ukte BagavAn ekacCattraH taTAgataH ratna uttamam boDisattvam etat 
   avocat: asti kulaputra itaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān	avocat: asti kula putraH itas pUrva dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamAn
   lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir (PvsP1 1: 22)	lokaDAtUn atikramya sahA nAma lokaDAtuH tatra SAkya muniH (Pu sP1 1: 22)
   nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbubddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa	nAma taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbubdDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati, sa
   bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo	boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm saMprakASayati tasya ayam IdRSaH 
   'nubhāvaḥ.	anuBAvaH.
   atha khalu ratnottamo bodhisattva ekacchattraṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:	aTa Kalu ratna uttamaH boDisattvaH eka= Cattram taTAgatam etat avocat :
   gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ	gamizyAmi aham Bagavan tAm sahAm lokaDAtum taQ ca SAkya munim taTAgatam
   darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān	darSanAya vandanAya paryupAsanAya tAn ca boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn
   bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān	BUyastvena kumAra BUtAn DAraNI pratilabDAn samADi nirhAra kuSalAn
   sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṅ gatān.	sarva samADi vaSi pAramitAF gatAn .
   sa bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.	sa BagavAn Aha: gacCa tvam kula putra yasya idAnIm kAlam manyase.
   atha khalu ekacchattras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni	aTa Kalu ekacCattraH taTAgataH nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa avaBAsAni
   sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni ratnottamāya bodhisattvāya prādāt, etais tvaṃ	sahasra patrANi padmAni ratna uttamAya boDisattvAya prAdAt, etEH tvam
   kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ, evañ ca vadeḥ,	kula putra padmEH tam SAkya munim taTAgatam aByavakireH, evan ca vadeH,
   ekacchattro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ	ekacCattraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm
   laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca	laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm ca paripRcCati, imAni ca
   tena bhagavatā ekacchattreṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni	tena BagavatA eka= CattreNa taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena padmAni
   prahitāni bhagavata iti, saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra	prahitAni BagavataH iti, saMprajAna kArI ca tvam kula putra tatra
   buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra	budDa kzetre BUyAH. tat kasya hetoH? durAsadAH hi te boDisattvAH ye tatra
   sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.	sahAyAm loka DAtO upapannAH.
   atha khalu ratnottamo bodhisattva ekacchattrasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni	aTa Kalu ratna uttamaH boDisattvaH eka= Cattrasya taTAgatasya sakASAt tAni
   nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair	nAnA ratna mayAni padmAni gRhItvA suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi anekEH 
   bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair	boDisattva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrEH gRhasTEH pravrajitEH ca dArakEH 
   dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ paścimottarasyāṃ diśi teṣu	dArikABiH ca sArDam parivRtaH puraskRtaH paScima uttarasyAm diSi tezu
   gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan	gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAn BagavataH satkurvan gurukurvan
   mānayan pūjayan	mAnayan pUjayan
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Cattra Dvaja patAkA vEjayantIBiH 
   yeneyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ, yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan	yena iyam saha AlokaDAtuH tena saMprAptaH, yena ca SAkya muniH taTAgataH arhan
   samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau	samyaksaMbudDaH tena upasaMkrAntaH, upasaMkramya BagavataH pAdO
   śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat, ekānte sthitaś ca ratnottamo bodhisattvo	SirasA aBivandya ekAnte atizWat, ekAnte sTitaH ca ratna uttamaH boDisattvaH 
   (PvsP1 1: 23) bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat: ekacchattro bhagavān	(Pu sP1 1: 23) Bagavantam SAkya munim etat avocat: ekacCattraH BagavAn
   bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ	Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm
   balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati, imāni ca tena bhagavatā	balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm ca paripRcCati, imAni ca tena BagavatA
   ekacchattreṇa tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi	eka= CattreNa taTAgatena nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi
   padmāni prahitāni bhagavataḥ.	padmAni prahitAni BagavataH.
   atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te	aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH taTAgataH tAni padmAni gRhItvA yena te
   paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,	paScima uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena prAkzipat,
   taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan, teṣu ca padmeṣu	tEH ca padmEH te lokaDAtavaH sPuwAH aBUvan, tezu ca padmezu
   buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad	budDa vigrahAH nizaNNakAH tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti yat 
   utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām, yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa	uta imAm eva prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSa nAm, yEH ca sattvEH sa
   dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.	DarmaH SrutaH te niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO.
   atha khalu te boadhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca	aTa Kalu te boaDisattvAH te ca gRhasTAH te ca pravrajitAH te ca
   dārakās tāś ca dārikās tato vaśībhūtāyā lokadhāto ratnottameṇa	dArakAH tAH ca dArikAH tatas vaSIBUtAyAH lokaDAtoH ratna uttameNa
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair	boDisattvena mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH 
   bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte	Bagavantam SAkya munim satkRtya gurukRtya saMmAnya saMpUjya ekAnte
   nyaṣīdan.	nyazIdan.
   atha khalv adhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo	aTa Kalu aDastAt diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya teByaH 
   yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ padmā nāma tatra padmaśrīr nāma tathāgato	yaH sarva avasAnikaH lokaDAtuH padmA nAma tatra padmaSrIH nAma taTAgataH 
   'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa imām eva	arhan samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati, saH imAm eva
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.	prajQApAramitAm boDisattvAnAm Darmam deSayati.
   atha tatra lokadhātau padmottaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam	aTa tatra lokaDAtO padmottaraH nAma boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam mahAntam
   avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam	avaBAsam dRzwvA taQ ca mahAntam pRTivI cAlam taQ ca BagavataH asecanakam
   ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān padmaśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas	Atma BAvam dRzwvA yena BagavAn padmaSrIH taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDas
   tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ	tena upasaMkrAmat upasaMkramya tasya BagavataH pAdO aBivandya tam
   tathāgataṃ padmaśriyam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayo? 'sya	taTAgatam padma Sriyam etat avocat: kaH Bagavan hetuH? kaH pratyayo? asya
   mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya, (PvsP1 1: 24) asya ca mahataḥ	mahataH avaBAsasya loke prAdurBAvAya, (PvsP1 1: 24) asya ca mahataH
   pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.	pRTivI cAlasya asya ca Asecanakasya taTAgata Atma BAvasya saMdarSanAya.
   evam ukte bhagavān padmaśrīs tathāgataḥ padmottaraṃ bodhisattvam etad	evam ukte BagavAn padmaSrIH taTAgataH padma uttaram boDisattvam etat 
   avocat: asti kulaputreta upariṣṭā diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn	avocat: asti kula putreta uparizwAH diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn
   atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan	atikramya sahA nAma lokaDAtuH tatra SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH arhan
   samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, sa bodhisattvānāṃ	samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati, sa boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.	mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm saMprakASayati tasya ayam IdRSaH anuBAvaH.
   atha khalu padmottaro bodhisattvaḥ padmaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:	aTa Kalu padma uttaraH boDisattvaH padma Sriyam taTAgatam etat avocat :
   gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ	gamizyAmi aham Bagavan tAm sahAm lokaDAtum taQ ca SAkya munim taTAgatam
   darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān	darSanAya vandanAya paryupAsanAya tAn ca boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn
   bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān	BUyastvena kumAra BUtAn DAraNI pratilabDAn samADi nirhAra kuSalAn
   sarvasamādhivaśipāramiṅ gatān.	sarva samADi vaSi pAram iF gatAn .

   atha khalu padmaśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni	aTa Kalu padmaSrIH taTAgataH nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa avaBAsAni
   sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni padmottarāya bodhisattvāya prādāt, etais tvaṃ	sahasra patrANi padmAni padma uttarAya boDisattvAya prAdAt, etEH tvam
   kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ, evañ ca vadeḥ,	kula putra padmEH tam SAkya munim taTAgatam aByavakireH, evan ca vadeH,
   padmaśrīr bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ	padmaSrIH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm

   sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.	sahAyAm loka DAtO upapannAH.

   śikṣitavyam.	Sikzitavyam.

   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.

   (PvsP1 1: 41) bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena	(Pu sP1 1: 41) BAzizyate ca tat sarvam udgrahItu kAmena DArayitu kAmena
   vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa	vAcayitu kAmena taTatvAya pratipattu kAmena pareByaH ca vistareNa
   saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	saMprakASayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   yat kiñcid uttarasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate	yat kiQcid uttarasyAm diSi budDEH BagavadBiH BAzitam BAzyate
   bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena	BAzizyate ca tat sarvam udgrahItu kAmena DArayitu kAmena vAcayitu kAmena
   tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena	taTatvAya pratipattu kAmena pareByaH ca vistareNa saMprakASayitu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.

   pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena	pratipattu kAmena pareByaH ca vistareNa saMprakASayitu kAmena

   iti dhāraṇīpratibhānasahagataḥ prasravaṇopamaḥ	iti DAraNI pratiBAna sahagataH prasravaNa upamaH
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāni pūrvasyāṃ diśi	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena yAni pUrvasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhakāratamisrāṇi, yatra	gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu anDakAratamisrANi, yatra
   sūryacandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti, tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena	sUrya candramasoH api praBAyA gatiH nAsti, tAni sarvANi avaBAsayitu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.

   śikṣitavyam.	Sikzitavyam.
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena ye pUrvasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān	gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH nAnA budDa kzetrezu upapannAH tAn
   sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena, tāṃś ca	sarvAn budDa Sabdam Darma Sabdam saMGa Sabdam saMSrAvayitu kAmena, tAn ca
   sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	sattvAn samyak dRzwyAm pratizWA payitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   ye dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā	ye dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH nAnA
   buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ	budDa kzetrezu upapannAH tAn sarvAn budDa Sabdam Darma Sabdam saMGa Sabdam
   saṃśrāvayitukāmena, tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena	saMSrAvayitu kAmena, tAn ca sattvAn samyak dRzwyAm pratizWApayitu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   ye paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā	ye paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH nAnA

   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   iti dharmoddānasahagata ānandaśabdopamaḥ	iti Darma uddAna sahagataH Ananda Sabda upamaH
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvasyāṃ diśi	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena pUrvasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu ye sattvā andhās te	gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu ye sattvAH anDAH te
   mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi drakzyanti iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti, unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta	evam vaDirAH SrotreNa SabdAn Srozyanti iti, unmattAH smRtim pratilapsyanta
   iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti, jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā	iti, nagnAH ca elAni pratilapsyante iti, jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrNa gAtrA
   bhaviṣyantīti, pipāsitā vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca	Bavizyanti iti, pipAsitAH vigata pipAsA Bavizyanti iti, apAya upapannAH ca
   sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante, manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti,	sattvAH sarva apAyeByaH vimokzyante, manuzya Atma BAvan ca pratilapsyante iti,
   duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe	duHSIlAn SIla skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, asamAhitAn samADi skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, duzprajQAn prajQA skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   (PvsP1 1: 45) avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	(Pu sP1 1: 45) avimuktAn vimukti skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	avimukti jQAna darSanAn vimukti jQAna darSana skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   adṛṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, sakṛdāgāmiphale	adRzwa satyAn srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti, sakRdAgAmi Pale
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, arhattve	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, anAgAmi Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti, arhat tve
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, anuttarāyāṃ	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, pratyeka boDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti, anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   ye dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu	ye dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu
   sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti	sattvAH anDAH te mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi drakzyanti iti
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti,	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam. evam vaDirAH SrotreNa SabdAn Srozyanti iti,
   unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyante iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti,	unmattAH smRtim pratilapsyante iti, nagnAH ca elAni pratilapsyante iti,
   jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti, pipāsitāḥ sattvā	jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrNa gAtrAH Bavizyanti iti, pipAsitAH sattvA
   vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo	vigata pipAsA Bavizyanti iti, apAya upapannAH ca sattvAH sarva apAyeByaH 
   vimokṣyante, manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe	vimokzyante, manuzya Atma BAvan ca pratilapsyante iti, duHSIlAn SIla skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, asamAhitAn samADi skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktān vimuktiskandhe	duzprajQAn prajQA skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, avimuktAn vimukti skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, avimukti jQAna darSanAn vimukti jQAna darSana skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, adṛṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, adRzwa satyAn srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau	sakRdAgAmi Pale anAgAmi Pale arhat tve pratizWApayizyAmi iti, pratyeka boDO
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   ye paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu	ye paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu
   sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti	sattvAH anDAH te mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi drakzyanti iti
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti,	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam. evam vaDirAH SrotreNa SabdAn Srozyanti iti,
   unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti,	unmattAH smRtim pratilapsyante iti, nagnAH ca elAni pratilapsyante iti,
   jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrnagātrā bhaviṣyantīti, pipāsitāḥ sattvā	jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrna gAtrAH Bavizyanti iti, pipAsitAH sattvA
   vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo	vigata pipAsA Bavizyanti iti, apAya upapannAH ca sattvAH sarva apAyeByaH 
   vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe	vimokzyante manuzya Atma BAvan ca pratilapsyante iti, duHSIlAn SIla skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, asamAhitAn samADi skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktān vimuktiskandhe	duzprajQAn prajQA skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, avimuktAn vimukti skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, (PvsP1 1: 46) avimuktijñānadarśanān	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, (Pu sP1 1: 46) avimukti jQAna darSanAn
   vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, adṛṣṭasatyān	vimukti jQAna darSana skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, adRzwa satyAn
   srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale	srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti, sakRdAgAmi Pale anAgAmi Pale
   arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	arhat tve pratizWApayizyAmi iti, pratyeka boDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   ye uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu	ye uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu

   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   ye uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu	ye uttara pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu
   sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi	sarva budDa kzetrezu sattvAH anDAH te mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi
   drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān	drakzyanti iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam. evam vaDirAH SrotreNa SabdAn
   śroṣyantīti, unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta iti, nagnāś cailāni	Srozyanti iti, unmattAH smRtim pratilapsyante iti, nagnAH ca elAni
   pratilapsyanta iti, jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti,	pratilapsyante iti, jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrNa gAtrAH Bavizyanti iti,
   pipāsitāḥ sattvā vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ	pipAsitAH sattvAH vigata pipAsA Bavizyanti iti, apAya upapannAH ca sattvAH
   sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān	sarva apAyeByaH vimokzyante manuzya Atma BAvan ca pratilapsyante iti, duHSIlAn
   śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe	SIla skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, asamAhitAn samADi skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, duzprajQAn prajQA skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktijñānadarśanān	avimuktAn vimukti skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, avimukti jQAna darSanAn

   srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, (PvsP1 1: 47) sakṛdāgāmiphale	srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti, (Pu sP1 1: 47) sakRdAgAmi Pale
   anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau	anAgAmi Pale arhat tve pratizWApayizyAmi iti, pratyeka boDO

   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   ye pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu	ye pUrva dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu
   sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi	sarva budDa kzetrezu sattvAH anDAH te mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi
   drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān	drakzyanti iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam. evam vaDirAH SrotreNa SabdAn
   śroṣyantīti, unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta iti, nagnāś cailāni	Srozyanti iti, unmattAH smRtim pratilapsyante iti, nagnAH ca elAni
   pratilapsyanta iti, jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti,	pratilapsyante iti, jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrNa gAtrAH Bavizyanti iti,

   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   ye dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu	ye dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu
   sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi	sarva budDa kzetrezu sattvAH anDAH te mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi
   drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān	drakzyanti iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam. evam vaDirAH SrotreNa SabdAn
   śroṣyantīti, unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta iti, nagnāś cailāni	Srozyanti iti, unmattAH smRtim pratilapsyante iti, nagnAH ca elAni
   pratilapsyanta iti, jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti,	pratilapsyante iti, jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrNa gAtrAH Bavizyanti iti,
   pipāsitāḥ sattvā vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ	pipAsitAH sattvAH vigata pipAsA Bavizyanti iti, apAya upapannAH ca sattvAH
   sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān	sarva apAyeByaH vimokzyante manuzya Atma BAvan ca pratilapsyante iti, duHSIlAn
   śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe	SIla skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, asamAhitAn samADi skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, duzprajQAn prajQA skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktijñānadarśanān	avimuktAn vimukti skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, avimukti jQAna darSanAn
   vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, adṛṣṭasatyān	vimukti jQAna darSana skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, adRzwa satyAn
   srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale	srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti, sakRdAgAmi Pale anAgAmi Pale
   arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	arhat tve pratizWApayizyAmi iti, pratyeka boDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   ye paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu	ye paScima uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu
   sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu (PvsP1 1: 48) sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā	sarva budDa kzetrezu (Pu sP1 1: 48) sattvAH anDAH te mama anuBAvena cakzuzA
   rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa	rUpANi drakzyanti iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam. evam vaDirAH SrotreNa
   śabdān śroṣyantīti, unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta iti, nagnāś cailāni	SabdAn Srozyanti iti, unmattAH smRtim pratilapsyante iti, nagnAH ca elAni
   pratilapsyanta iti, jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti,	pratilapsyante iti, jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrNa gAtrAH Bavizyanti iti,
   pipāsitāḥ sattvā vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ	pipAsitAH sattvAH vigata pipAsA Bavizyanti iti, apAya upapannAH ca sattvAH
   sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān	sarva apAyeByaH vimokzyante manuzya Atma BAvan ca pratilapsyante iti, duHSIlAn
   śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe	SIla skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, asamAhitAn samADi skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, duzprajQAn prajQA skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktijñānadarśanān	avimuktAn vimukti skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, avimukti jQAna darSanAn
   vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, adṛṣṭasatyān	vimukti jQAna darSana skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, adRzwa satyAn
   srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale	srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti, sakRdAgAmi Pale anAgAmi Pale
   arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	arhat tve pratizWApayizyAmi iti, pratyeka boDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   ye 'dho diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā	ye aDas diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu sattvA
   andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	anDAH te mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi drakzyanti iti, prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti, unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ	Sikzitavyam. evam vaDirAH SrotreNa SabdAn Srozyanti iti, unmattAH smRtim
   pratilapsyanta iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti, jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ	pratilapsyante iti, nagnAH ca elAni pratilapsyante iti, jiGatsitAH sattvAH
   pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti, pipāsitāḥ sattvā vigatapipāsā bhaviṣyantīti,	pUrNa gAtrAH Bavizyanti iti, pipAsitAH sattvAH vigata pipAsA Bavizyanti iti,
   apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca	apAya upapannAH ca sattvAH sarva apAyeByaH vimokzyante manuzya Atma BAvan ca
   pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān	pratilapsyante iti, duHSIlAn SIla skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, asamAhitAn
   samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe	samADi skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, duzprajQAn prajQA skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, avimuktAn vimukti skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	avimukti jQAna darSanAn vimukti jQAna darSana skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   adṛṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, sakṛdāgāmiphale	adRzwa satyAn srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti, sakRdAgAmi Pale
   anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau	anAgAmi Pale arhat tve pratizWApayizyAmi iti, pratyeka boDO
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam,
   ye ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu	ye UrDvam diSi gaFgA nadI bAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu
   sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyantīti	sattvAH anDAH te mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi drakzyanti iti
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti,	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam. evam vaDirAH SrotreNa SabdAn Srozyanti iti,
   unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyante iti, nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti,	unmattAH smRtim pratilapsyante iti, nagnAH ca elAni pratilapsyante iti,
   jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhaviṣyantīti, pipāsitāḥ sattvā	jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrNa gAtrAH Bavizyanti iti, pipAsitAH sattvA
   vigatapipāsā (PvsP1 1: 49) bhaviṣyantīti, apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ	vigata pipAsA (Pu sP1 1: 49) Bavizyanti iti, apAya upapannAH ca sattvAH
   sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyanta iti, duḥśīlān	sarva apAyeByaH vimokzyante manuzya Atma BAvan ca pratilapsyante iti, duHSIlAn
   śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, asamāhitān samādhiskandhe	SIla skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, asamAhitAn samADi skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	pratizWApayizyAmi iti, duzprajQAn prajQA skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   avimuktān vimuktiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, avimuktijñānadarśanān	avimuktAn vimukti skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti, avimukti jQAna darSanAn

   srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale	srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti, sakRdAgAmi Pale anAgAmi Pale
   arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,	arhat tve pratizWApayizyAmi iti, pratyeka boDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti,
   anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena	anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   iti ekāyanamārgasahagato nadīsrotopamaḥ	iti ekAyana mArga saha gataH nadI srota upamaH
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgateryāpathe	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena taTAgateH yApaTe
   śikṣitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	Sikzitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA
   evam upaparīkṣitavyam, kadā nv ahaṃ nāgāvalokitam avalokayiṣyāmīti, kim	evam upaparIkzitavyam, kadA nu aham nAga avalokitam avalokayizyAmi iti, kim
   ity ahaṃ pṛthīvīṃ caturaṅgulam aspṛśan padbhyāṃ gaccheyam iti	iti aham pRTIvIm catur aFgulam aspRSan padByAm gacCeyam iti
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA
   evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ, kim ity ahaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikais trayastriṃśair	evam upaparIkzitavyan, kim iti aham cAturmahArAja kAyikEH trayastriMSEH 
   yāmais tuṣitair nirmāṇaratibhiḥ paranirmitavaśavartibhir brahmakāyikair	yAmEH tuzitEH nirmANa ratiBiH paranirmita vaSavartiBiH brahmakAyikEH 
   brahmapurohitair brahmapāriṣadyaiḥ parīttābhair apramāṇābhair ābhāsvaraiḥ	brahma purohitEH brahma pArizadyEH parItta ABEH apramANa ABEH ABAsvarEH
   parīttaśubhair apramāṇaśubhaiḥ śubhakṛtsnair anabhrakaiḥ puṇyaprasavair	parItta SuBEH apramANa SuBEH SuBa kRtsnEH anaBrakEH puNya prasavEH 
   bṛhatphalair asaṃjñisattvaiḥ śuddhāvāsair aspṛhair atapaiḥ sudṛśaiḥ	bRhat PalEH asaMjQi sattvEH SudDAvAsEH aspRhEH atapEH su dRSEH
   sudarśanair akaniṣṭhaiś ca parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto	sudarSanEH akanizWEH ca parivRtaH puraskRtaH 
   'nekadevaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair bodhimaṇḍadrumamūlam upasaṃkrāmeyam	aneka deva putra kowI niyuta Sata sahasrEH boDimaNxa druma mUlam upasaMkrAmeyam
   iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.	iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam.
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA
   evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ, kim iti ye cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā	evam upaparIkzitavyan, kim iti ye cAturmahArAja kAyikAH devAH trayastriMSA
   yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā	yAmAH tuzitA nirmANaratayaH paranirmitavaSavartinaH brahmakAyikA
   brahmapurohitā brahmapāriṣadyaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ	brahma purohitAH brahma pArizadyaH parItta ABAH apramANa ABAH ABAsvarAH
