   śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati, anupalambhayogena.	SikzitvA sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyati, anupalamBa yogena.
   subhūtir āha: evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	suBUtiH Aha: evam Bagavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣamāṇena māyāpuruṣeṇaiva śikṣitavyaṃ bhagavaty anuttarāyāṃ	SikzamANena mAyA puruzeNa eva Sikzitavyam Bagavati anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan sa eva māyāpuruṣo	samyaksaMboDO, tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi Bagavan saH eva mAyA puruzaH 
   veditavyaḥ, yad uta pañcopādānaskandhāḥ.	veditavyaH, yat uta paQca upAdAna skanDAH.
   bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, api tv amī pañcopādānaskandhāḥ	BagavAn Aha: tat kim manyase suBUte, api tu amI paQca upAdAna skanDAH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyanti?	prajQApAramitAyAm SikzitvA sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyanti?
   subhūtir āha: no bhagavaṃs, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavann	suBUtiH Aha: naH BagavaMs, tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi Bagavat = 
   abhāvasvabhāvāḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ. evaṃ svapnopamāḥ pañcaskandhāḥsvapnaś	aBAva svaBAvAH paQca upAdAna skanDAH. evam svapna upamAH paQca skanDAH svapna H 
   cābhāvasvabhāvo nopalabhyate, tathaiva pañcaskandhā abhāvasvabhāvatayā	ca aBAva svaBAvaH na upalaByate, taTA eva paQca skanDAH aBAva svaBAvatayA
   nopalabhyante.	na upalaByante.
   bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte pratiśrutkopamāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ,	BagavAn Aha: tat kim manyase suBUte pratiSrutka upamAH paQca skanDAH,
   pratibhāsopamāḥ nirmitakopamāḥ pratibimbopamāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ	pratiBAsA upamAH nirmitaka upamAH pratibimba upamAH paQca skanDAH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyanti?	prajQApAramitAyAm SikzitvA sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyanti?
   (PvsP1 2: 6)	(Pu sP1 2: 6)
   subhūtir āha: no bhagavaṃs, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavann	suBUtiH Aha: naH BagavaMs, tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi Bagavat = 
   abhāvasvabhāvāpratiśrutkā, evaṃ pratibhāso nirmitakaṃ pratibimbaṃ tathaiva	aBAva svaBAva apratiSrutkA, evam pratiBAsaH nirmitakam pratibimbam taTA eva
   pañcaskandhā abhāvasvabhāvatayā nopalabhyante, tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ	paQca skanDAH aBAva svaBAvatayA na upalaByante, taTA hi Bagavat mAyA upamam
   rūpaṃ māyopamā vedanā māyopamā saṃjñā māyopamāḥ saṃskārā māyopamaṃ	rUpam mAyA upamA vedanA mAyA upamA saMjQA mAyA upamAH saMskArAH mAyA upamam
   vijñānaṃ, yac ca vijñānaṃ tat ṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañcaskandhās te	vijQAnaM, yat ca vijQAnam tat zaz indriyam te paQca skanDAH te
   cādhyātmaśūnyatayā nopalabhyante, bahirdhāśūnyatayā nopalabhyante,	ca aDyAtma SUnyatayA na upalaByante, bahirDA SUnyatayA na upalaByante,
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā nopalabhyante, yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatayA na upalaByante, yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatayA
   nopalabhyante. saced evaṃ bhagavan bhāṣyamāṇo yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	na upalaByante. saced evam Bagavan BAzyamANaH yaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati	na avalIyate na saMlIyate na vipratisArI Bavati na utrasyati na saMtrasyati
   na saṃtrāsam āpadyate, veditavyam ayaṃ bhagavan niryāsyati sarvajñatāyāṃ	na saMtrAsam Apadyate, veditavyam ayam Bagavat niryAsyati sarvajQa tAyAm
   niryāsyati mārgajñatāyāṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.	niryAsyati mArga jQa tAyAm sarva AkAra jQa tAm anuprApsyati.
   iti tatraiva navamo 'śaikṣamārgaprajñaptivikalpaḥ	iti tatra eva navamaH aSEkza mArga prajQapti vikalpaH
   iti dvitīyo grāhakavikalpaḥ.	iti dvitIyaH grAhaka vikalpaH.
   atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: mā khalu bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat: mA Kalu Bagavan
   navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā avalīyeta	nava yAna saMprasTitaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH imam nirdeSam SrutvA avalIyeta
   saṃlīyeta vipratisārī bhavet, uttrasyet saṃtrasyet saṃtrāsam āpadyeta.	saMlIyeta vipratisArI Bavet, uttrasyet saMtrasyet saMtrAsam Apadyeta.
   bhagavān āha: sacet subhūte navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	BagavAn Aha: saced suBUte nava yAna saMprasTitaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalo bhaven na ca kalyāṇamitrahastagato	prajQApAramitAyAm caran anupAya kuSalaH Bavet na ca kalyANa mitra hasta gataH 
   bhaved uttrasyet saṃtrasyet saṃtrāsam āpadyeta.	Bavet uttrasyet saMtrasyet saMtrAsam Apadyeta.
   subhūtir āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	suBUtiH Aha: katamat Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakauśalyaṃ yatra caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	prajQApAramitAyAm carataH upAya kOSalyam yatra caran boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate?	na uttrasyati na saMtrasyati na saMtrAsam Apadyate?
   bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	BagavAn Aha: iha suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena rūpam anityam iti pratyavekṣate na	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena rUpam anityam iti pratyavekzate na
   copalabhate, vedanā sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittenānityeti	ca upalaBate, vedanA sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena anitya iti
   pratyavekṣate na copalabhate, saṃjñāsarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena	pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate, saMjQA sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena
   cittenānityeti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate, saṃskārāḥ	cittena anitya iti pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate, saMskArAH
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittenānityā iti pratyavekṣate na	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena anityAH iti pratyavekzate na
   copalabhate, vijñānaṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena (PvsP1 2: 7)	ca upalaBate, vijQAnam sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena (PvsP1 2: 7)
   cittenānityam iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate, idaṃ subhūte	cittena anityam iti pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate, idam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakauśalyaṃ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH upAya kOSalyam
   veditavyam.	veditavyam.
   punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena
   cittena rūpaṃ duḥkham iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate, vedanā saṃjñā	cittena rUpam duHKam iti pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate, vedanA saMjQA
   saṃskārāḥ, sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti	saMskArAH, sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena vijQAnam duHKam iti
   pratyavekṣate na copalabhate.	pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate.
   punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena
   cittena rūpaṃ śūnyam iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate, rūpam anātmeti	cittena rUpam SUnyam iti pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate, rUpam anAtmA iti
   rūpaṃ śāntam iti rūpaṃ viviktam iti rūpaṃ śūnyam iti rūpam ānimittam iti	rUpam SAntam iti rUpam viviktam iti rUpam SUnyam iti rUpam Animittam iti
   rūpam apraṇihitam iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate,	rUpam apraNihitam iti pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate,
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH,
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti pratyavekṣate na	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena vijQAnam SUnyam iti pratyavekzate na
   copalabhate, vijñānam anātmeti vijñānaṃ śāntam iti vijñānaṃ viviktam iti	ca upalaBate, vijQAnam anAtmA iti vijQAnam SAntam iti vijQAnam viviktam iti

   pratyavekṣate na copalabhate, sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena. idaṃ	pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate, sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena. idam
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carata
   upāyakauśalyaṃ veditavyam.	upAya kOSalyam veditavyam.

   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yān dharmadeśanāṅ karoty	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH yAn Darma deSanAF karoti 
   anupalambhayogena iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā, yā teṣām	anupalamBa yogena iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya dAna pAramitA, yA tezAm
   eva sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ manasikārāṇām aparāmarṣaṇatā iyaṃ	eva sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktAnAm manasikArANAm apara amarzaNa tA iyam

   śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktānāṃ manasikārāṇām anavakāśadānatā	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktAnAm manasikArANAm anavakASa dAna tA
   anyeṣām api vā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	anyezAm api vA kuSalAnAm DarmANAm iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   dhyānapāramitā, evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	DyAna pAramitA, evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   caran nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate.	caran na uttrasyati na saMtrasyati na saMtrAsam Apadyate.
   (PvsP1 2: 8)	(Pu sP1 2: 8)
   punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran evam
   pratyavekṣate na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	pratyavekzate na rUpa SUnya tayA rUpam SUnyam rUpam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   rūpam, na vedanāśūnyatayā vedanā śūnyā vedanaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	rUpam, na vedanA SUnyatayA vedanA SUnyA vedanA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   vedanā, na saṃjñāśūnyatayā saṃjñā śūnyā saṃjñaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	vedanA, na saMjQA SUnya tayA saMjQA SUnyA saMjQA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   saṃjñā, na saṃskāraśūnyatayā saṃskārāḥ śūnyāḥ saṃskārā eva śūnyatā	saMjQA, na saMskAra SUnyatayA saMskArAH SUnyAH saMskArAH eva SUnyatA
   śūnyataiva saṃskārāḥ, na vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ vijñānam eva	SUnyatA eva saMskArAH, na vijQAna SUnya tayA vijQAnam SUnyam vijQAnam eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva vijñānam.	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva vijQAnam.
   evaṃ na cakṣuḥśūnyatayā cakṣuḥ śūnyaṃ cakṣur eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	evam na cakzuH SUnyatayA cakzuH SUnyam cakzuH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   cakṣuḥ, na śrotraśūnyatayā śrotraṃ śūnyaṃ śrotram eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	cakzuH, na Srotra SUnyatayA Srotram SUnyam Srotram eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   śrotraṃ, na ghrāṇaśūnyatayā ghrāṇaṃ śūnyaṃ ghrāṇam eva śūnyatāśūnyataiva	SrotraM, na GrANa SUnyatayA GrANam SUnyam GrANam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva

   na kāyaśūnyatayā kāyaḥ śūnyaḥ kāya eva śūnyatāśūnyataiva kāyaḥ, na	na kAya SUnya tayA kAyaH SUnyaH kAyaH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva kAyaH, na
   manaḥśūnyatayā manaḥ śūnyaṃ mana eva śūnyatāśūnyataiva manaḥ.	manaH SUnyatayA manaH SUnyam manaH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva manaH.
   evaṃ na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpaṃ, na	evam na rUpa SUnya tayA rUpam SUnyam rUpam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva rUpaM, na
   śabdaśūnyatayā śabdaḥ śūnyaḥ śabda eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva śabdaḥ, na	Sabda SUnya tayA SabdaH SUnyaH SabdaH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva SabdaH, na
   gandhaśūnyatayā gandhaḥ śūnyaḥ gandha eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva gandhaḥ, na	ganDa SUnya tayA ganDaH SUnyaH ganDaH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva ganDaH, na
   rasaśūnyatayā rasaḥ śūnyaḥ rasa eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rasaḥ, na	rasa SUnya tayA rasaH SUnyaH rasaH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva rasaH, na
   spraṣṭavyaśūnyatayā spraṣṭavyaṃ śūnyaṃ spraṣṭavyam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	sprazwavya SUnyatayA sprazwavyam SUnyam sprazwavyam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   spraṣṭavyaṃ, na dharmaśūnyatayā dharmāḥ śūnyāḥdharmā eva śūnyatā	sprazwavyaM, na Darma SUnya tayA DarmAH SUnyAH DarmAH eva SUnyatA
   śūnyataiva dharmāḥ.	SUnyatA eva DarmAH.
   evaṃ na cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatayā cakṣurvijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurvijñānam eva	evam na cakzuH vijQAna SUnya tayA cakzuH vijQAnam SUnyam cakzuH vijQAnam eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva cakṣurvijñānaṃ, na śrotravijñānaśūnyatayā	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva cakzuH vijQAnan, na Srotra vijQAna SUnya tayA
   śrotravijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ śrotravijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	Srotra vijQAnam SUnyam Srotra vijQAnam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   śrotravijñānaṃ, na ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatayā ghrāṇavijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ	Srotra vijQAnaM, na GrANa vijQAna SUnya tayA GrANa vijQAnam SUnyam
   ghrāṇavijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva ghrāṇavijñānaṃ, na	GrANa vijQAnam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva GrANa vijQAnaM, na
   jihvāvijñānaśūnyatayā jihvāvijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ jihvāvijñānam eva śūnyatā	jihvA vijQAna SUnya tayA jihvA vijQAnam SUnyam jihvA vijQAnam eva SUnyatA
   śūnyataiva jihvāvijñānaṃ, na kāyavijñānaśūnyatayā kāyavijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ	SUnyatA eva jihvA vijQAnaM, na kAya vijQAna SUnyatayA kAya vijQAnam SUnyam
   kāyavijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva kāyavijñānaṃ, na manovijñānaśūnyatayā	kAya vijQAnam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva kAya vijQAnaM, na manaH vijQAna SUnyatayA
   manovijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ manovijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva manovijñānam.	manaH vijQAnam SUnyam manaH vijQAnam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva manaH vijQAnam.
   evaṃ na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatayā śūnyaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa	evam na cakzuH saMsparSaH cakzuH saMsparSa SUnya tayA SUnyaH cakzuH saMsparSa
   eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ, evaṃ na śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyāḥ,	eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva cakzuH saMsparSaH, evam na Srotra GrANa jihvA kAyAH,
   na manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatayā śūnyo (PvsP1 2: 9)	na manaH saMsparSaH manaH saMsparSa SUnya tayA SUnyaH (Pu sP1 2: 9)
   manaḥsaṃsparśa eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.	manaH saMsparSaH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva manaH saMsparSaH.
   evaṃ na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	evam na cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayita SUnyatayA SUnyam
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ, na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitaM, na Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayāśūnyaṃ	Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayita SUnyatayA SUnyam
   śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā	Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam eva SUnyatA
   śūnyataivaśrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ, na	SUnyatA eva Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitaM, na
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayāśūnyaṃ	GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayita SUnyatayA SUnyam
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva

   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam.	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam.
   na smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatayā smṛtyupasthānāni śūnyāni smṛtyupasthānāny eva	na smRti upasTAna SUnyatayA smRti upasTAnAni SUnyAni smRti upasTAnAni eva

   bhāvayati upalabhate, tayā ca kṣāntipāramitayā manyate,	BAvayati upalaBate, tayA ca kzAnti pAramitayA manyate,
   apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ śīlapāramitāṃ bhāvayati	apagata sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH SIla pAramitAm BAvayati
   upalabhate, tayā ca śīlapāramitayā manyate,	upalaBate, tayA ca SIla pAramitayA manyate,
   apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dānapāramitāṃ bhāvayati	apagata sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH dAna pAramitAm BAvayati
   upalabhate, tayā ca dānapāramitayā manyate.	upalaBate, tayA ca dAna pAramitayA manyate.
   punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (PvsP1 2:	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm (PvsP1 2:
   13) carann apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārai rūpam	13) caran apagata sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH rUpam
   adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti, rūpaṃ bahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti,	aDyAtma SUnyam iti manasikaroti, rUpam bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti,
   rūpam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti, yāvad rūpam	rUpam aDyAtma bahirDASUnyam iti manasikaroti, yAvat rUpam
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti manasikaroti, evam	aBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti manasikaroti, evam
   apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā	apagata sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH vedanA saMjQA saMskArA
   vijñānam adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti, bahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti,	vijQAnam aDyAtma SUnyam iti manasikaroti, bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti,
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti, yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti, yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti
   manasikaroti, apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tāṃ	manasikaroti, apagata sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH tAm
   cādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad	ca aDyAtma SUnyatAm bahirDA SUnyatAm aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAm yAvat 
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upalabhate tābhiś ca śūnyatābhir manyate	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAm upalaBate tABiH ca SUnyatABiH manyate
   upalambhayogena.	upalamBa yogena.
   cakṣur adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti, bahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti,	cakzuH aDyAtma SUnyam iti manasikaroti, bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti,
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti, yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti, yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti
   manasikaroti, tāś ca śūnyatā upalabhate tayā ca manyate upalambhayogena,	manasikaroti, tAH ca SUnyatA upalaBate tayA ca manyate upalamBa yogena,
   evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'dhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti,	evam Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH aDyAtma SUnyam iti manasikaroti,
   bahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti,	bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti, aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti,
   yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti manasikaroti, tāś ca śūnyatā upalabhate	yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti manasikaroti, tAH ca SUnyatA upalaBate
   tayā ca manyate upalambhayogena. evaṃ	tayA ca manyate upalamBa yogena. evam
   rūpaśabdhagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmeṣu karttavyaṃ, yāvac	rUpa SabDa ganDa rasa sprazwavya Darmezu karttavyan, yA avat 
   cakṣurvijñānaṃśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānaṃ, evaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ	cakzuH vijQAnaMSrotra GrANa jihvA kAya manaH vijQAnan, evam cakzuH saMsparSaH
   śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśaḥ, cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam	Srotra GrANa jihvA kAya manaH saMsparSaH, cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti, bahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti,	aDyAtma SUnyam iti manasikaroti, bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti,
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti, yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti, yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti
   manasikaroti, tāś ca śūnyatā upalabhate tayā ca manyate upalambhayogena.	manasikaroti, tAH ca SUnyatA upalaBate tayA ca manyate upalamBa yogena.
   evam avidyā yāvaj jarāmaraṇam adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti,	evam avidyA yAvat jarA maraNam aDyAtma SUnyam iti manasikaroti,
   bahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti,	bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti, aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti,
   yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti manasikaroti, tāś ca śūanyatā upalabhate,	yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti manasikaroti, tAH ca SUanyatA upalaBate,
   tebhir manyate upalambhayogena.	teBiH manyate upalamBa yogena.
   punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (PvsP1 2:	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm (PvsP1 2:
   14) carann apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ	14) caran apagata sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH
   smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati tāni ca smṛtyupasthānāni upalabhate taiś ca	smRti upasTAnAni BAvayati tAni ca smRti upasTAnAni upalaBate tEH ca
   manyate upalambhayogena, evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādānīndriyāṇi balāni	manyate upalamBa yogena, evam samyak prahANAni RdDipAdAni indriyANi balAni
   bodhyaṅgāni mārgān apramāṇāni dhyānāni ārūpyasamāpattīḥ, abhijñāḥ	boDi aFgAni mArgAn apramANAni DyAnAni ArUpya samApattIH, aBijQAH
   pratisaṃvido daśatathāgatabalāni vaiśāradyāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikān	pratisaMvidaH daSa taTAgata balAni vESAradyAni azwAdaSa AveNikAn

   upalambhayogena. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	upalamBa yogena. evam Kalu suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśala imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā	prajQApAramitAyAm caran anupAya kuSalaH imam prajQApAramitA nirdeSam SrutvA
   uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsam āpadyate.	uttrasyati saMtrasyati saMtrAsam Apadyate.
   subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pāpamitraparigṛhīto	suBUtiH Aha: kaTam Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH pApa mitra parigRhItaH 
   bhavati, yena pāpamitraparigraheṇemaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā	Bavati, yena pApa mitra parigraheNa imam prajQApAramitA nirdeSam SrutvA
   uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsam āpadyate?	uttrasyati saMtrasyati saMtrAsam Apadyate?
   bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yaḥ	BagavAn Aha: iha suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya yaH
   prajñāpāramitāyā vivecayati, dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyāḥ	prajQApAramitAyAH vivecayati, DyAna pAramitAyAH vIrya pAramitAyAH
   kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā vivecayati, nātra	kzAnti pAramitAyAH SIla pAramitAyAH dAna pAramitAyAH vivecayati, na atra
   śikṣitavyam iti naitat tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitam iti	Sikzitavyam iti na etat taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena BAzitam iti
   kavikṛtāny etāni kāvyāni naitāni śrotavyāni nodgrahītavyāni na	kavi kRtAni etAni kAvyAni na etAni SrotavyAni na udgrahItavyAni na
   paryavāptavyāni na dhārayitavyāni na vācayitavyāni na manasikartavyāni	paryavAptavyAni na DArayitavyAni na vAcayitavyAni na manasi kartavyAni
   nāpi parebhyo deśayitavyāni, idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	na api pareByaH deSayita vyAni, idam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.	pApa mitram veditavyam.
   punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ yo 'sya na	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pApa mitram yaH asya na
   mārakarmāṇy upadiśati, na māradoṣān ācaṣṭe, iti hi māraḥ pāpīyān	mAra karmANi upadiSati, na mAra dozAn Acazwe, iti hi mAraH pApIyAn
   buddhaveṣeṇa vivecayati bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam upasaṃkramyaivaṃ bravīti:	budDa vezeNa vivecayati boDisattvam mahAsattvam upasaMkramya evam bravIti:
   kiṃ te kulaputra prajñāpāramitayā bhāvitayā? kiṃ te dhyānapāramitayā	kim te kula putra prajQApAramitayA BAvitayA? kim te DyAna pAramitayA
   bhāvitayā? kiṃ te vīryapāramitayā bhāvitayā? kiṃ te kṣāntipāramitayā	BAvitayA? kim te vIrya pAramitayA BAvitayA? kim te kzAnti pAramitayA
   bhāvitayā? kiṃ te śīlapāramitayā bhāvitayā? kiṃ te dānapāramitayā	BAvitayA? kim te SIla pAramitayA BAvitayA? kim te dAna pAramitayA
   bhāvitayā? idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ	BAvitayA? idam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pApa mitram
   veditavyam.	veditavyam.
   punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇa	punar aparam suBUte mAraH pApIyAn budDa vezeNa
   śrāvakabhūmipratisaṃyuktāni sūtrāṇi geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānaṃ nidānam	SrAvaka BUmi pratisaMyuktAni sUtrANi geyam vyAkaraNam gATA udAnam nidAnam
   itivṛttakaṃ jātakāni vaipulyam adbhutadharmāvadānopadeśam upadekṣyati	iti vRttakam jAtakAni vEpulyam adButa Darma avadAna upadeSam upadekzyati
   prakāśayiṣyati vibhajiṣyati uttānīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati, imāny	prakASayizyati viBajizyati uttAnIkarizyati saMprakASayizyati, imAni 
   evaṃrūpāṇi (PvsP1 2: 15) mārakarmāṇi cākhyātāni nāvabodhayati, idam api	evaMrUpANi (Pu sP1 2: 15) mAra karmANi ca AKyAtAni na avaboDayati, idam api
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pApa mitram veditavyam.
   punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati;	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvam mahAsattvam upasaMkramya evam vakzyati;
   na te kulaputra kiṃcid bodhicittaṃ nāpi tvam avinivartanīyo nāpi tvaṃ	na te kula putra kiMcid boDi cittam na api tvam avinivartanIyaH na api tvam
   śakṣyasy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ, ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi	Sakzyasi anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDuM, yaH imAni evaMrUpANi
   mārakarmāṇy ākhyātāni nāvabodhayati, idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya	mAra karmANi AKyAtAni na avaboDayati, idam api suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.	mahAsattvasya pApa mitram veditavyam.
   punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati; cakṣuḥ kulaputra śūnyam ātmanā	budDa vezeNa upasaMkramya evam vakzyati; cakzuH kula putra SUnyam AtmanA
   cātmīyena ca, evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ śūnyam ātmanā	ca AtmIyena ca, evam Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH SUnyam AtmanA
   cātmīyena ca, rūpaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca, evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ	ca AtmIyena ca, rUpam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca, evam SabdaH ganDaH rasaH
   spraṣṭavyāni dharmāḥ śūnyā ātmanā cātmīyena ca, cakṣurvijñānaṃ śūnyam	sprazwavyAni DarmAH SUnyA AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca, cakzuH vijQAnam SUnyam
   ātmanā cātmīyena ca, evaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ	AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca, evam Srotra vijQAnam GrANa vijQAnam jihvA vijQAnam
   kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca, cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ	kAya vijQAnam manaH vijQAnam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca, cakzuH saMsparSaH
   śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo	SUnyaH AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca, evam Srotra saMsparSaH GrANa saMsparSaH 
   jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca,	jihvA saMsparSaH kAya saMsparSaH manaH saMsparSaH SUnyaH AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca,
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca, evaṃ	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca, evam
   śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam

   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca, dānapāramitā	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca, dAna pAramitA
   śūnyā ātmanā cātmīyena ca, evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā	SUnyA AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca, evam SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA
   dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā śūnyā ātmanā cātmīyena ca, smṛtyupasthānāni	DyAna pAramitA prajQApAramitA SUnyA AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca, smRti upasTAnAni
   śūnyāni ātmanā cātmīyena ca, evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāni	SUnyAni AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca, evam samyak prahANAni RdDipAdAH indriyAni
   balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgā yāvad āveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ śūnyā ātmanā	balAni boDi aFgAni mArgAH yAvat AveNikAH budDa DarmAH SUnyA AtmanA
   cātmīyenaca, kiṃ kariṣyasy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya ya	ca AtmIyena ca, kim karizyasi anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDya ya
   imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nācaṣṭe nopadiśati, idaṃ subhūte	imAni evaMrUpANi mAra karmANi na Acazwe na upadiSati, idam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pApa mitram veditavyam.
   punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ	punar aparam suBUte mAraH pApIyAn boDisattvam mahAsattvam
   pratyekabuddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati; śūnyā kulaputra pūrvā dig	pratyekabudDa vezeNa upasaMkramya evam vakzyati; SUnyA kula putra pUrvA diS 
   buddhair bhagavadbhir bodhisattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca nātra buddho na bodhir na	budDEH BagavadBiH boDisattvEH SrAvakEH ca na atra budDaH na boDiH na
   bodhisattvo na śrāvakaḥ, evaṃ samantād daśa diśaḥ śūnyā (PvsP1 2: 16)	boDisattvaH na SrAvakaH, evam samantAt daSa diSaH SUnyA (Pu sP1 2: 16)
   buddhair bhagavadbhir bodhisattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca nātra buddho na bodhir na	budDEH BagavadBiH boDisattvEH SrAvakEH ca na atra budDaH na boDiH na
   bodhisattvo na śrāvakaḥ, ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nopadekṣyanti,	boDisattvaH na SrAvakaH, yaH imAni evaMrUpANi mAra karmANi na upadekzyanti,
   imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitrāṇi veditavyāni.	imAni suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pApa mitrANi veditavyAni.
   punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ	punar aparam suBUte mAraH pApIyAn SramaNa vezeNa upasaMkramya boDisattvam
   mahāsattvaṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktebhyo manasikārebhyo vivekṣya	mahAsattvam sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyukteByaH manasikAreByaH vivekzya
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārair anuśāsiṣyati	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH anuSAsizyati
   avavadiṣyati, ya idam evaṃrūpaṃ mārakarma nopadekṣyati, idaṃ subhūte	avavadizyati, yaH idam evaMrUpam mAra karma na upadekzyati, idam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam.	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pApa mitram veditavyam.
   punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān upādhyāyācāryaveṣeṇopasaṃkramya	punar aparam suBUte mAraH pApIyAn upADyAya AcArya vezeNa upasaMkramya
   bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāyā vivecayiṣyati	boDisattvam mahAsattvam boDisattva caryAyAH vivecayizyati
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktebhyo manasikārebhyo vivecayiṣyati,	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyukteByaH manasikAreByaH vivecayizyati,
   smṛtyupasthāneṣu niyojayiṣyati samyakprahāṇeṣu ṛddhipādeṣu indriyeṣu	smRti upasTAnezu niyojayizyati samyak prahANezu RdDi pAdezu indriyezu
   baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣu mārge niyojayiṣyati śūnyatāyām ānimitte 'praṇihite	balezu boDi aFgezu mArge niyojayizyati SUnyatAyAm Animitte apraNihite
   niyojayiṣyati, imāny evaṃrūpān dharmān sākṣātkṛtvā śrāvakabhūmiṃ	niyojayizyati, imAni evaMrUpAn DarmAn sAkzAtkRtvA SrAvaka BUmim
   sākṣātkuruṣva, kiṃ te kariṣyaty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ ya imāny	sAkzAt kuruzva, kim te karizyati anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim ye imAni 
   evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nācaṣṭe nopadiśati, idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya	evaMrUpANi mAra karmANi na Acazwe na upadiSati, idam suBUte boDisattvasya

   (PvsP1 2: 25) asthisaṃjñā vidagdhakasaṃjñā, laukikāni catvāri dhyānāni	(Pu sP1 2: 25) asTi saMjQAH vidagDaka saMjQA, lOkikAni catvAri DyAnAni
   catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, laukikyaḥ pañcābhijñāḥ,	catvAri apramANAni catasraH ArUpya samApattayaH, lOkikyaH paQca aBijQAH,
   laukikyo daśānusmṛtayaḥ, yad uta buddhānusmṛtir dharmānusmṛtiḥ	lOkikyaH daSa anusmRtayaH, yat uta budDa anusmRtiH Darma anusmRtiH
   saṃghānusmṛtiḥ śīlānusmṛtiḥ tyāgānusmṛtir devatānusmṛtir ānāpānānusmṛtir	saMGa anusmRtiH SIla anusmRtiH tyAga anusmRtiH devatA anusmRtiH AnA pAna anusmRtiH 
   maraṇānusmṛtiḥ kāyagatānusmṛtir udvegānusmṛtiḥ, ima ucyante kuśalā	maraNa anusmRtiH kAya gata anusmRtiH udvega anusmRtiH, ime ucyante kuSalA
   laukikādharmāḥ	lOkika aDarmAH
   subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan laukikā akuśalā dharmāḥ?	suBUtiH Aha: katame Bagavan lOkikAH akuSalAH DarmAH?
   bhagavān āha: prāṇātipāto 'dattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāro mṛṣāvādaḥ paiśunyaṃ	BagavAn Aha: prANa atipAtaH adatta AdAnam kAma miTyA AcAraH mRzAvAdaH pESunyam
   pāruṣyaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpo 'bhidhyā vyāpādo mithyādarśanaṃ daśākuśalāḥ	pAruzyam saMBinna pralApaH aBiDyAH vyApAdaH miTyA darSanam daSA kuSalAH
   karmapathāḥ, krodhopanāhau mrakṣaḥ pradāśo vihiṃsā īrṣyā mātsaryaṃ māno	karma paTAH, kroDa upanAhO mrakzaH pradASaH vihiMsA IrzyA mAtsaryam mAnaH 
   mithyāmānaḥ, ima ucyante laukikā akuśalā dharmāḥ	miTyAmAnaH, ime ucyante lOkikAH akuSalAH DarmAH
   subhūtir āha: katame bhagavann avyākṛtā dharmāḥ?	suBUtiH Aha: katame Bagavan avyAkRtAH DarmAH?
   bhagavān āha: avyākṛtaṃ kāyakarma, avyākṛtaṃ vākkarma, avyākṛtaṃ	BagavAn Aha: avyAkRtam kAya karma, avyAkRtam vAkkarma, avyAkRtam
   manaḥkarma, avyākṛtāni catvāri mahābhūtāni, avyākṛtāni pañcendriyāṇi,	manaH karma, avyAkRtAni catvAri mahABUtAni, avyAkRtAni paQca indriyANi,
   avyākṛtāni ṣaḍ āyatanāni, avyākṛtāni arūpyāṇi skandhadhātvāyatanāni,	avyAkRtAni zaz AyatanAni, avyAkRtAni arUpyANi skanDa DAtu AyatanAni,
   avyākṛtā vipākāḥ, sarva ima ucyante avyākṛtādharmāḥ	avyAkRtAH vipAkAH, sarve ime ucyante avyAkRta aDarmAH
   subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan laukikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ?	suBUtiH Aha: katame Bagavan lOkikAH kuSalAH DarmAH?
   bhagavān āha: pañca skandhā dvādaśāyatanāny aṣṭādaśa dhātavo daśa kuśalāḥ	BagavAn Aha: paQca skanDAH dvAdaSa AyatanAni azwAdaSa DAtavaH daSa kuSalAH
   karmapathāś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ	karma paTAH catvAri DyAnAni catvAri apramANAni catasraH ArUpya samApattayaH
   pañcābhijñāḥ ye cānye laukikā dharmāḥ, ima ucyante laukikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ	paQca aBijQAH ye ca anye lOkikAH DarmAH, ime ucyante lOkikAH kuSalAH DarmAH

   śūnyatāvimokṣamukham ānimittavimokṣamukham apraṇihitavimokṣamukham,	SUnyatA vimokza muKam Animitta vimokza muKam apraNihita vimokza muKam,
   anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam ājñendriyam ājñātāvīndriyaṃ, savitarkaḥ	anAjQAtam AjQA asyAmi indriyam AjQa indriyam AjQAta avi indriyan, sa vitarkaH
   savicāraḥ samādhiḥ, avitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ, avitarko 'vicāraḥ	sa vicAraH samADiH, avitarkaH sa vicAraH samADiH, avitarkaH avicAraH
   samādhiḥ, vidyāvimuktiḥ smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ yoniśomanaskāraḥ, aṣṭau	samADiH, vidyA vimuktiH smRtiH saMprajanyam yoni Soma naskAraH, azwO
   vimokṣāḥ katame aṣṭau? rūpī rūpāṇi paśyati, (PvsP1 2: 26) ayaṃ prathamo	vimokzAH katame azwO? rUpI rUpANi paSyati, (PvsP1 2: 26) ayam praTamaH 
   vimokṣaḥ, adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati, ayaṃ dvitīyo	vimokzaH, aDyAtmam arUpa saMjQI bahirDA rUpANi paSyati, ayam dvitIyaH 
   vimokṣaḥ, śubhatāyām adhimukto bhavati, ayaṃ tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ, sarvaśo	vimokzaH, SuBa tAyAm aDimuktaH Bavati, ayam tRtIyaH vimokzaH, sarvaSas 
   rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt, pratighasaṃjñānām astaṅgamāt, nānātvasaṃjñānām	rUpa saMjQAnAm samatikramAt, pratiGa saMjQAnAm astaFga mAt, nAnAtva saMjQAnAm
   amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,	amanasikArAt anantam AkASam iti AkASAnantya Ayatanam upasaMpadya viharati,
   ayaṃ caturtho vimokṣaḥ, sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād anantaṃ	ayam caturTaH vimokzaH, sarvaSas AkASa AnantyAyatana samatikramAt anantam
   vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati, ayaṃ pañcamo	vijQAnam iti vijQAna Ananti Ayatanam upasaMpadya viharati, ayam paQcamaH

   ākiñcanyāyatanasamatikramāt, naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya	AkiQcanyAyatana samatikramAt, na eva saMjQAna asaMjQA Ayatanam upasaMpadya
   viharati, ayaṃ saptamo vimokṣaḥ, sarvaśo	viharati, ayam saptamaH vimokzaH, sarvaSas

   viharati, ayam aṣṭam vimokṣaḥ, ima aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ.	viharati, ayam azwam vimokzaH, ime azwO vimokzAH.
   navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ, catvāri dhyānāni, viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ	nava anupUrva vihAra samApattayaH, catvAri DyAnAni, viviktam kAmEH viviktam
   pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ	pApakEH akuSalEH DarmEH sa vitarkam sa vicAram viveka jam prIti suKam
   prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati, vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād	praTamam DyAnam upasaMpadya viharati, vitarka vicArANAm vyupaSamAt

   upekṣakaś ca viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan sukhañ ca kāyena	upekzakaH ca viharati smRtimAn saMprajAnan suKan ca kAyena

   tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati, sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca	tRtIyam DyAnam upasaMpadya viharati, suKasya ca prahANAt duHKasya ca
   prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṅgamād aduḥkhāsukham	prahANAt pUrvam eva sOmanasya dOrmanasyayoH astaFgamAt aduHKa asuKam
   upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati, sa sarvaśo	upekzA smRti pariSudDam caturTam DyAnam upasaMpadya viharati, sa sarvaSas

   amanasikārād anantam ākāśamiti ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati, sa	amanasikArAt anantam AkASam iti AkASAnantya Ayatanam upasaMpadya viharati, sa

   (PvsP1 2: 27)	(Pu sP1 2: 27)
   adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad	aDyAtma SUnyatA bahirDA SUnyatA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA yAvat

   subhūte mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratāṃ kārayiṣyati,	suBUte mahataH sattva rASeH mahataH sattva nikAyasya agra tAm kArayizyati,

   gotrabhūmir aṣṭamakabhūmiḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī arhan	gotra BUmiH azwamaka BUmiH srotaApannaH sakRdAgAmI anAgAmI arhan
   pratyekabuddhaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad avinivartanīya iti, ayaṃ	pratyekabudDaH praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya yAvat avinivartanIyaH iti, ayam

   kārayitavyāḥ.	kArayitavyAH.

   aparimite mayā saṃsāre sannāhaṃ sannahya sarvasvaparityāginā bhavitavyaṃ,	aparimite mayA saMsAre sanna aham sat nahya sarva sva parityAginA BavitavyaM,
   sarvasattvānām antike mayā samacittatā utpādayitavyā, sarvasattvā mayā	sarva sattvAnAm antike mayA sama citta tA utpAdayitavyA, sarva sattvAH mayA
   tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāpayitavyāḥ, sarvasattvān api mayā parinirvāpya na	triBiH yAnEH parinirvApayitavyAH, sarva sattvAn api mayA parinirvApya na
   kaścit sattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ? anutpādo mayā	kaScid sattvaH parinirvApitaH Bavati. tat kasya hetoH? anutpAdaH mayA
   sarvadharmāṇām avaboddhavyaḥ, avyavakīrṇena mayā sarvākārajñatācittena	sarva DarmANAm avabodDavyaH, avyavakIrNena mayA sarva AkAra jQa tA cittena
   ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritavyaṃ, sarvatrānugatāyāṃ	zawsu pAramitAsu caritavyan, sarvatra anugatAyAm
   sarvadharmaprativedhapariniṣpattyāṃ mayā śikṣitavyam, ekatayābhinirhāro	sarva Darma prativeDa parinizpattyAm mayA Sikzitavyam, ekatayA aBinirhAraH 
   mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratiboddhavyaḥ, yāvat pāramitābhinirhāraprativedhāya	mayA sarva DarmANAm pratibodDavyaH, yAvat pAramitA aBinirhAra prativeDAya
   mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ, saptatriṃśad	mayA sarva DarmANAm Sikzitavyan, saptatriMSat 
   bodhipakṣadharmābhinirhāraprativedhāya mayā dharmāṇāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,	boDi pakza Darma aBinirhAra prativeDAya mayA DarmANAm SikzitavyaM,
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyābhijñājñānābhinirhāraprativedhāya mayā dharmāṇāṃ	apramANa DyAna ArUpya aBijQA jQAna aBinirhAra prativeDAya mayA DarmANAm

   sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratāṃ (PvsP1 2: 29) kārayiṣyati, tac	sattva rASeH mahataH sattva nikAyasya agra tAm (PvsP1 2: 29) kArayizyati, tat 
   cānupalambhayogena.	ca anupalamBa yogena.

   vedanāṃ vedayanti, teṣām aham arthāya tāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayeyaṃ tatra	vedanAm vedayanti, tezAm aham arTAya tAm duHKAm vedanAm vedayeyam tatra

   nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhaveyur iti, etenopāyena sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśas	nirvANa DAtO parinirvRtA BaveyuH iti, etena upAyena sarva sattvAnAm kRta Sas

   anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya.	anAsravam aparyApannam prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya.
   subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra.	suBUtiH Aha: evam etat Ayuzman SAriputra.
   śāriputra āha: rūpam api subhūte anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām	SAriputraH Aha: rUpam api suBUte anAsravam aparyApannam prakRti SUnyatAm
   upādāya, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apy āyuṣman subhūte anāsravam	upAdAya, vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam api Ayuzman suBUte anAsravam
   aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya, nanv āyuṣman subhūte saptatriṃśad	aparyApannam prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya, nanu Ayuzman suBUte saptatriMSat 
   bodhipakṣā dharmā daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ	boDi pakzAH DarmAH daSa taTAgata balAni catvAri vESAradyAni catasraH
   pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anāsravā aparyāpannāḥ	pratisaMvidaH azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH anAsravAH aparyApannAH
   prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya.	prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya.
   subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra yathā vadasi bālapṛthagjanānām	suBUtiH Aha: evam etat Ayuzman SAriputra yaTA vadasi bAla pRTagjanAnAm
   api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām (PvsP1 2: 33) upādāya,	api cittam anAsravam aparyApannam prakRti SUnyatAm (Pu sP1 2: 33) upAdAya,
   yāvat sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhānām api cittam anāsravam	yAvat sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDa samyaksaMbudDAnAm api cittam anAsravam
   aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya, yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmā	aparyApannam prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya, yAvat saptatriMSat boDi pakzAH DarmA
   daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido	daSa taTAgata balAni catvAri vESAradyAni catasraH pratisaMvidaH 
   'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anāsravā aparyāpannāḥ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya.	azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH anAsravAH aparyApannAH prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya.
   śāriputra āha: yad api tad āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha, acittatvāt tatrāpi	SAriputraH Aha: yat api tat AyuzmAn suBUtiH evam Aha, acitta tvAt tatra api
   citte asakta iti, nanv āyuṣman subhūte 'rūpe 'pi rūpam asaktam avedanāyām	citte asaktaH iti, nanu Ayuzman suBUte arUpe api rUpam asaktam avedanAyAm
   api vedanā asaktāsaṃjñāyām api saṃjñā asaktāsaṃskāreṣv api saṃskārā	api vedanA asaktA saMjQAyAm api saMjQA asakta asaMskArezu api saMskArA
   asaktāvijñāne 'pi vijñānam asaktam.	asakta avijQAne api vijQAnam asaktam.
   subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra.	suBUtiH Aha: evam etat Ayuzman SAriputra.
   śāriputra āha: nanv āyuṣman subhūte 'smṛtyupasthāneṣv api smṛtyupasthānāny	SAriputraH Aha: nanu Ayuzman suBUte asmRti upasTAnezu api smRti upasTAnAni 
   asaktāni, evaṃ	asaktAni, evam
   samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgapāramitāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattyabhijñābalavaiśāradyāni	samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArga pAramitA pramANa DyAna ArUpya samApatti aBijQA bala vESAradyAni
   yāvad āveṇikabuddhadharmeṣv api āveṇikabuddhadharmā asaktāḥ.	yAvat AveNika budDa Darmezu api AveNika budDa DarmAH asaktAH.
   subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra yathā vadasi, rūpe 'py āyuṣman	suBUtiH Aha: evam etat Ayuzman SAriputra yaTA vadasi, rUpe api Ayuzman
   śāriputra rūpam asaktaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñāne 'pi vijñānam	SAriputra rUpam asaktam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAne api vijQAnam
   asaktam, evaṃ vyastasamastā api skandhadhātava āyatanāni satyāni	asaktam, evam vyasta samastAH api skanDa DAtavaH AyatanAni satyAni
   pratītyasamutpādo 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, pāramitā abhijñā	pratItyasamutpAdaH apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH, pAramitA aBijQA
   bodhipakṣā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ, āveṇikeṣu	boDi pakzAH DarmAH balAni vESAradyAni pratisaMvidaH, AveNikezu
   buddhadharmeṣv āveṇikā buddhadharmā asaktāḥ, evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra	budDa Darmezu AveNikAH budDa DarmAH asaktAH, evam hi Ayuzman SAriputra
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tenāpi bodhicittena	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran tena api boDi cittena
   asamasamacittena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair asādhāraṇacittena na manyate	asama sama cittena sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDEH asADAraNa cittena na manyate
   nābhiniviśate sarvadharmānupalambhayogena.	na aBiniviSate sarva Darma anupalamBa yogena.
   ity adhigamamahattvam	iti aDigama mahat tvam
   ity uktaḥ pratipattyuddeśaḥ	iti uktaH pratipatti uddeSaH
   pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āha: mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena	pUrNaH mEtrAyaNI putraH Aha: mama api Bagavan pratiBAti yena arTena
   bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti ucyate.
   bhagavān āha: pratibhātu te pūrṇa.	BagavAn Aha: pratiBAtu te pUrNa.
   pūrṇa āha: mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ sa bhagavan sattvo mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ	pUrNaH Aha: mahA sannAhasannadDaH sa Bagavan sattvaH mahAyAna saMprasTitaH
   sa sattvo mahāyānasamārūḍhaḥ sa sattvas tena bhagavan bodhisattvo	sa sattvaH mahAyAna samArUXaH sa sattvaH tena Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattva ity ucyate.	mahAsattvaH iti ucyate.
   (PvsP1 2: 34)	(Pu sP1 2: 34)
   śāriputra āha: kiyatā ayuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahasattvo	SAriputraH Aha: kiyatA ayuzman pUrNa boDisattvaH mahasattvaH 
   mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate?	mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti ucyate?
   pūrṇa āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na prādeśikānāṃ	pUrNaH Aha: iha Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na prAdeSikAnAm
   sattvānāṃ kṛtena bodhāya caran dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānaṃ dadāti, api	sattvAnAm kRtena boDAya caran dAna pAramitAyAm sTitvA dAnam dadAti, api
   tu sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānaṃ dadāti, evaṃ	tu sarva sattvAnAm kRtena dAna pAramitAyAm sTitvA dAnam dadAti, evam
   śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na	SIla pAramitAyAm kzAnti pAramitAyAm vIrya pAramitAyAm DyAna pAramitAyAm na
   prādeśikānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtena bodhāya caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā	prAdeSikAnAm sattvAnAm kRtena boDAya caran prajQApAramitAyAm sTitvA
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati, api tu sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	prajQApAramitAm BAvayati, api tu sarva sattvAnAm kRtena prajQApAramitAyAm
   sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati, na sattvaparicchedena bodhisattvo	sTitvA prajQApAramitAm BAvayati, na sattva paricCedena boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo mahāsannāhaṃ saṃnahyate, iyataḥ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmi,	mahAsattvaH mahAsanna aham saMnahyate, iyataH sattvAn parinirvApayizyAmi,
   iyataḥ sattvān na parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti, iyataḥ sattvān bodhāya	iyataH sattvAt na parinirvApayizyAmi iti, iyataH sattvAn boDAya
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi, iyataḥ sattvān bodhāya na pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, api tu	pratizWApayizyAmi, iyataH sattvAn boDAya na pratizWApayizyAmi iti, api tu
   khalu punaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena sannāhaṃ saṃnahyate, evaṃ cāsya bhavati,	Kalu punar sarva sattvAnAm kRtena sanna aham saMnahyate, evam ca asya Bavati,
   ātmanā ca dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi sarvasattvāṃś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ	AtmanA ca dAna pAramitAm paripUrayizyAmi sarva sattvAn ca dAna pAramitAyAm
   niyojayiṣyāmīti, evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ	niyojayizyAmi iti, evam SIla pAramitAyAm kzAnti pAramitAyAm vIrya pAramitAyAm
   dhyānapāramitāyāṃ, ātmanā ca prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi,	DyAna pAramitAyAn AtmanA ca prajQApAramitAm paripUrayizyAmi,
   sarvasattvāṃś ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ niyojayiṣyāmīti, evam	sarva sattvAn ca prajQApAramitAyAm niyojayizyAmi iti, evam
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ, ātmanā ca bhāvayiṣyāmi sarvasattvāṃś ca	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattIH, AtmanA ca BAvayizyAmi sarva sattvAn ca
   tāsu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu	tAsu pratizWApayizyAmi iti, yAvat saptatriMSat boDi pakzezu Darmezu
   daśabalavaiśāradyāṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv ātmanā ca sthāsyāmi	daSa bala vESAradya azwAdaSa AveNikezu budDa Darmezu AtmanA ca sTAsyAmi
   sarvasattvāṃś ca teṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti, iyatāyuṣman śāriputra	sarva sattvAn ca tezu pratizWApayizyAmi iti, iyatA Ayuzman SAriputra
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti ucyate.
   iti pratipattisvarūpam	iti pratipatti svarUpam
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm
   carato dānaṃ dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yāvad	carataH dAnam dadataH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH yAvat 
   dānasya sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye niryātanā,	dAnasya sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye niryAtanA,
   ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadato	ayam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH dAnam dadataH 
   dānapāramitāsannāhaḥ.	dAna pAramitA AsannAhaH.
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm

   śrāvakapratyekabuddhamanasikārāṇāṃ parivarjanatā, ayaṃ bodhisattvasya	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa manasikArANAm parivarjana tA, ayam boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ (PvsP1 2: 35) dadataḥ	mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH dAnam (PvsP1 2: 35) dadataH
   śīlapāramitāsannāhaḥ.	SIla pAramitA AsannAhaH.
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm
   carato dānaṃ dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yā teṣāṃ	carataH dAnam dadataH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH yA tezAm
   kṣamaṇā rocanā vyupaparīkṣaṇā, ayam ucyate bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	kzamaNA rocanA vyupaparIkzaNA, ayam ucyate boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato kṣāntipāramitāsannāhaḥ.	prajQApAramitAyAm carataH kzAnti pAramitA AsannAhaH.
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAn

   samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati, ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati, ayam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya

   manasikāraiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittasyānavakāśaṃ dānatā tat kuśalamūlaṃ	manasikArEH SrAvaka pratyekabudDa cittasya anavakASam dAna tA tat kuSala mUlam
   sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,	sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati,
   ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadato	ayam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH dAnam dadataH

   māyākṛtasaṃjñopasthitā naiva dāyakam upalabhate na pratigrāhakaṃ na deyaṃ,	mAyA kRta saMjQA upasTitA na eva dAyakam upalaBate na pratigrAhakam na deyaM,

   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena tāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā na nimittīkaroti	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena tAH zaw pAramitA na nimittIkaroti
   nopalabhate.	na upalaBate.

   śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā.	SIla pAramitAyAm carataH dAna pAramitA.

   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā.	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya SIla pAramitAyAm carataH SIla pAramitA.

   chrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktānāṃ cittotpādānām anavakāśadānaṃ tasya	CrAvaka pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktAnAm citta utpAdAnAm anavakASa dAnam tasya

   śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato dhyānapāramitā.	SIla pAramitAyAm carataH DyAna pAramitA.
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya SIla pAramitAyAm
   carataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ sarvadharmeṣu	carataH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH sarva Darmezu
   māyākṛtasaṃjñāpratyupasthitā bhavati, tac ca śīlaṃ na manyate nopalabhate,	mAyA kRta saMjQA pratyupasTitA Bavati, tat ca SIlam na manyate na upalaBate,
   iyam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitayāṃ	iyam Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya SIla pAramitayAm
   carataḥ prajñāpāramitā.	carataH prajQApAramitA.
   evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ	evam hi SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH SIla pAramitAyAm caran zax 
   pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti, tena mahāsannāhasannaddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.	pAramitAH parigRhNAti, tena mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti saMKyAm gacCati.
   iti śīlapāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ dvitīyam	iti SIla pAramitA sannAha zawkam dvitIyam
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH kzAnti pAramitAyAm caran
   dānaṃ dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na	dAnam dadAti sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH na
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH tat ca kuSala mUlam
   sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,	sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati,
   (PvsP1 2: 37) iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carato	(Pu sP1 2: 37) iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kzAnti pAramitAyAm carataH 
   dānapāramitā, evaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā	dAna pAramitA, evam kzAnti pAramitAyAm carataH SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA
   vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.	vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA.
   punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ	punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH kzAnti pAramitAyAm
   caran sarvabuddhadharmasamudānayanatāyai sarvasattvaparipākāya ca	caran sarva budDa Darma samudAna yana tAyE sarva sattva paripAkAya ca
   prayujyate prajñayā sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na	prayujyate prajQayA sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH na
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac cakuśalamūlaṃ	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH tat cakuSala mUlam
   sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,	sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati,
   iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carataḥ	iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kzAnti pAramitAyAm carataH
   prajñāpāramitā.	prajQApAramitA.
   evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ	evam hi SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH kzAnti pAramitAyAm caran zax 
   pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti, tena mahāsannāhasannaddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.	pAramitAH parigRhNAti, tena mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti saMKyAm gacCati.
   iti kṣāntipāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ tṛtīyam	iti kzAnti pAramitA sannAha zawkam tRtIyam
   punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ	punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH vIrya pAramitAyAm
   caran dānaṃ dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na	caran dAnam dadAti sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH na
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH tat ca kuSala mUlam
   sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,	sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati,
   iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā,	iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya vIrya pAramitAyAm carataH dAna pAramitA,
   evaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā	evam vIrya pAramitAyAm carataH SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA
   dhyānapāramitā.	DyAna pAramitA.
   punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ	punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH vIrya pAramitAyAm
   caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan sarvadharmeṣu māyākṛtasaṃjñām	caran prajQApAramitAm BAvayan sarva Darmezu mAyA kRta saMjQAm
   upasthāpayati, sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na	upasTApayati, sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH na
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kusalamūlaṃ	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH tat ca kusala mUlam
   sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,	sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati,
   iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā.	iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya vIrya pAramitAyAm carataH prajQApAramitA.
   evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ	evam hi SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH vIrya pAramitAyAm caran zax 
   pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti, tena mahāsannāhasannaddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.	pAramitAH parigRhNAti, tena mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti saMKyAm gacCati.
   iti vīryapāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ caturtham	iti vIrya pAramitA sannAha zawkam caturTam
   punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ	punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH DyAna pAramitAyAm
   (PvsP1 2: 38) caran dānaṃ dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair	(Pu sP1 2: 38) caran dAnam dadAti sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH 
   manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca	manasikArEH na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH tat ca
   kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye	kuSala mUlam sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye
   pariṇāmayati, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carato	pariNAmayati, iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya DyAna pAramitAyAm carataH 
   dānapāramitā, evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā	dAna pAramitA, evam DyAna pAramitAyAm carataH SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA
   vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.	vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA.
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH DyAna pAramitAyAm caran
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan sarvadharmeṣu māyākṛtasaṃjñām upasthāpayati,	prajQApAramitAm BAvayan sarva Darmezu mAyA kRta saMjQAm upasTApayati,
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH na

   sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,	sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati,

   prajñāpāramitā.	prajQApAramitA.
   evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ	evam hi SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH DyAna pAramitAyAm caran zax 
   pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti, tena mahāsannāhasannaddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.	pAramitAH parigRhNAti, tena mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti saMKyAm gacCati.
   iti dhyānapāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ pañcamam	iti DyAna pAramitA sannAha zawkam paQcamam
   punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   caraṃs trimaṇḍalapariśuddhaṃ dānaṃ dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair	caran tri maNxala pariSudDam dAnam dadAti sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH 
   manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca	manasikArEH na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH tat ca
   kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye	kuSala mUlam sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye
   pariṇāmayati, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato	pariNAmayati, iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH

   vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.	vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA.
   punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati, tasya sarvapāramitāsu sarvadharmeṣu ca	caran prajQApAramitAm BAvayati, tasya sarva pAramitAsu sarva Darmezu ca
   māyāsvapnapratibhāsapratiśrutkāpratibimbanirmāṇasaṃjñā pratyupasthitā	mAyA svapna pratiBAsa pratiSrutka apratibimba nirmANa saMjQA pratyupasTitA
   bhavati sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na	Bavati sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH na

   sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,	sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati,
   evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran	evam hi SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran
   prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati, yad āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo	prajQApAramitAm paripUrayati, yat Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittenaitāḥ ṣaṭ (PvsP1 2: 39)	mahAsattvaH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena etAH zaw (PvsP1 2: 39)
   pāramitā na nimittīkaroti nopalabhate.	pAramitA na nimittIkaroti na upalaBate.
   evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran	evam hi Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran
   mahāsannāhasannaddho bhavati, evaṃ ca punar āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo	mahAsannAhasat nadDaH Bavati, evam ca punar Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattva ekaikasyāṃ pāramitāyāṃ sthitvā ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati.	mahAsattvaH ekEkasyAm pAramitAyAm sTitvA zax pAramitAH paripUrayati.
   iti prajñāpāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ ṣaṣṭham	iti prajQApAramitA sannAha zawkam zazWam
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate na	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH DyAnAni ca samApadyate na
   ca dhyānāny āsvādayati na ca taiḥ saṃhriyate na ca teṣāṃ vaśenopapadyate,	ca DyAnAni AsvAdayati na ca tEH saMhriyate na ca tezAm vaSena upapadyate,
   evam apramāṇāni cārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate na ca tā āsvādayati na ca	evam apramANAni ca ArUpya samApattIH ca samApadyate na ca tAH AsvAdayati na ca
   tābhiḥ saṃhriyate na ca tāsāṃ vaśenopapadyate, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya	tABiH saMhriyate na ca tAsAm vaSena upapadyate, iyam boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalagatā prajñāpāramitā veditavyā.	mahAsattvasya upAya kOSala gatA prajQApAramitA veditavyA.
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH DyAna ArUpya samApattizu
   vivekadarśanena ca viharati śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitadarśanena ca viharati	viveka darSanena ca viharati SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita darSanena ca viharati
   na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti, ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	na ca BUtakowim sAkzAtkaroti, ayam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakauśalasannāhaḥ.	prajQApAramitAyAm carataH upAya kOSala sannAhaH.
   evam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddhas	evam Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAsannAha sannadDas
   tenocyate bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti, evaṃ mahāsannāhasannaddhasyāyuṣman	tena ucyate boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti, evam mahA sannAha sannadDasya Ayuzman
   śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanta	SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya daSasu dikzu budDAH Bagavanta
   udānam udānayanti varṇam udīrayanti nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānās tasya	udAnam udAnayanti varNam udIrayanti nAmaDeyam parikIrtayamAnAH tasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śabdam anuśrāvayanti ghoṣam udīrayanti,	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya Sabdam anuSrAvayanti Gozam udIrayanti,
   amuṣmin lokadhātuprasare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha iti	amuzmin lokaDAtu prasare boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti
   sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.	sattvAn ca paripAcayati budDa kzetram ca pariSoDayati.
   iti sannāhaṣaṭkopasaṃhāraḥ	iti sat nAha zawkopa saMhAraH
   ity uktā sannāhapratipattiḥ	iti uktA sannAha pratipattiH
   śāriputra āha: kiyat āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	SAriputraH Aha: kiyat Ayuzman pUrNa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati?	mahAyAna saMprasTitaH mahAyAna samArUXaH Bavati?
   pūrṇa āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ	pUrNaH Aha: iha Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH dAna pAramitAyAm
   caran viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ	caran viviktam kAmEH viviktam pApakEH akuSalEH DarmEH
   savitarkasavicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam (PvsP1 2: 40)	sa vitarka sa vicAram viveka jam prIti suKam praTamam DyAnam (PvsP1 2: 40)
   upasaṃpadya viharati, evaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ, evam	upasaMpadya viharati, evam dvitIyam tRtIyam caturTam DyAnan, evam
   ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ	AkASAnantya Ayatanam vijQAna Ananti Ayatanam AkiQcani Ayatanam
   naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati, imāni bodhisattvasya	na eva saMjQAna asaMjQA Ayatanam upasaMpadya viharati, imAni boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya dhyānārūpyāṇi yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva etaiś ca dhyānair	mahAsattvasya DyAna ArUpyANi yadA boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH etEH ca DyAnEH 
   etaiś cārūpyair dānapāramitāyāṃ carann ākāśākāraliṅganimittaiḥ	etEH ca ArUpyEH dAna pAramitAyAm caran AkASa AkAra liFga nimittEH
   samāpadyamāno vyuttiṣṭhamānaś ca tāni ca kuśalamūlāni	samApadyamAnaH vyuttizWamAnaH ca tAni ca kuSala mUlAni
   sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,	sarva sattva sADAraNAni kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati,
   iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā, evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ	iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya dAna pAramitA, evam SIla pAramitAyAm
   kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vācyam.	kzAnti pAramitAyAm vIrya pAramitAyAm DyAna pAramitAyAm vAcyam.
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃś	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caraMS
   catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyate catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate, yadā	catvAri DyAnAni samApadyate catasraH ArUpya samApattIH samApadyate, yadA
   bodhisattvo mahāsattva etaiś ca dhyānair etābhiś cārūpyasamāpattibhir	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH etEH ca DyAnEH etABiH ca ArUpya samApattiBiH 
   viharati, sa etā dhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyamāno vyuttiṣṭhamānaś	viharati, saH etAH DyAna ArUpya samApattIH samApadyamAnaH vyuttizWamAnaH 
   cākāśākāraliṅganimittāni manasikaroti, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tāni ca	ca AkASa AkAra liFga nimittAni manasikaroti, prajQApAramitAyAm caran tAni ca
   kuśalamūlāny anyāni ca sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ	kuSala mUlAni anyAni ca sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH
   sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,	sarva sattva sADAraNAni kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati,
   iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā.	iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitA.
   evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāsu caran	evam hi Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH zaw pAramitAsu caran
   mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca	mahA sannAhasannadDaH sattvAn ca paripAcayati budDa kzetram ca

   sarvasattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti cittam utpādayati, iyaṃ	sarva sattvAnAm Darmam deSayizyAmi iti cittam utpAdayati, iyam

   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAyAna samArUXaH iti ucyate.

   bhāvanāvibhāvanārthena tac cānupalambhayogena. evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra	BAvanA viBAvana arTena tat ca anupalamBa yogena. evam hi Ayuzman SAriputra
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAyAna samArUXaH iti ucyate.

   upādāya, evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta mano	upAdAya, evam Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH nAma mAtram idam yat uta manaH

   sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetreṇa ca buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,	sattvAn ca paripAcayati budDa kzetreNa ca budDa kzetram saMkrAmati,

   nairayikabhavane ca tam agniskandhaṃ nirvāpya nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ	nErayika Bavane ca tam agni skanDam nirvApya nErayikAnAm sattvAnAm

   vastrayānagandhamālyapuṣpadhūpavilepanacūrṇapariṣkāraṃ	vastra yAna ganDa mAlya puzpa DUpa vilepana cUrNa parizkAram

   yāvad anyatarānyataraṃ pariṣkāraṃ dadāti, so 'nnam annārthikebhyo datvā	yAvat anyatara anyataram parizkAram dadAti, saH annam anna arTikeByaH datvA
   yāvad anyatarānyataraṃ pariṣkāraṃ datvā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,	yAvat anyatara anyataram parizkAram datvA tezAm sattvAnAm Darmam deSayati,
   yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam, te khalu punaḥ sattvās tāṃ	yat uta imam eva zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktam, te Kalu punar sattvAH tAm
   dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā na jātu tābhiḥ pāramitābhir virahitā bhavanti yavād	Darma deSanAm SrutvA na jAtu tABiH pAramitABiH virahitAH Bavanti yavAt 
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyante. evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.	mahAsattvaH mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti ucyate.
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte dakzaH mAyA kAraH mAyAkAra antevAsI vA catur mahApaTe
   sthitvā mahato janakāyasya purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmimīte nirmāya	sTitvA mahataH jana kAyasya puratas mahAntam jana kAyam aBinirmimIte nirmAya
   annam annārthikebhyo dadyād anyatarānyataraṃ pariṣkāran tad arthikebhyo	annam anna arTikeByaH dadyAt anyatara anyataram parizkAran tat arTikeByaH 
   dadyāt. tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu tena māyākāreṇa māyākārāntevāsinā	dadyAt. tat kim manyase? suBUte api nu tena mAyAkAreNa mAyA kAra antevAsinA
   vā kasmaicit kiñcid dattaṃ bhavet.	vA kasmEcid kiQcid dattam Bavet .
   subhūtir āha: no bhagavan.	suBUtiH Aha: naH Bagavan .
   bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāvac	BagavAn Aha: evam eva suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena yA avat 
   cakravartivyūham abhinirmāya annam annārthikebhyo dadatā yāvad	cakravarti vyUham aBinirmAya annam anna arTikeByaH dadatA yAvat 
   anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān pariṣkārān dadatā na kasmaicit sattvāya yāvad	anyatara anyatarAn mAnuzyakAn parizkArAn dadatA na kasmEcid sattvAya yAvat 
   anyatarānyatarā mānuṣyakāḥ pariṣkārā dattā bhavanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?	anyatara anyatarAH mAnuzyakAH parizkArAH dattAH Bavanti. tat kasya hetoH?
   dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte	DarmatA ezA suBUte DarmANAm mAyA Darma tAm upAdAya. evam hi suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti ucyate.
   iti dānasaṃbhāraḥ	iti dAna saMBAraH
   punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH SIla pAramitAyAm sTitvA
   saṃcintyopapattiparigraheṇa cakravartikule pratyājāyate, sa tatra	saMcintya upapatti parigraheNa cakravarti kule pratyAjAyate, sa tatra
   (PvsP1 2: 49) sthitvā sattvān daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,	(Pu sP1 2: 49) sTitvA sattvAn daSa kuSalezu karma paTezu pratizWApayati,
   caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu	caturzu DyAnezu caturzu apramANezu catasRzu ArUpya samApattizu
   pratiṣṭhāpayati, saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati, yāvad	pratizWApayati, saptatriMSat boDi pakzezu Darmezu pratizWApayati, yAvat 
   aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati, te ca sattvā na jātu	azwAdaSasu AveNikezu budDa Darmezu pratizWApayati, te ca sattvAH na jAtu
   virahitā bhavanti tayā dharmadeśanayā, yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim	virahitAH Bavanti tayA Darma deSanayA, yAvat anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim
   abhisaṃbudhyante.	aBisaMbuDyante.
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte dakzaH mAyA kAraH mAyAkAra antevAsI vA catur mahApaTe
   mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ nirmāya daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet, yāvad	mahAntam jana kAyam nirmAya daSa kuSalezu karma paTezu pratizWApayet, yAvat 
   aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet, tena tāvataḥ sattvān yāvad	azwAdaSa AveNikezu budDa Darmezu pratizWApayet, tena tAvataH sattvAn yAvat 
   buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvo yāvad buddhadharmeṣu	budDa Darmezu pratizWApya na kaScid sattvaH yAvat budDa Darmezu
   pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati, evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs	pratizWApitaH Bavati, evam eva suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena tAn=

   mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya, evaṃ sannāhaṃ sannahyate, sacen	mahAsattvaH praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya, evam sat na aham sat nahyate, saced 
   mama sarvasattvā daṇḍaloṣṭamuṣṭiśastraprahāran dadyus tatra mayā ekam api	mama sarva sattvAH daNxa lozwa muzwi Sastra prahAran dadyuH tatra mayA ekam api
   kṣobhacittaṃ notpādayitavyaṃ sarvasattvāś caivaṃrūpāyāṃ kṣāntau	kzoBa cittam na utpAdayitavyam sarva sattvAH ca evaMrUpAyAm kzAntO
   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti.	pratizWApayitavyA iti.

   loṣṭair muṣṭibhiḥ śastrair vā prahāraṃ dadyuḥ, sa ca teṣu ekam api	lozwEH muzwiBiH SastrEH vA prahAram dadyuH, sa ca tezu ekam api

   kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	kzAnti pAramitAyAm vIrya pAramitAyAm DyAna pAramitAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm
   samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati, dharmaṃ ca (PvsP1 2: 52)	samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati, Darmam ca (PvsP1 2: 52)
   deśayati, yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam, te ca taṃ śrutvā na	deSayati, yat uta imam eva zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktam, te ca tam SrutvA na
   jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad anuttarāṃ	jAtu BUyas virahitAH Bavanti zaxBiH pAramitABiH yAvat anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti, evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH iti, evam dakziNasyAm paScimAyAm uttarasyAm
   uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adha	uttara pUrvasyAm pUrva dakziNasyAm dakziNa paScimAyAm paScima uttarasyAm aDa
   ūrdhvadiśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvās tān sarvān	UrDva diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu yAvantaH sattvAH tAn sarvAn
   yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	yaTA eva AtmanA dAna pAramitAyAm sTitaH taTA dAna pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati, evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ	niveSayati pratizWApayati, evam SIla pAramitAyAm kzAnti pAramitAyAm
   vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	vIrya pAramitAyAm DyAna pAramitAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati, dharmaṃ ca deśayati, yad uta imam eva	niveSayati pratizWApayati, Darmam ca deSayati, yat uta imam eva
   ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ, te ca taṃ śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā	zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktan, te ca tam SrutvA na jAtu BUyas virahitA
   bhavanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim	Bavanti zaxBiH pAramitABiH yAvat anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim
   abhisaṃbuddhā iti.	aBisaMbudDAH iti.
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte dakzaH mAyA kAraH mAyAkAra antevAsI vA catur mahApaTe
   mahato janakāyasya purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu	mahataH jana kAyasya puratas mahAntam jana kAyam aBinirmAya zawsu pAramitAsu
   samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati. tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu	samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati. tat kim manyase? suBUte api nu
   tena māyākāreṇa māyākārāntevāsinā vā kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu	tena mAyAkAreNa mAyA kAra antevAsinA vA kaScid sattvaH zawsu pAramitAsu
   samādāpito bhavati, niveśito vā pratiṣṭhāpito vā bhavet.	samAdApitaH Bavati, niveSitaH vA pratizWApitaH vA Bavet .
   subhūtir āha: no bhagavan.	suBUtiH Aha: naH Bagavan .

   sattvān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu	sattvAn zawsu pAramitAsu pratizWApya na kaScid sattvaH zawsu pAramitAsu
   pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ	pratizWApitaH Bavati. tat kasya hetoH? Darma tA ezA suBUte DarmANAm
   māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	mAyA Darma tAm upAdAya. evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.	mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti ucyate.

   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena viharan nānyeṣāṃ cittotpādānām	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena viharan na anyezAm citta utpAdAnAm
   avakāśaṃ dadāti, iyanto mayā sattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā	avakASam dadAti, iyantaH mayA sattvAH dAna pAramitAyAm pratizWApayitavyA
   iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti, evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ	iyantaH na pratizWApayitavyA iti, evam SIla pAramitAyAm kzAnti pAramitAyAm
   vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyām iyanto mayā sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	vIrya pAramitAyAm DyAna pAramitAyAm iyantaH mayA sattvAH prajQApAramitAyAm
   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti, iyantaḥ sattvāḥ	pratizWApayitavyAH iyantaH na pratizWApayitavyAH iti, iyantaH sattvAH
   saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na	saptatriMSat boDi pakzyezu Darmezu pratizWApayitavyAH iyantaH na
   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā, yāvad iyantaḥ sattvā aṣṭādaśasv (PvsP1 2: 53)	pratizWApayitavyA, yAvat iyantaH sattvAH azwAdaSasu (Pu sP1 2: 53)
   āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā	AveNikezu budDa Darmezu pratizWApayitavyAH iyantaH na pratizWApayitavyA

   arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyantaḥ sattvāḥ	arhat tve pratizWApayitavyAH iyantaH na pratizWApayitavyAH iyantaH sattvAH
   pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyantaḥ	pratyekabudDa tve pratizWApayitavyAH iyantaH na pratizWApayitavyAH iyantaH
   sattvāḥ sarvajñatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti.	sattvAH sarvajQa tve pratizWApayitavyAH iyantaH na pratizWApayitavyA iti.
   api tu khalu punar asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu	api tu Kalu punar asaMKyeyAH sattvAH aprameyAH sattvAH zawsu pAramitAsu
   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ, evaṃ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu daśasu	pratizWApayitavyAH, evam saptatriMSat boDi pakzezu Darmezu daSasu

   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ.	pratizWApayitavyAH.
   iti śamathasaṃbhāraḥ	iti SamaTa saMBAraH
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte dakzaH mAyA kAraH mAyAkAra antevAsI vA catur mahApaTe

   pratiṣṭhāpayet, yāvat sarvākāravaropete sarvajñajñāne pratiṣṭhāpayed evam	pratizWApayet, yAvat sarva AkAra vara upete sarvajQa jQAne pratizWApayet evam
   eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān asaṃkhyeyān	eva suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena tAn tAvataH sattvAn asaMKyeyAn

   pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ yad	pratizWApitaH Bavati. tat kasya hetoH? Darma tA ezA suBUte DarmANAm yat

   subhūtir āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi tathā	suBUtiH Aha: yaTA aham Bagavan BagavataH BAzitasya arTam AjAnAmi taTA
   asannāhasannaddho batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ	asat nAha sat nadDaH bata ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH veditavyaH
   svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ	sva lakzaNa SUnyatAm upAdAya. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi Bagavan rUpam
   rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ, cakṣuś	rUpeNa SUnyan, vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam vijQAnena SUnyaM, cakzuH 
   cakṣuṣā śūnyam, evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano manasā śūnyam, rūpaṃ	cakzuzA SUnyam, evam Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH manasA SUnyam, rUpam
   rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ, evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,	rUpeNa SUnyan, evam SabdaH ganDaH rasaH sprazwavyam DarmAH DarmEH SUnyAH,

   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo	cakzuH saMsparSaH cakzuH saMsparSena SUnyaH, evam Srotra saMsparSaH

   śūnyā, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā, yāvad	SUnyA, aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatayA SUnyA, yAvat

   daśatathāgatabalāni daśabhis tathāgatabalaiḥ śūnyāni, vaiśāradyāni	daSa taTAgata balAni daSaBiH taTAgata balEH SUnyAni, vESAradyAni

   bhagavan paryāyeṇa asannāhasannaddho bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ.	Bagavan paryAyeNa asannAhasat nadDaH boDisattvaH veditavyaH.

   yathā vadasi. tat kasya hetoḥ? akṛtā hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā avikṛtā	yaTA vadasi. tat kasya hetoH? akRtA hi suBUte sarva AkAra jQa tA avikRtA

   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsannāhaḥ sannaddhaḥ.	boDisattvena mahAsattvena mahAsanna ahaH sannadDaH.

   nābhisaṃskaroti.	nABi saMskaroti.

   kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā sarva ete na vidyante nopalabhyante.	kasya hetoH? taTA hi atyanta tayA sarve ete na vidyante na upalaByante.

   na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na	na pozaH na puruzaH na pudgalaH na manujaH na mAnavaH na kArakaH na vedakaH na

   anupalambhayogena. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā.	anupalamBa yogena. iyam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya dAna pAramitA.

   bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	BagavAn Aha: iha suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ, ātmanā ca daśa kuśalān	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH citta utpAdEH, AtmanA ca daSa kuSalAn
   karmapathān samādāya vartate, parāṃś ca daśa kuśale karmapathe	karma paTAn samAdAya vartate, parAn ca daSa kuSale karma paTe
   samādāpayaty anupalambhayogena. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	samAdApayati anupalamBa yogena. iyam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   aparāmṛṣṭā śīlapāramitā.	aparAmRzwA SIla pAramitA.
   subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā?	suBUtiH Aha: katamA Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kzAnti pAramitA?
   bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	BagavAn Aha: iha suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH

   bhavati, parāṃś ca kṣāntau samādāpayaty anupalambhayogena. iyaṃ subhūte	Bavati, parAn ca kzAntO samAdApayati anupalamBa yogena. iyam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā.	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kzAnti pAramitA.

   anikṣiptadhuro viharati, parāṃś ca tāsu pañcasu pāramitāsu samādāpayaty	anikzipta DuraH viharati, parAn ca tAsu paQcasu pAramitAsu samAdApayati

   (PvsP1 2: 60) na ca teṣāṃ vaśenopapadyate, parāṃś ca dhyāneṣu samādāpayaty	(Pu sP1 2: 60) na ca tezAm vaSena upapadyate, parAn ca DyAnezu samAdApayati
