   subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā?	suBUtiH Aha: katamA Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitA?
   bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	BagavAn Aha: iha suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena sarvadharmān nābhiniviśate,	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena sarva DarmAt na aBi niviSate,
   sarvadharmāṇāṃ ca prakṛtiṃ pratyavekṣate, sarvadharmaprakṛtipratyavekṣāyāṃ	sarva DarmANAm ca prakRtim pratyavekzate, sarva Darma prakRti pratyavekzAyAm

   idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.	idam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam.
   ity upāyakauśalasaṃbhāraḥ	iti upAya kOSala saMBAraH
   punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat 
   utādhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā	uta aDyAtma SUnyatA bahirDA SUnyatA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA SUnyatA SUnyatA

   parabhāvaśūnyatā.	para BAva SUnyatA.
   tatra katamā adhyātmaśūnyatā? adhyātmikā dharmā ucyante cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ	tatra katamAH aDyAtma SUnyatA? aDyAtmikAH DarmAH ucyante cakzuH Srotram
   ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ, tatra cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām	GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH, tatra cakzuH cakzuzA SUnyam akUwa sTA vinASitAm

   akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyā eṣā, iyam	akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya. tat kasya hetoH? prakRtiH asyAH ezA, iyam

   saṃskārā vijñānaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo	saMskArAH vijQAnam cakzuH Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH 
   manorūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmā cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ	manaH rUpa Sabda ganDa rasa sprazwavya DarmA cakzuH vijQAnam Srotra vijQAnam

   asaṃskṛtā dharmā ima ucyante sarvadharmāḥ. tatra dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyā	asaMskRtAH DarmAH ime ucyante sarva DarmAH. tatra DarmAH DarmEH SUnyA
   akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir eṣām eṣā, iyam	akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya. tat kasya hetoH? prakRtiH ezAm ezA, iyam
   ucyate sarvadharmaśūnyatā.	ucyate sarva Darma SUnyatA.
   tatra katamā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā? rūpeṇālakṣaṇaṃ rūpam, anubhavalakṣaṇā	tatra katamA sva lakzaNa SUnyatA? rUpeNa alakzaNam rUpam, anuBava lakzaNA

   saṃskārā, vijānanālakṣaṇaṃ vijñānaṃ vistareṇa kartavyaṃ, yac ca	saMskArA, vijAnana alakzaNam vijQAnam vistareNa kartavyan, yat ca
   saṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇālakṣaṇaṃ, yac cāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ	saMskRtAnAm DarmANAm lakzaNa alakzaNan, yat ca asaMskRtAnAm DarmANAm
   lakṣaṇālakṣaṇaṃ sarva ete dharmāḥ svalakṣaṇeṇa śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām	lakzaNa alakzaNam sarve ete DarmAH sva lakzaNeNa SUnyAH akUwa sTA vinASitAm

   svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā.	sva lakzaNa SUnyatA.

   tatra katamo nāmanimittāpraveśo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra samādhau sthitvā	tatra katamaH nAmanimittApraveSaH nAma samADiH? yatra samADO sTitvA

   iti puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ	iti puNya saMBAraH
   punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ, yad uta	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnaM, yat uta
   catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, katamāni catvāri? kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ	catvAri smRti upasTAnAni, katamAni catvAri? kAya smRti upasTAnam
   vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ cittasmṛtyupasthānaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam.	vedanA smRti upasTAnam citta smRti upasTAnam DarmasmRti upasTAnam.

   vitarkān vitarkayati tac cānupalambhayogena, adhyātmabahirdhākāye	vitarkAn vitarkayati tat ca anupalamBa yogena, aDyAtma bahirDAkAye

   śayito 'smīti prajānāti, yathā yathāsya kāyaḥ sthito bhavati praṇītam	SayitaH asmi iti prajAnAti, yaTA yaTA asya kAyaH sTitaH Bavati praNItam

   aparityāgitā.	aparityAgitA.

   yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha, kutas tad yānaṃ niryāsyatīti traidhātukān	yat punar suBUtiH evam Aha, kutas tat yAnam niryAsyati iti trEDAtukAn
   niryāsyati yena sarvākārajñatā tena sthāsyati tat punar advayayogena. tat	niryAsyati yena sarva AkAra jQa tA tena sTAsyati tat punar advaya yogena. tat 
   kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca mahāyānaṃ yā ca sarvākārajñatā ubhāv etau	kasya hetoH? taTA hi yat ca mahAyAnam yA ca sarva AkAra jQa tA uBO etO
   dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau arūpiṇau anidarśanau apratighau	DarmO na saMyuktO na visaMyuktO arUpiNO anidarSanO apratiGO
   ekalakṣaṇau yad utālakṣaṇau. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte 'lakṣaṇau	eka lakzaNO yat uta alakzaNO. tat kasya hetoH? na hi suBUte alakzaNO
   dharmau niryātau vā niryāto vā niryāsyato vā dharmadhātoḥ sa subhūte	DarmO niryAtO vA niryAtaH vA niryAsyataH vA DarmaDAtoH sa suBUte
   niryāṇam icchet, tathatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ	niryANam icCet, taTatAyAH sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm
   dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icched, evaṃ bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātor ākāśadhātoḥ	DarmANAm niryANam icCed, evam BUtakoweH acintya DAtoH AkASa DAtoH
   prahāṇadhātor virāgakoṭer anutpādasyānirodhasyābhāvasyasa niryāṇam icched	prahANa DAtoH virAga koweH anutpAdasya aniroDasya aBAvasyasa niryANam icCet 
   yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet.	yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet.
   rūpaśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ	rUpa SUnyatAyAH sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm
   niryāṇam icchet, evaṃ vedanāśūnyatāyāḥ saṃjñāśūnyatāyāḥ saṃskāraśūnyatāyāḥ	niryANam icCet, evam vedanA SUnyatAyAH saMjQA SUnya tAyAH saMskAra SUnyatAyAH
   vijñānaśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ	vijQAna SUnyatAyAH sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm
   niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?	niryANam icCet. tat kasya hetoH?
   na hi subhūte rūpaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ	na hi suBUte rUpa SUnyatA trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm
   sthāsyati, na vedanāśūnyatā na saṃjñāśūnyatā na saṃskāraśūnyatā na	sTAsyati, na vedanA SUnyatA na saMjQA SUnyatA na saMskAra SUnyatA na

   kasya hetoḥ?	kasya hetoH?
   tathā hi subhūte rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ vedanā vedanayā śūnyā saṃjñā saṃjñayā	taTA hi suBUte rUpam rUpeNa SUnyam vedanA vedanayA SUnyA saMjQA saMjQayA
   śūnyā saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ,	SUnyA saMskArAH saMskArEH SUnyAH vijQAnam vijQAnena SUnyaM,
   cakṣuḥśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ	cakzuH SUnyatAyAH sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm
   niryāṇam icchet, evaṃ śrotraśūnyatāyā ghrāṇaśūnyatāyā jihvāśūnyatāyāḥ	niryANam icCet, evam Srotra SUnyatAyAH GrANa SUnyatAyAH jihvA SUnyatAyAH
   kāyaśūnyatāyā manaḥśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchedyo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ	kAya SUnyatAyAH manaH SUnyatAyAH sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm
   dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet, evaṃ rūpaśūnyatāyāḥ śabdaśūnyatāyā	DarmANAm niryANam icCet, evam rUpa SUnyatAyAH Sabda SUnyatAyAH 
   gandhaśūnyatāyā rasaśūnyatāyāḥ sparśaśūnyatāyā dharmaśūnyatāyāḥ,	ganDa SUnyatAyAH rasa SUnyatAyAH sparSa SUnyatAyAH Darma SUnyatAyAH,
   (PvsP1 2: 104)	(Pu sP1 2: 104)
   cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatāyāḥ śrotravijñānaśūnyatāyā ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatāyā	cakzuH vijQAna SUnyatAyAH Srotra vijQAna SUnyatAyAH GrANa vijQAna SUnyatAyAH 
   jihvāvijñānaśūnyatāyāḥ kāyavijñānaśūnyatāyā manovijñānaśūnyatāyāś	jihvA vijQAna SUnyatAyAH kAya vijQAna SUnyatAyAH manaH vijQAna SUnyatAyAH 
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā śrotrasaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā	cakzuH saMsparSa SUnyatAyA Srotra saMsparSa SUnyatAyAH GrANa saMsparSa SUnyatAyAH 
   jihvāsaṃsparśaśūnyatāyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatāyāś	jihvA saMsparSa SUnyatAyAH kAya saMsparSa SUnyatAyAH manaH saMsparSa SUnyatAyAH

   cakṣuṣā śūnyaṃ śrotraṃ śrotreṇa śūnyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇena śūnyaṃ jihvā	cakzuzA SUnyam Srotram SrotreNa SUnyam GrANam GrANena SUnyam jihvA
   jihvayā śūnyā kāyaḥ kāyena śūnyo mano manasā śūnyaṃ, evaṃ rūpaṃ rūpeṇa	jihvayA SUnyA kAyaH kAyena SUnyaH manaH manasA SUnyan, evam rUpam rUpeNa
   śūnyaṃ śabdaḥ śabdena śūnyo gandho gandhena śūnyo raso rasena śūnyaḥ	SUnyam SabdaH Sabdena SUnyaH ganDaH ganDena SUnyaH rasaH rasena SUnyaH
   sparśaḥ sparśena śūnyo dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,	sparSaH sparSena SUnyaH DarmAH DarmEH SUnyAH,
   cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānena śūnyaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ śrotravijñānena	cakzuH vijQAnam cakzuH vijQAnena SUnyam Srotra vijQAnam Srotra vijQAnena

   śūnyaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ kāyavijñānena śūnyaṃ manovijñānaṃ manovijñānena	SUnyam kAya vijQAnam kAya vijQAnena SUnyam manaH vijQAnam manaH vijQAnena
   śūnyaṃ,	SUnyaM,
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ	cakzuH saMsparSaH cakzuH saMsparSena SUnyaH Srotra saMsparSaH
   śrotrasaṃsparśena śūnyo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśena śūnyo	Srotra saMsparSena SUnyaH GrANa saMsparSaH GrANa saMsparSena SUnyaH 
   jihvāsaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśena	jihvA saMsparSaH jihvA saMsparSena SUnyaH kAya saMsparSaH kAya saMsparSena

   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā,	cakzuH saMsparSa jA vedanA cakzuH saMsparSa jayA vedanayA SUnyA,
   śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā śrotrasaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā,	Srotra saMsparSa jA vedanA Srotra saMsparSa jayA vedanayA SUnyA,

   vedanā kāyasaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā, manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā	vedanA kAya saMsparSa jayA vedanayA SUnyA, manaH saMsparSa jA vedanA
   manaḥsaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā.	manaH saMsparSa jayA vedanayA SUnyA.
   svapnasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam	svapnasya sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam
   icchet, vistareṇa kartavyam, evaṃ marīcyā māyāyāḥ pratiśrutkāyāḥ	icCet, vistareNa kartavyam, evam marIcyAH mAyAyAH pratiSrutkAyAH
   pratibhāsasya pratibimbasya gandharvanagarasya tathāgatanirmitasya sa	pratiBAsasya pratibimbasya ganDarvanagarasya taTAgata nirmitasya sa
   subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat	suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet. tat 
   kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte svapnasya svabhavas traidhātukān niryāsyati na	kasya hetoH? na hi suBUte svapnasya svaBavaH trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati, evaṃ na marīcyāḥ svabhāvo na māyāyāḥ svabhāvo	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati, evam na marIcyAH svaBAvaH na mAyAyAH svaBAvaH 
   na pratiśrutkāyāḥ svabhāvo na pratibhāsasya svabhāvo na pratibimbasya	na pratiSrutkAyAH svaBAvaH na pratiBAsasya svaBAvaH na pratibimbasya
   svabhāvo na gandharvanagarasya svabhāvo na tathāgatanirmitasya svabhāvas	svaBAvaH na ganDarvanagarasya svaBAvaH na taTAgata nirmitasya svaBAvaH 
   traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?	trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati. tat kasya hetoH?
   tathā hi subhūte svapnasvabhāvaḥ svapnasvabhāvena śūnyo, marīcisvabhāvo	taTA hi suBUte svapna svaBAvaH svapna svaBAvena SUnyo, marIci svaBAvaH 
   marīcisvabhāvena śūnyaḥ, māyāsvabhāvo māyāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ,	marIci svaBAvena SUnyaH, mAyA svaBAvaH mAyA svaBAvena SUnyaH,
   pratiśrutkāsvabhāvaḥ pratiśrutkāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ, pratibhāsasvabhāvaḥ	pratiSrutka asvaBAvaH pratiSrutka asvaBAvena SUnyaH, pratiBAsa svaBAvaH
   pratibhāsasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ, (PvsP1 2: 106) pratibimbasvabhāvaḥ	pratiBAsa svaBAvena SUnyaH, (Pu sP1 2: 106) pratibimba svaBAvaH
   pratibimbasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ, gandharvanagarasvabhāvaḥ	pratibimba svaBAvena SUnyaH, ganDarvanagara svaBAvaH

   tathāgatanirmitasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.	taTAgata nirmita svaBAvena SUnyaH.
   iti darśanamārge prathamagrāhyavikalpapratipakṣaḥ	iti darSana mArge praTama grAhya vikalpa pratipakzaH
   dānapāramitāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ	dAna pAramitAyAH sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm
   niryāṇam icchet, evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā	niryANam icCet, evam SIla pAramitAyAH kzAnti pAramitAyAH vIrya pAramitAyAH 
   dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo	DyAna pAramitAyAH prajQApAramitAyAH sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH 
   'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte	alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi suBUte
   yo dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na	yaH dAna pAramitAyAH svaBAvaH na sa trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati, evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati, evam SIla pAramitAyAH kzAnti pAramitAyAH 
   vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ tathā hi yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo	vIrya pAramitAyAH DyAna pAramitAyAH taTA hi yaH prajQApAramitAyAH svaBAvaH 
   na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya	na sa trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati. tat kasya
   hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte dānapāramitāsvabhāvo dānapāramitāsvabhāvena	hetoH? taTA hi suBUte dAna pAramitA svaBAvaH dAna pAramitA svaBAvena
   śūnyaḥ, śīlapāramitāsvabhāvaḥ śīlapāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ,	SUnyaH, SIla pAramitA svaBAvaH SIla pAramitA svaBAvena SUnyaH,
   kṣāntipāramitāsvabhāvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ,	kzAnti pAramitA svaBAvaH kzAnti pAramitA svaBAvena SUnyaH,
   vīryapāramitāsvabhāvo vīryapāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ,	vIrya pAramitA svaBAvaH vIrya pAramitA svaBAvena SUnyaH,
   dhyānapāramitāsvabhāvo dhyānapāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ,	DyAna pAramitA svaBAvaH DyAna pAramitA svaBAvena SUnyaH,
   prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvaḥ prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.	prajQApAramitA svaBAvaH prajQApAramitA svaBAvena SUnyaH.
   adhyātmaśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ	aDyAtma SUnyatAyAH sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm
   niryāṇam icchet, bahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo	niryANam icCet, bahirDA SUnyatAyAH sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH 
   'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ sa	alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet, aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAyAH sa
   subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet, evaṃ	suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet, evam
   yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ	yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAyAH sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm
   dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāḥ	DarmANAm niryANam icCet. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi yaH aDyAtma SUnyatAyAH
   svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati.	svaBAvaH na sa trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati.
   tathā hi yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na	taTA hi yaH bahirDA SUnyatAyAH svaBAvaH na sa trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati, tathā hi yo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati, taTA hi yaH aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAyAH
   svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,	svaBAvaH na sa trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati,

   traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?	trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati. tat kasya hetoH?
   tathā hi anutpādasvabhāvo 'nutpādasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.	taTA hi anutpAda svaBAvaH anutpAda svaBAvena SUnyaH.

   sthāsyati, acalitaṃ tad yānam.	sTAsyati, acalitam tat yAnam.

   api tu subhūte asthānaṃ na sthānayogena tad yānaṃ sthāsyati, tadyathāpi	api tu suBUte asTAnam na sTAna yogena tat yAnam sTAsyati, tat yaTA api
   nāma subhūte dharmadhātur na sthito nāsthitaḥ, evam eva subhūte tan	nAma suBUte DarmaDAtuH na sTitaH na AsTitaH, evam eva suBUte tan

   'tyantaviśuddhitām upādāya, evaṃ yāvat paśyakasyātyantaviśuddhitām	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya, evam yAvat paSyakasya atyanta viSudDi tAm

   cakṣurvijñānaṃ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ saṃdarśitam anityam adhruvam aśāśvatam	cakzuH vijQAnam kalpitam viWapitam saMdarSitam anityam aDruvam aSASvatam
   avipariṇāmadharmi, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	avipariNAma Darmi, aBAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati, evaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ	aBiBUya niryAsyati, evam Srotra vijQAnam GrANa vijQAnam jihvA vijQAnam
   kāyavijñānaṃ,	kAya vijQAnaM,
   sacet subhūte manovijñānaṃ tathatābhaviṣyad avitathatā ananyatathatā	saced suBUte manaH vijQAnam taTatA aBavizyat avitaTa tA ananyataTatA
   aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam	aviparItam BUtam tattvam yaTAvat nityam Druvam SASvatam
   avipariṇāmadharmi bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	avipariNAma Darmi BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   manovijñānaṃ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ saṃdarśitam anityam adhruvam aśāśvatam	manaH vijQAnam kalpitam viWapitam saMdarSitam anityam aDruvam aSASvatam
   avipariṇāmadharmi, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	avipariNAma Darmi, aBAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati.	aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   sacet subhūte cakṣuḥsaṃsparśas tathatābhaviśyat, avitathatā ananyatathatā	saced suBUte cakzuH saMsparSaH taTatA ABaviSyat, avitaTa tA ananyataTatA
   aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ śāśvatam	aviparItam BUtam tattvam yaTAvat nityam Druvam SASvatam
   avipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ kalpito viṭhapitaḥ saṃdarśito anityo 'dhruvo 'śāśvato	cakzuH saMsparSaH kalpitaH viWapitaH saMdarSitaH anityaH aDruvaH aSASvataH 
   'vipariṇāmadharmī, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ, sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	avipariNAma DarmI, aBAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnaM, sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ	aBiBUya niryAsyati, evam Srotra saMsparSaH GrANa saMsparSaH jihvA saMsparSaH
   kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,	kAya saMsparSaH,
   sacet subhūte manaḥsaṃsparśas tathatā abhaviśyat, avitathatā ananyatathatā	saced suBUte manaH saMsparSaH taTatA aBaviSyat, avitaTa tA ananyataTatA
   aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ, yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato (PvsP1 2: 118)	aviparItam BUtam tattvan, yaTAvat nityaH DruvaH SASvataH (Pu sP1 2: 118)
   'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ kalpito viṭhapitaḥ saṃdarśito 'nityo 'dhruvo 'śāśvato	manaH saMsparSaH kalpitaH viWapitaH saMdarSitaH anityaH aDruvaH aSASvataH 
   'vipariṇāmadharmī, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	avipariNAma DarmI, aBAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati.	aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   sacet subhūte cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā tathatābhaviśyat, avitathatā	saced suBUte cakzuH saMsparSa jA vedanA taTatA ABaviSyat, avitaTa tA
   ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato	ananya taTatA aviparItam BUtam tattvam yaTAvat nityaH DruvaH SASvataH 
   'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā kalpitā viṭhapitā saṃdarśitā anityā adhruvā	cakzuH saMsparSa jA vedanA kalpitA viWapitA saMdarSitAH anityAH aDruvA
   aśāśvatā avipariṇāmadharmiṇī, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ, sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ	aSASvatAH avipariNAma DarmiNI, aBAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnan, sa deva mAnuza asuram
   lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā	lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati, evam Srotra saMsparSa jAH vedanA
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā,	GrANa saMsparSa jA vedanA jihvA saMsparSa jA vedanA kAya saMsparSa jAH vedanA,
   sacet subhūte manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā tathatābhaviśyat, avitathatā	saced suBUte manaH saMsparSa jA vedanA taTatA ABaviSyat, avitaTa tA
   ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ, yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato	ananya taTatA aviparItam BUtam tattvan, yaTAvat nityaH DruvaH SASvataH 
   'vipariṇāmadharmiṇī bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	avipariNAma DarmiNI BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā kalpitā viṭhapitā saṃdarśitā anityā adhruvā	manaH saMsparSa jA vedanA kalpitA viWapitA saMdarSitAH anityAH aDruvA
   aśāśvatā avipariṇāmadharmiṇī, abhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ, sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ	aSASvatAH avipariNAma DarmiNI, aBAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnan, sa deva mAnuza asuram
   lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.	lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   sacet subhūte dharmadhātur bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	saced suBUte DarmaDAtuH BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   dharmadhātur abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	DarmaDAtuH aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati, evaṃ tathatā bhūtakoṭiḥ.	aBiBUya niryAsyati, evam taTatA BUtakowiH.
   sacet subhūte acintyadhātur bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	saced suBUte acintya DAtuH BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   acintyadhātur abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	acintya DAtuH aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya nirnāsyati.	aBiBUya nirnAsyati.
   sacet subhūte dānapāramitā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	saced suBUte dAna pAramitA BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   dānapāramitābhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	dAna pAramitA BAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati, evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā (PvsP1 2: 119)	aBiBUya niryAsyati, evam SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA (PvsP1 2: 119)
   vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā,	vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA,
   sacet subhūte prajñāpāramitā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	saced suBUte prajQApAramitA BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   prajñāpāramitābhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	prajQApAramitA BAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati.	aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   sacet subhūte adhyātmaśūnyatābhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	saced suBUte aDyAtma SUnyatA BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   adhyātmaśūnyatābhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	aDyAtma SUnyatA BAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati.	aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   sacet subhūte bahirdhāśūnyatā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	saced suBUte bahirDA SUnyatA BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   bahirdhāśūnyatābhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	bahirDA SUnyata aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati.	aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   sacet subhūte adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ	saced suBUte aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam
   mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi	mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi
   subhūte adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatābhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ	suBUte aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyata aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   evaṃ yāvat sacet subhūte abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo	evam yAvat saced suBUte aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH 
   naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt	na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt 
   tarhi subhūte abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatābhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ	tarhi suBUte aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA BAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   sacet subhūte catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ	saced suBUte catvAri smRti upasTAnAni BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam
   mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi	mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi
   subhūte catvāri smṛtyupasthānāny abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ	suBUte catvAri smRti upasTAnAni aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   evaṃ catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni	evam catvAri samyak prahANAni catvAraH RdDi pAdAH paQca indriyANi paQca balAni
   sapta bodhyaṅgāni.	sapta boDi aFgAni.
   sacet subhūte āryāṣṭāṅgamārgo bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	saced suBUte Arya azwa aFga mArgaH BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	Arya azwa aFgaH mArgaH aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati.	aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   sacet subhūte apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo	saced suBUte apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH 
   naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya (PvsP1 2: 120)	na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya (PvsP1 2: 120)
   nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'bhāvo na	nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH aBAvaH na
   bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.	BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   evaṃ daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ.	evam daSa balAni catvAri vESAradyAni catasraH pratisaMvidaH.
   sacet subhūte aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo	saced suBUte azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH 
   naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt	na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt 
   tarhi subhūte aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān	tarhi suBUte azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt 
   mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.	mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   ity agratāniryāṇam	iti agra tA niryANam
   sacet subhūte gotrabhūdharmā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	saced suBUte gotra BU DarmA BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   gotrabhūdharmā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	gotra BU DarmAH aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati.	aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   sacet subhūte aṣṭamakadharmā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	saced suBUte azwamaka DarmAH BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   aṣṭamakadharmā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	azwamaka DarmAH aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati.	aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   evaṃ srotaāpannnadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā anāgāmidharmā arhaddharmāḥ	evam srotaApannna DarmAH sakRdAgAmi DarmAH anAgAmi DarmAH arhat DarmAH
   pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvadharmāḥ.	pratyekabudDa DarmAH boDisattva DarmAH.
   sacet subhūte buddhadharmā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	saced suBUte budDa DarmAH BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   buddhadharmā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	budDa DarmAH aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati.	aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   sacet subhūte gotrabhūmir bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	saced suBUte gotra BUmiH BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   gotrabhūmir abhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	gotra BUmiH aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati.	aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   evam aṣṭamakaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho	evam azwamakaH srotaApannaH sakRdAgAmi anAgAmi arhan pratyekabudDaH 
   bodhisattvaḥ.	boDisattvaH.
   sacet subhūte buddho bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	saced suBUte budDaH BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte buddho	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte budDaH 
   'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya	aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya
   niryāsyati.	niryAsyati.
   (PvsP1 2: 121)	(Pu sP1 2: 121)
   sacet subhūte sadevamānuṣāsuro loko bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ	saced suBUte sa deva mAnuza AsuraH lokaH BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam
   mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat, yasmāt tarhi	mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat, yasmAt tarhi
   subhūte sadevamānuṣāsuro loko 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ	suBUte sa deva mAnuza AsuraH lokaH aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   iti prahāṇaniryāṇam	iti prahANa niryANam
   sacet subhūte prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	saced suBUte praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   yāvad ā bodhimaṇḍād etasminn antare ye cittotpādās te bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan	yAvat A boDimaNxAt etasmin antare ye citta utpAdAH te BAvaH aBavizyan
   nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat,	na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat,
   yasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam	yasmAt tarhi suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya praTama citta utpAdam
   upādāya yāvad ā bodhimaṇḍād etasminn antare ye cittotpādās te abhāvo na	upAdAya yAvat A boDimaNxAt etasmin antare ye citta utpAdAH te aBAvaH na
   bhāvas tasmān mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.	BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vajropamaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvo	saced suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya vajra upamam jQAnam BAvaH 
   'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān	aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarva vAsanA anusaMDi kleSAn
   abhāvān viditvā sarvākāravaropetaṃ sarvajñajñānam anuprāpnuyāt, yasmāt	aBAvAn viditvA sarva AkAra vara upetam sarvajQa jQAnam anuprApnuyAt, yasmAt 
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vajropamaṃ jñānam abhāvo na bhāvas	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya vajra upamam jQAnam aBAvaH na BAvas
   tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān abhāvān iti	tasmAt boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarva vAsanA anusaMDi kleSAn aBAvAn iti
   viditvā sarvākāravaropetaṃ sarvajñajñānam anuprāpnoti, evaṃ mahāyānaṃ	viditvA sarva AkAra vara upetam sarvajQa jQAnam anuprApnoti, evam mahAyAnam
   sadevanānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati.	sa deva nAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati.
   sacet subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dvātriṃśan	saced suBUte taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya dvAtriMSan
   mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva tathāgatā arhantaḥ	mahApuruza lakzaNAni BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva taTAgatAH arhantaH
   samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ tejasā ca śriyā cābhyabhaviṣyat,	samyaksaMbudDAH sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam tejasA ca SriyA ca aByaBavizyat,
   yasmāt subhūte dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny abhāvo nabhāvas tasmāt	yasmAt suBUte dvAtriMSat mahApuruza lakzaNAni aBAvaH naBAvaH tasmAt 
   tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ tejasā ca	taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam tejasA ca
   śriyā cābhibhavanti.	SriyA ca aBiBavanti.
   sacet subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo	saced suBUte taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH 
   naiva tathagato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn	na eva taTagataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn
   avabhāsenāsphāriṣyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho	avaBAsena AsPArizyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH 
   'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho	aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH 
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn avabhāsena sphārati.	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn avaBAsena sPArati.
   sacet subhūte tathāgatasya ṣaṣṭyaṅgopetaḥ svaro bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo	saced suBUte taTAgatasya zazwi aFga upetaH svaraH BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH 
   naiva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho daśasu dikṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān	na eva taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH daSasu dikzu aprameya asaMKyeyAn
   (PvsP1 2: 122) lokadhātūn svareṇābhivyajñāpayiṣyat, yasmāt tarhi subhūte	(Pu sP1 2: 122) lokaDAtUn svareNa aBivyajQApayizyat, yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   tathāgatasya ṣaṣṭyaṅgopetaḥ svaro 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan	taTAgatasya zazwi aFga upetaH svaraH aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt taTAgataH arhan
   samyaksaṃbuddho daśasu dikṣv aprameyasaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn	samyaksaMbudDaH daSasu dikzu aprameya saMKyeyAn lokaDAtUn
   svareṇābhivijñapayati.	svareNa aBivijQapayati.
   sacet subhūte tathāgatasya triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ bhāvo	saced suBUte taTAgatasya tri parivartam dvAdaSa AkAram Darma cakram BAvaH 
   'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naiva tathāgatas triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ	aBavizyan na aBAvaH na eva taTAgataH tri parivartam dvAdaSa AkAram
   dharmacakraṃ prāvartayiṣyat, apravartanīyaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā	Darma cakram prAvartayizyat, apravartanIyam SramaNena vA brAhmaNena vA
   devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke sahadharmeṇa, yasmāt	devena vA mAreNa vA brahmaNA vA kenacid vA punar loke sahaDarmeNa, yasmAt 
   tarhi subhūte tathāgatasya triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakram abhāvo	tarhi suBUte taTAgatasya tri parivartam dvAdaSa AkAram Darma cakram aBAvaH 
   na bhāvas tasmāt tathagatena triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ	na BAvaH tasmAt taTagatena tri parivartam dvAdaSa AkAram Darma cakram
   pravartitam apravartanīyaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā	pravartitam apravartanIyam SramaNena vA brAhmaNena vA devena vA mAreNa vA
   brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇa.	brahmaNA vA kenacid vA punar loke saha DarmeNa.
   sacet subhūte sattvā bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvo yeṣāṃ kṛtaśas tathāgatena	saced suBUte sattvAH BAvaH aBavizyan na aBAvaH yezAm kRtaSas taTAgatena
   dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ naiva te sattvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau	Darma cakram pravartitam na eva te sattvAH anupaDi Seze nirvANa DAtO
   parinirvāsyan yasmāt tarhi subhūte sattvā abhāvo na bhāvo yeṣāṃ kṛtaśas	parinirvAsyan yasmAt tarhi suBUte sattvAH aBAvaH na BAvaH yezAm kRta Sas
   tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ tasmāt te sattvā nirupadhiśeṣe	taTAgatena Darma cakram pravartitam tasmAt te sattvAH nirupaDi Seze
   nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyanti.	nirvANa DAtO parinirvAsyanti.
   ity adhigamaniryāṇam	iti aDigama niryANam
   iti trividham uddeśaniryāṇam	iti triviDam uddeSa niryANam
   yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha, ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti, evam etat subhūte	yat punar suBUtiH evam Aha, AkASa samam tat yAnam iti, evam etat suBUte
   evam etat, ākāśasamaṃ tad yānaṃ, yathākāśasya na pūrvā dik prajñāyate na	evam etat, AkASa samam tat yAnan, yaTA AkASasya na pUrvA diS prajQAyate na
   dakṣiṇā na paścimā nottarā na vidiśo nādho nordhvā dik prajñāyate, evam	dakziNA na paScimA na uttarA na vidiSaH na aDas na UrDvA diS prajQAyate, evam
   eva subhūte tasya yānasya na pūrvā dik prajñāyate na dakṣiṇā na paścimā	eva suBUte tasya yAnasya na pUrvA diS prajQAyate na dakziNA na paScimA
   nottarā na vidiśo nādho nordhvā dik prajñāyate,	na uttarA na vidiSaH na aDas na UrDvA diS prajQAyate,
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na dīrghaṃ na hrasvaṃ na vṛttaṃ na	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASam na dIrGam na hrasvam na vRttam na
   caturasraṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ na nīlaṃ na pītaṃ na lohitaṃ nāvadātaṃ na	catur asram na samam na vizamam na nIlam na pItam na lohitam na avadAtam na
   mañjiṣṭhaṃ na sphāṭikarajatavarṇam, evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na	maQjizWam na sPAwika rajata varNam, evam eva suBUte tat mahAyAnam na
   dīrghaṃ na hrasvaṃ na vṛttaṃ na caturasraṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ na nīlaṃ na	dIrGam na hrasvam na vRttam na catur asram na samam na vizamam na nIlam na
   pītaṃ na lohitaṃ nāvadātaṃ na māñjiṣṭhaṃ na sphāṭikarajatavarṇaṃ,	pItam na lohitam na avadAtam na mAQjizWam na sPAwika rajata varNaM,
   tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,	tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti,
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ, evam	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASam na atItam na anAgatam na pratyutpannan, evam
   eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na (PvsP1 2: 123)	eva suBUte tat mahAyAnam na atItam na anAgatam na (Pu sP1 2: 123)

   tasya mahāyānasya na hānir na vṛddhis tenocyate, ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,	tasya mahAyAnasya na hAniH na vRdDiH tena ucyate, AkASa samam tat yAnam iti,
   tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśasya na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ, evam eva	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASasya na saMkleSaH na vyavadAnan, evam eva
   subhūte tasya mahāyānasya na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ tenocyate, ākāśasamaṃ	suBUte tasya mahAyAnasya na saMkleSaH na vyavadAnam tena ucyate, AkASa samam
   tad yānam iti,	tat yAnam iti,

   vyākṛtaṃ nāvyākṛtaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,	vyAkRtam na avyAkRtam tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti,

   subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na jñeyaṃ nājñeyaṃ na parijñeyaṃ na parijñātavyaṃ na	suBUte tat mahAyAnam na jQeyam na AjQeyam na parijQeyam na parijQAtavyam na

   yānam iti,	yAnam iti,

   na sapratighaṃ nāpratighaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ, evam eva subhūte	na sa pratiGam na apratiGam na saMyuktam na visaMyuktan, evam eva suBUte

   nāpratighaṃ na saṃyuktaṃna visaṃyuktaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,	na apratiGam na saMyuktaM na visaMyuktam tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti,

   nānityaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā nānātmā na śāntaṃ nāśāntaṃ tenocyate	na anityam na suKam na duHKam na AtmA nAnA AtmA na SAntam nASa antam tena ucyate
   ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti,	AkASa samam tat yAnam iti,

   bhagavan mahāyāne śikṣamāṇair atīte 'dhvani bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ	Bagavat mahAyAne SikzamANEH atIte aDvani boDisattvEH mahAsattvEH
   sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā, anāgatā api bodhisattvā mahāsattvā atra mahāyāne	sarva AkAra jQa tA anuprAptA, anAgatAH api boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH atra mahAyAne
   śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti, ye 'pi bhagavan daśadiśi loke	SikzamANAH sarva AkAra jQa tAm anuprApsyanti, ye api Bagavan daSa diSi loke
   'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pratyutpannās te 'py atra	asaMKyeyezu lokaDAtuzu boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH pratyutpannAH te api atra
   mahāyāne śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti, tasmāt tarhi bhagavan	mahAyAne SikzitvA sarva AkAra jQa tAm anuprApnuvanti, tasmAt tarhi Bagavan
   mahāyānam idaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta tryadhvasamatānām,	mahAyAnam idam boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm yat uta tri aDva samatAnAm,
   atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte	aTa Kalu BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat: evam etat suBUte
   evam etat, atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā	evam etat, atra mahAyAne SikzitvA atIta anAgata pratyutpannA boDisattvA
   mahāsattvāḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptā anuprāpsyanti anuprāpnuvanti ca.	mahAsattvAH sarva AkAra jQa tAm anuprAptAH anuprApsyanti anuprApnuvanti ca.
   atha khalu pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantam etad avocat: ayaṃ bhagavan	aTa Kalu pUrNaH mEtrAyaNI putraH Bagavantam etat avocat: ayam Bagavan
   subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo 'dhīṣṭo mahāyānam	suBUtiH sTaviraH taTAgatena prajQApAramitAyAH kRtaSas aDIzwaH mahAyAnam
   upadeṣṭavyaṃ manyeta.	upadezwavyam manyeta.
   (PvsP1 2: 136)	(Pu sP1 2: 136)
   atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: mā haivāhaṃ bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat: mA ha eva aham Bagavan
   prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya mahāyānam upadiśāmi.	prajQApAramitAm vyatikramya mahAyAnam upadiSAmi.
   bhagavan āha: na hi subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānam	Bagavan Aha: na hi suBUte anuloma tvam prajQApAramitAyAm mahAyAnam
   upadiśasi. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte ye kecit kuśalā bodhipakṣā	upadiSasi. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi suBUte ye kecid kuSalA boDi pakzA
   dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā	DarmAH SrAvaka DarmAH vA pratyekabudDa DarmA vA boDisattva DarmA vA
   buddhadharmā vā sarve te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ	budDa DarmA vA sarve te prajQApAramitAyAm saMgraham samavasaraNam
   gacchanti.	gacCanti.
   subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ	suBUtiH Aha: katame Bagavan kuSalAH boDi pakzAH DarmAH SrAvaka DarmAH
   pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāś ca ye	pratyekabudDa DarmAH boDisattva DarmAH budDa DarmAH ca ye
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti?	prajQApAramitAyAm saMgraham samavasaraNam gacCanti?
   bhagavān āha: tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni	BagavAn Aha: tat yaTA catvAri smRti upasTAnAni catvAri samyak prahANAni
   catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni	catvAraH RdDi pAdAH paQca indriyANi paQca balAni sapta boDi aFgAni
   āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhaṃ catvāry apramāṇāni	Arya azwa aFga mArgaH, SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita vimokza muKam catvAri apramANAni
   catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā	catvAri DyAnAni catasraH ArUpya samApattayaH dAna pAramitA SIla pAramitA
   kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā, daśa	kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA prajQApAramitA, daSa
   tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī	taTAgata balAni catvAri vESAradyAni catasraH pratisaMvidaH mahA mEtrI
   mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā asaṃpramuṣitadharmatā	mahA karuNA azwAdaSa AveNikA budDa DarmA asaMpramuzita Darma tA
   sadopekṣāvihāritā, ime subhūte kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ	sadA upekzA vihAritA, ime suBUte kuSalAH boDi pakzAH DarmAH SrAvaka DarmAH
   pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāś ca ye	pratyekabudDa DarmAH boDisattva DarmAH budDa DarmAH ca ye
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti.	prajQApAramitAyAm saMgraham samavasaraNam gacCanti.
   yac ca subhūte mahāyānaṃ yā ca dhyānapāramitā yā ca vīryapāramitāyā ca	yat ca suBUte mahAyAnam yA ca DyAna pAramitA yA ca vIrya pAramitAyAH ca
   kṣāntipāramitā yā ca śīlapāramitā yā ca dānapāramitā, yac ca rūpaṃ yā ca	kzAnti pAramitA yA ca SIla pAramitA yA ca dAna pAramitA, yat ca rUpam yA ca
   vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac ca vijñānaṃ, yac ca cakṣur yac ca	vedanA yA ca saMjQA ye ca saMskArAH yat ca vijQAnaM, yat ca cakzuH yat ca
   śrotraṃ yac ca ghrāṇaṃ yā ca jihvā yaś ca kāyo yac ca mano yac ca rūpaṃ	Srotram yat ca GrANam yA ca jihvA yaH ca kAyaH yat ca manaH yat ca rUpam
   yaś ca śabdo yaś ca gandho yaś ca raso yaś ca sparśo ye ca dharmā yac ca	yaH ca SabdaH yaH ca ganDaH yaH ca rasaH yaH ca sparSaH ye ca DarmAH yat ca
   cakṣurvijñānaṃ yac ca śrotravijñānaṃ yac ca ghrāṇavijñānaṃ yac ca	cakzuH vijQAnam yat ca Srotra vijQAnam yat ca GrANa vijQAnam yat ca
   jihvāvijñānaṃ yac ca kāyavijñānaṃ yac ca manovijñānaṃ yaś ca	jihvA vijQAnam yat ca kAya vijQAnam yat ca manaH vijQAnam yaH ca
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yaś ca śrotrasaṃsparśo yaś ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśo yaś ca	cakzuH saMsparSaH yaH ca Srotra saMsparSaH yaH ca GrANa saMsparSaH yaH ca
   jihvāsaṃsparśo yaś ca kāyasaṃsparśo yaś ca manaḥsaṃsparśo yā ca	jihvA saMsparSaH yaH ca kAya saMsparSaH yaH ca manaH saMsparSaH yA ca
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca śrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanā yā ca	cakzuH saMsparSa jA vedanA yA ca Srotra saMsparSa ja AvedanA yA ca
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanāyā ca	GrANa saMsparSa jA vedanA yA ca jihvA saMsparSa jA vedanAyAH ca
   kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā,	kAya saMsparSa jA vedanA yA ca manaH saMsparSa jAH vedanA,
   (PvsP1 2: 137)	(Pu sP1 2: 137)
   yāni ca catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāni ca samyakprahāṇāni ye ca ṛddhipādā	yAni ca catvAri smRti upasTAnAni yAni ca samyak prahANAni ye ca RdDipAdA
   yāni cendriyāni yāni ca balāni yāni ca bodhyaṅgāni yaś cāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo	yAni ca indriyAni yAni ca balAni yAni ca boDi aFgAni yaH ca Arya azwa aFgaH mArgaH 
   yāni cāpramāṇāni yāni ca dhyānāni yāś cārūpyasamāpattayo yāni ca	yAni ca apramANAni yAni ca DyAnAni yAH ca ArUpya samApattayaH yAni ca
   tathāgatabalāni yāni ca vaiśāradyāni yāś ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvido yāni ca	taTAgata balAni yAni ca vESAradyAni yAH ca catasraH pratisaMvidaH yAni ca
   śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni ye cāsaṃskṛtā dharmā yac ca duḥkhaṃ yaś ca	SUnyatA nimitta apraNihitAni ye ca asaMskRtA DarmAH yat ca duHKam yaH ca
   samudayo yaś ca nirodho yaś ca mārgo yaś ca kāmadhātur yaś ca rūpadhātur	samudayaH yaH ca niroDaH yaH ca mArgaH yaH ca kAmaDAtuH yaH ca rUpa DAtuH 
   yaś cārūpyadhātur yā cādhyātmaśūnyatāyā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā	yaH ca ArUpya DAtuH yA ca aDyAtma SUnyatAyA ca bahirDA SUnyatA yA
   cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ye ca samādhayo	ca aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA yA ca yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA ye ca samADayaH 
   yāni ca dhāraṇīmukhāni ye ca yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, yaś ca	yAni ca DAraNI muKAni ye ca yAvat azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH, yaH ca
   tathāgatapravedito dharmavinayoyaś ca dharmadhātur yā ca tathatā yā ca	taTAgata praveditaH Darma vinayoyaH ca DarmaDAtuH yA ca taTatA yA ca
   bhūtakoṭir yaś cācintyadhātur yac ca nirvāṇaṃ, sarva ete dharmā na	BUtakowiH yaH ca acintya DAtuH yat ca nirvANaM, sarve ete DarmAH na
   saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad	saMyuktAH na visaMyuktAH arUpiNaH anidarSanAH apratiGA eka lakzaNAH yat 
   utālakṣaṇāḥ.	uta alakzaNAH.
   anena paryāyeṇa subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānaṃ	anena paryAyeNa suBUte anuloma tvam prajQApAramitAyAm mahAyAnam
   vyapadiśasi. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte anyan mahāyānam anyā	vyapadiSasi. tat kasya hetoH? na hi suBUte anyat mahAyAnam anyA
   prajñāpāramitā anyā dhyānapāramitā anyā vīryapāramitā anyā kṣāntipāramitā	prajQApAramitA anyA DyAna pAramitA anyA vIrya pAramitA anyA kzAnti pAramitA
   anyā śīlapāramitā anyā dānapāramitā, iti hi mahāyānañ ca prajñāpāramitā	anyA SIla pAramitAH anyAH dAna pAramitA, iti hi mahAyAnan ca prajQApAramitA
   dhyānavīryakṣāntiśīladānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, na subhūte	DyAna vIrya kzAnti SIla dAna pAramitA ca advayam etat at vEDIkAraM, na suBUte
   anyan mahāyānam anyāni smṛtyupasthānāni iti hi mahāyānaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni	anyat mahAyAnam anyAni smRti upasTAnAni iti hi mahAyAnam smRti upasTAnAni
   cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, evaṃ nānyan mahāyānam anye	ca advayam etat at vEDIkAran, evam na anyat mahAyAnam anye
   samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā iti hi mahāyānaṃ ca	samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArgAH iti hi mahAyAnam ca
   samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāś cādvayam etad	samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArgAH ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāraṃ, nānyan mahāyānaṃ anyā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattaya iti hi	advEDIkAraM, na anyat mahAyAnam anyAH apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH iti hi
   mahāyānaṃ cāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,	mahAyAnam ca apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH ca advayam etat at vEDIkAraM,
   nānyan mahāyānam anye daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikā	na anyat mahAyAnam anye daSa bala vESAradya pratisaMvid azwAdaSa AveNikA
   buddhadharmā iti hi mahāyānaṃ ca buddhadharmāś cādvayam etad	budDa DarmAH iti hi mahAyAnam ca budDa DarmAH ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāraṃ, anena kāraṇena subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	advEDIkAraM, anena kAraNena suBUte anuloma tvam prajQApAramitAyAm
   mahāyānaṃ vyapadiśasi.	mahAyAnam vyapadiSasi.
   iti prāptiniryāṇam	iti prApti niryANam
   subhūtir āha: api tu khalu punar bhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,	suBUtiH Aha: api tu Kalu punar Bagavan pUrva antataH boDisattvaH na upEti,
   aparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti, madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,	apara antataH boDisattvaH na upEti, maDyatas boDisattvaH na upEti,
   rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā	rUpa aparyanta tayA boDisattva aparyanta tA veditavyA, evam vedanA saMjQA
   saṃskārā vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatatā veditavyā, rūpaṃ	saMskArAH vijQAna aparyanta tayA boDisattva aparyanta tatA veditavyA, rUpam
   (PvsP1 2: 138) bodhisattva iti, evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate, evaṃ	(Pu sP1 2: 138) boDisattvaH iti, evam api na vidyate na upalaByate, evam
   vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti, evam api na vidyate	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam boDisattvaH iti, evam api na vidyate
   nopalabhyate, evaṃ hi bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ bodhisattvam	na upalaByate, evam hi Bagavan sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam boDisattvam
   anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ	anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyan katamam boDisattvam katamasyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?	prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi?
   api tu khalu punar bhagavan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,	api tu Kalu punar Bagavat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta boDisattvaH iti,
   yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā, evam	yaTA AtmA AtmA iti ca ucyate atyanta tayA ca anaBinivRttaH AtmA, evam
   asvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ katamad rūpaṃ yad anabhinivṛttam, evaṃ vedanā	asvaBAvAnAm DarmANAm katamat rUpam yat anaBinivRttam, evam vedanA
   saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ katamat tad vijñānaṃ yad anabhinivṛttaṃ, na tad rūpaṃ	saMjQA saMskArAH katamat tat vijQAnam yat anaBinivRttan, na tat rUpam
   vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ tat kim	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH yat ca anaBinivRttam na tat vijQAnam tat kim
   anabhinivṛttim anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitayām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?	anaBinivRttim anaBinivRttO prajQApAramitayAm avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi?
   na cānyatrānabhinivṛtter bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret, saced	na ca anyatra anaBinivRtteH boDisattvaH upalaByate yaH boDAya caret, saced 
   evaṃ nirdiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na	evam nirdiSyamAne boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya cittam na avalIyate na
   saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na	saMlIyate na vipratisArI Bavati mAnasam na uttrasyati na saMtrasyati na
   saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām.	saMtrAsam Apadyate carati boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm.
   śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi, pūrvāntato	SAriputraH Aha: kena kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte evam vadasi, pUrva antataH 
   bodhisattvo nopaiti, aparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti, madhyato	boDisattvaH na upEti, apara antataH boDisattvaH na upEti, maDyatas 
   bodhisattvonopaiti?	boDisattva una upEti?
   kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi, rūpāparyantatayā	kena kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte evam vadasi, rUpa aparyanta tayA
   bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā	boDisattva aparyanta tA veditavyA, evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArA
   vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā?	vijQAna aparyanta tayA boDisattva aparyanta tA veditavyA?
   kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi, rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti, evam api	kena kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte evam vadasi, rUpam boDisattvaH iti, evam api
   na vidyate nopalabhyate, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ bodhisattva	na vidyate na upalaByate, evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam boDisattva
   iti, evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate, evam ahaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ	iti, evam api na vidyate na upalaByate, evam aham boDisattvam mahAsattvam
   sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvam anupalabhamānaḥ, asamanupaśyan katamaṃ	sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam anupalaBamAnaH, asamanupaSyan katamam
   bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?	boDisattvam katamasyAm prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi?
   kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi, yāvad eva nāmadheyamātram etat,	kena kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte evam vadasi, yAvat eva nAmaDeya mAtram etat ,
   yad uta bodhisattva iti, yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate atyantatayā	yat uta boDisattvaH iti, yaTA AtmA AtmA iti ca ucyate atyanta tayA
   cānabhinivṛtta ātmā, evam abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ katamad rūpaṃ yad	ca anaBinivRttaH AtmA, evam aBAva svaBAvAnAm DarmANAm katamat rUpam yat 
   anabhinivṛttaṃ katame te vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ katamat tad vijñānaṃ yad	anaBinivRttam katame te vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH katamat tat vijQAnam yat 
   anabhinivṛttaṃ yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃ ye (PvsP1 2: 139)	anaBinivRttam yat ca anaBinivRttam na tat rUpam ye (Pu sP1 2: 139)
   cānabhinivṛttā na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad	ca anaBinivRttA na vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH yat ca anaBinivRttam na tat 
   vijñānaṃ, tat kim anabhinivṛttam anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitāyām	vijQAnan, tat kim anaBinivRttam anaBinivRttO prajQApAramitAyAm
   avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?	avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi?

   bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret?	boDisattvaH upalaByate yaH boDAya caret ?
   kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi, saced evam upadiśyamāne	kena kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte evam vadasi, saced evam upadiSyamAne
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya cittam na avalIyate na saMlIyate na vipratisArI
   bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati	Bavati mAnasam na uttrasyati na saMtrasyati na saMtrAsam Apadyate carati
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām iti?	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAm iti?
   subhūtir āha: sattvāsattayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo	suBUtiH Aha: sattva asat tayA Ayuzman SAriputra pUrva antataH boDisattvaH 
   nopaiti, sattvaśūnyatayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,	na upEti, sattva SUnya tayA Ayuzman SAriputra pUrva antataH boDisattvaH na upEti,

   śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām (PvsP1 2: 140) asvabhāvatāyāṃ	SUnyatAyAm viviktatAyAm (Pu sP1 2: 140) asvaBAva tAyAm
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante, na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā	pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni upalaByante, na ca SAriputra anyA asattA anyA

   śāriputra ākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tadyathāpi nāma āyuṣman śāriputra	SAriputraH AkASa samam. tat kasya hetoH? tat yaTA api nAma Ayuzman SAriputra
   yathā ākāśasya na pūrvanta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam	yaTA AkASasya na pUrvantaH upalaByate na aparAntaH upalaByate na maDyam
   upalabhyate, anantāparyantatayā ākāśam iti ca vyavahriyate.	upalaByate, ananta aparyanta tayA AkASam iti ca vyavahriyate.

   anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā	anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa rUpa aparyanta tayA boDisattva aparyanta tA

   veditavyā.	veditavyA.
   evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratityasamutpādeṣu yāvaj	evam vyasta samastezu skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratitya samutpAdezu yAvat

   kṛtāvibhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmir bodhisattvabhūmis tathāgatabhūmiḥ,	kRta aviBUmiH pratyekabudDa BUmiH boDisattva BUmiH taTAgata BUmiH,

   srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpannatve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, evaṃ sakṛdāgāmī	srotaApannaH srotaApanna tve na saMvidyate na upalaByate, evam sakRdAgAmI
   anāgāmī arhan pratyekabuddhaḥ pratyekabuddhatve na saṃvidyate	anAgAmI arhan pratyekabudDaH pratyekabudDa tve na saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate, bodhisattvo bodhisattvatve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,	na upalaByate, boDisattvaH boDisattva tve na saMvidyate na upalaByate,
   tathāgatas tathāgatatve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, prajñāpāramitā	taTAgataH taTAgata tve na saMvidyate na upalaByate, prajQApAramitA
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, prajñāpāramitāyām	prajQApAramitAyAm na saMvidyate na upalaByate, prajQApAramitAyAm
   avavādānuśāsanī na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, avavādānuśāsanyāṃ	avavAda anuSAsanI na saMvidyate na upalaByate, avavAda anuSAsanyAm
   prajñāpāramitā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra	prajQApAramitA na saMvidyate na upalaByate, evam hi Ayuzman SAriputra
   sarvadharmāsaṃvidyamānatvena anupalambhena bodhisattvo na saṃvidyate	sarva Darma asaMvidyamAna tvena anupalamBena boDisattvaH na saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate.	na upalaByate.
   iti prāptiniryāṇe prāpakapratiṣedhaḥ	iti prApti niryANe prApaka pratizeDaH
   yat punar āyuṣman śāriputraivaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇena nāmadheyamātram	yat punar Ayuzman SAriputra evam vadasi, kena kAraNena nAmaDeya mAtram
   etat, yad uta bodhisattva iti, kena kāranenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,	etat, yat uta boDisattvaH iti, kena kAranena Ayuzman suBUte evam vadasi,
   āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti, tathā hy	Agantukam etat nAmaDeyam prakziptam yat uta boDisattvaH iti, taTA hi 
   āyuṣman śāriputra nāma daśabhyo digbhyo na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid	Ayuzman SAriputra nAma daSaByaH digByaH na kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid 
   gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati sarvadharmāṇām eva bodhisattvānāṃ nāmāpi na	gacCati na kvacid tizWati sarva DarmANAm eva boDisattvAnAm nAma api na
   kutaścid eti na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati, āgantukam etan	kutaScid eti na kvacid gacCati na kvacid tizWati, Agantukam etat 
   nāmadheyaṃ tathā hi yad rūpaṃ yad vedanā yat saṃjñā yat saṃskārā yad	nAmaDeyam taTA hi yat rUpam yat vedanA yat saMjQA yat saMskArAH yat 
   vijñānam iti nāmadheyaṃ na tad rūpaṃ na (PvsP1 2: 147) vedanā na saṃjñā na	vijQAnam iti nAmaDeyam na tat rUpam na (Pu sP1 2: 147) vedanA na saMjQA na
   saṃskārā na vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāmasvabhāvena	saMskArAH na vijQAnam. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi nAma SUnyam nAma svaBAvena
   yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma, tena kāraṇenocyate bodhisattva iti	yat ca SUnyam na tat nAma, tena kAraNena ucyate boDisattvaH iti
   nāmadheyamātram etad iti.	nAmaDeya mAtram etat iti.
   punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta	punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta
   dānapāramiteti, na ca dānapāramitāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni dānapāramitā, tat	dAna pAramitA iti, na ca dAnapAramitAyAm nAma na ca nAmni dAna pAramitA, tat 
   kasya hetoḥ? yac ca nāma yā ca dānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate	kasya hetoH? yat ca nAma yA ca dAna pAramitA uBayam etat na saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate, tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti, evaṃ	na upalaByate, tasmAt nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta boDisattvaH iti, evam
   nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā	nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA
   dhyānapāramitā nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta prajñāpāramiteti na ca	DyAna pAramitA nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta prajQApAramitA iti na ca
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni prajñāpāramitā, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā	prajQApAramitAyAm nAma na ca nAmni prajQApAramitA, tat kasya hetoH? taTA
   hi yac ca nāma yā ca prajñāpāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate	hi yat ca nAma yA ca prajQApAramitA uBayam etat na saMvidyate

   āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣipta yad uta bodhisattva iti,	Agantukam etat nAmaDeyam prakzipta yat uta boDisattvaH iti,
   nāmadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā	nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta aDyAtma SUnyatA bahirDA SUnyatA
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na cādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA na ca aDyAtma SUnyatAyAm
   nāma na ca nāmni adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā	nAma na ca nAmni aDyAtma SUnyatA bahirDA SUnyatA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA
   yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā	yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA, tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi yat ca nAma yA
   cādhyātmaśūnyatā yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yā ca	ca aDyAtma SUnyatA yA ca bahirDA SUnyatA yA ca aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA yA ca
   yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā sarva ete na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante.	yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA sarve ete na saMvidyante na upalaByante.

   hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca sarvajñatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate	hetoH? taTA hi yat ca nAma yA ca sarvajQa tA uBayam etat na saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate.	na upalaByate.
   yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇenocyate yathā ātmā	yat punar Ayuzman SAriputraH evam vadasi, kena kAraNena ucyate yaTA AtmA

   śāriputra āha: kasyāyuṣman subhūte nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ?	SAriputraH Aha: kasya Ayuzman suBUte na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH?

   nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,	na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH,
   cakṣuṣo nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ, evaṃ śrotrasya ghrāṇasya jihvāyāḥ	cakzuzaH na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH, evam Srotrasya GrANasya jihvAyAH
   kāyasya manaso nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,	kAyasya manasaH na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH,
   evaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmāṇāṃ nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,	evam rUpa Sabda ganDa rasa sparSa DarmANAm na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH,
   cakṣurvijñānasya śrotravijñānasya ghrāṇavijñānasya jihvāvijñānasya	cakzuH vijQAnasya Srotra vijQAnasya GrANa vijQAnasya jihvA vijQAnasya
   kāyavijñānasya manovijñānasya nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,	kAya vijQAnasya manaH vijQAnasya na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH,
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya śrotrasaṃsparśasya ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya jihvāsaṃsparśasya	cakzuH saMsparSasya Srotra saMsparSasya GrANa saMsparSasya jihvA saMsparSasya
   kāyasaṃsparśasya manaḥsaṃsparśasya nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,	kAya saMsparSasya manaH saMsparSasya na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH,
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā	cakzuH saMsparSa jAyAH vedanAyAH Srotra saMsparSa jAyA vedanAyAH 
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā jihvāsaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyāḥ	GrANa saMsparSa jAyAH vedanAyAH jihvA saMsparSa jAyAH vedanAyAH
   kāyasaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā manaḥsaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ	kAya saMsparSa jAyA vedanAyAH manaH saMsparSa jAyA vedanAyAH na asti sAMyogikaH
   svabhāvaḥ, cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā	svaBAvaH, cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedanAyA Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedanAyAH 
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ	GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedanAyAH jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedanAyAH
   kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā nāsti	kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedanAyAH manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedanAyAH na asti
   sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ, nāsti dānapāramitāyā nāsti śīlapāramitāyā nāsti	sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH, na asti dAna pAramitAyAH na asti SIla pAramitAyAH na asti
   kṣāntipāramitāyā nāsti vīryapāramitāyā nāsti dhyānapāramitāyā nāsti	kzAnti pAramitAyAH na asti vIrya pAramitAyAH na asti DyAna pAramitAyAH na asti
   prajñāpāramitāyā nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ. anenāyuṣman śāriputra	prajQApAramitAyAH na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH. anena Ayuzman SAriputra
   paryāyeṇāsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ. punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra anityāḥ	paryAyeNa asvaBAvAH sarva DarmAH. punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra anityAH
   sarvadharmā na kasyacid vigamena.	sarva DarmAH na kasyacid vigamena.
   śāriputra āha: katame te āyuṣman subhūte anityāḥ sarvadharmā na kasyacid	SAriputraH Aha: katame te Ayuzman suBUte anityAH sarva DarmAH na kasyacid 
   vigamena?	vigamena?
   subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputrānityaṃ na kasyacid vigamena, vedanā	suBUtiH Aha: rUpam Ayuzman SAriputra anityam na kasyacid vigamena, vedanA
   saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputrānityaṃ na kasyacid vigamena. tat	saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam Ayuzman SAriputra anityam na kasyacid vigamena. tat 
   kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yad anityaṃ so 'bhāvaḥ kṣayaś ca	kasya hetoH? taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra yat anityam saH aBAvaH kzayaH ca
   evaṃ duḥkhā anātmānaḥ śāntāḥ śūnyā ānimittā apraṇihitā na kasyacid	evam duHKAH anAtmAnaH SAntAH SUnyAH AnimittAH apraNihitAH na kasyacid 
   vigamena sarvadharmāḥ kuśalā anavadyā anāsravā niḥkleśā lokottarā	vigamena sarva DarmAH kuSalAH anavadyA anAsravA niHkleSA lokottarA
   vyavadānā asaṃskṛtāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yo	vyavadAnAH asaMskRtAH. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra yaH 
   'saṃskṛtaḥ so 'bhāvaḥ kṣayaś cānenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa niḥsvabhāvāḥ	asaMskRtaH saH aBAvaH kzayaH ca anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa niHsvaBAvAH
   sarvadharmā na kasyacid vigamena. punar aparaṃ śāriputrākūṭasthā	sarva DarmAH na kasyacid vigamena. punar aparam SAriputra AkUwa sTA
   avināśinaḥ sarvadharmāḥ.	avinASinaH sarva DarmAH.
   śāriputra āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte akūṭasthāvināśinaḥ	SAriputraH Aha: kena kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte akUwa sTA vinASinaH
   sarvadharmāḥ.	sarva DarmAH.
   (PvsP1 2: 151)	(Pu sP1 2: 151)
   subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra akūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?	suBUtiH Aha: rUpam Ayuzman SAriputra akUwa sTam avinASi. tat kasya hetoH?
   prakṛtir asyaiṣā, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra	prakRtiH asya ezA, vedanA saMjQA saMskArA, vijQAnam Ayuzman SAriputra
   akūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā, evaṃ kuśalam	akUwa sTam avinASi. tat kasya hetoH? prakRtiH asya ezA, evam kuSalam

   śāriputra abhisaṃskarttā nāsti, evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyā mano	SAriputra aBisaMskarttA nAsti, evam Srotra GrANa jihvA kAyAH manaH

   yad anabhinivṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃna vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam	yat anaBinivRttam na tat rUpaM na vedanA na saMjQA na saMskArAH na vijQAnam
   iti.	iti.
   subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ, yac ca	suBUtiH Aha: taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra rUpam prakRti SUnyan, yat ca
   prakṛtiśūnyaṃ na tasyotpādo na vyayaḥ, yasya ca notpādo na vyayo na	prakRti SUnyam na tasya utpAdaH na vyayaH, yasya ca na utpAdaH na vyayaH na

   yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam āha, kena kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi, tat kim	yat punar Ayuzman SAriputra evam Aha, kena kAraNena evam vadasi, tat kim

   samanupaśyati,	samanupaSyati,

   samanupaśyati.	samanupaSyati.

   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām.	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm.
   atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yasmin samaye	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat: yasmin samaye
   bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān	Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn
   upaparīkṣate, tasmin samaye rūpaṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati	upaparIkzate, tasmin samaye rUpam na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati
   nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati rūpam etad iti, yasmin samaye bhagavan	na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati rUpam etat iti, yasmin samaye Bagavan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn
   upaparīkṣate, tasmin samaye vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nopaiti	upaparIkzate, tasmin samaye vedanAm saMjQAm saMskArAn vijQAnam na upEti
   nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati vijñānam etad iti,	na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati vijQAnam etat iti,
   tasmin samaye cakṣur nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	tasmin samaye cakzuH na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati cakṣur etad iti, evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyaṃ mano	prajQapayati cakzuH etat iti, evam Srotram GrANam jihvAm kAyam manaH 
   nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mana etad	na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati manaH etat 
   (PvsP1 2: 154) iti.	(Pu sP1 2: 154) iti.
   punar aparaṃ bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	punar aparam Bagavan yasmin samaye boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate, tasmin samaye	prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate, tasmin samaye
   dānapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	dAna pAramitAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati dānapāramiteyam iti. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā	prajQapayati dAna pAramitA iyam iti. evam SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA
   vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā, tasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ	vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA prajQApAramitA, tasmin samaye prajQApAramitAm
   nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati	na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati
   prajñāpāramiteyam iti, tasmin samaye adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti	prajQApAramitA iyam iti, tasmin samaye aDyAtma SUnyatAm na upEti na upAdadAti
   nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty adhyātmaśūnyateyam iti, tasmin	na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati aDyAtma SUnyatA iyam iti, tasmin
   samaye bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad	samaye bahirDA SUnyatAm aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAm yAvat 
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateyam iti.	prajQapayati yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA iyam iti.
   punar aparaṃ bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	punar aparam Bagavan yasmin samaye boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate, tasmin samaye	prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate, tasmin samaye
   smṛtyupasthanāni nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	smRti upasTanAni na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati smṛtyupasthānānīmānīti, tasmin samaye samyakprahāṇāni	prajQapayati smRti upasTAnAni im Ani iti, tasmin samaye samyak prahANAni
   ṛddhipādānīndriyāni balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ nopaiti nopādadāti	RdDipAdAni indriyAni balAni boDi aFgAni Arya azwa aFga mArgam na upEti na upAdadAti
   nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mārgo 'yam iti, tasmin samaye	na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati mArgaH ayam iti, tasmin samaye
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattIH na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati
   nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samāpattaya imā iti, tasmin samaye daśa	na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati samApattayaH imAH iti, tasmin samaye daSa
   balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān	balAni catvAri vESAradyAni catasraH pratisaMvidaH azwAdaSa AveNikAn
   buddhadharmān nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	budDa DarmAn na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati buddhadharmā ime iti.	prajQapayati budDa DarmAH ime iti.
   punar aparaṃ bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	punar aparam Bagavan yasmin samaye boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate, tasmin samaye	prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate, tasmin samaye
   sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhāni nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate	sarva samADi DAraNI muKAni na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate
   na prajñapayati samādhidhāraṇīmukhānīmāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi	na prajQapayati samADi DAraNI muKAni imAni. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi
   bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na	Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran rUpam na
   samanupaśyati yāvad vyastasamastāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni	samanupaSyati yAvat vyasta samastAni skanDa DAtu AyatanAni
   pratītyasamutpādaṃ na samanupaśyati, saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān na	pratItyasamutpAdam na samanupaSyati, saptatriMSat boDi pakzAn DarmAn na
   samanupaśyati pāramitā na samanupaśyati	samanupaSyati pAramitA na samanupaSyati
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattidaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApatti daSa bala vESAradya pratisaMvid azwAdaSa AveNika budDa DarmAn
   yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ na samanupaśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan	yAvat sarva AkAra jQa tAm na samanupaSyati. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi Bagavan
   yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ (PvsP1 2: 155)	yaH rUpasya anutpAdaH na tat rUpam yaH vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH (Pu sP1 2: 155)
   saṃskārāṇāṃ yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam iti hi vijñānaṃ	saMskArANAm yaH vijQAnasya anutpAdaH na tat vijQAnam iti hi vijQAnam
   cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkaram. yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na	ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat advEDIkaram. yaH Bagavan cakzuzaH anutpAdaH na
   tac cakṣur yaḥ śrotrasya ghrāṇasya jihvāyāḥ kāyasya manaso 'nutpādo na tan	tat cakzuH yaH Srotrasya GrANasya jihvAyAH kAyasya manasaH anutpAdaH na tat 
   mana iti hi manaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.	manaH iti hi manaH ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram.
   yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā, yaḥ	yaH Bagavan dAna pAramitAyAH anutpAdaH na sA dAna pAramitA, yaH
   śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā, yaḥ	SIla pAramitAyAH kzAnti pAramitAyAH vIrya pAramitAyAH DyAna pAramitAyA, yaH
   prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā, iti hi prajñāpāramitā	prajQApAramitAyAH anutpAdaH na sA prajQApAramitA, iti hi prajQApAramitA
   cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.	ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram.
   yo bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā, yo	yaH Bagavan aDyAtma SUnyatAyAH anutpAdaH na sA aDyAtma SUnyatA, yaH 
   bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā, yo	bahirDA SUnyatAyAH anutpAdaH na sA bahirDA SUnyatA, yaH 
   'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā, yo yāvad	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAyAH anutpAdaH na sA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA, yaH yAvat 
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā, iti hi	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAyAH anutpAdaH na sA aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA, iti hi
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram.
   yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni, evaṃ	yaH Bagavan smRti upasTAnAnAm anutpAdaH na tAni smRti upasTAnAni, evam
   samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattyabhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido,	samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArga apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApatti aBijQA daSa bala vESAradya pratisaMvido,
   yo bhagavann aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na te	yaH Bagavan azwAdaSAnAm AveNikAnAm budDa DarmANAm anutpAdaH na te
   'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā iti hi buddhadharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad	azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH iti hi budDa DarmAH ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāram.	advEDIkAram.
   yo bhagavan dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ, yas tathatāyā	yaH Bagavan DarmaDAtoH anutpAdaH na sa DarmaDAtuH, yaH taTatAyA
   ākāśadhātor bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātor bodher yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo	AkASa DAtoH BUtakoweH acintya DAtoH boDeH yaH sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH anutpAdaH 
   na sā sarvākārajñateti hi sarvākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad	na sA sarva AkAra jQa tA iti hi sarva AkAra jQa tA ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy anutpādo naiko na dvau na bahavo	advEDIkAram. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi anutpAdaH na ekaH na dvO na bahavaH 
   na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.	na pRTak tasmAt yaH sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH anutpAdaH na sA sarva AkAra jQa tA.
   yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ, yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ	yaH Bagavan rUpasya vyayaH na tat rUpaM, yaH vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm
   yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam, iti hi skandhāś ca vyayaś cādvayam	yaH vijQAnasya vyayaH na tat vijQAnam, iti hi skanDAH ca vyayaH ca advayam
   etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na	etat at vEDIkAram. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi vyayaH na ekaH na dvO na
   bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ vyayo na te pañca	bahavaH na pRTak tasmAt yaH paQcAnAm skanDAnAm vyayaH na te paQca
   skandhāḥ,	skanDAH,
   yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā, evaṃ (PvsP1 2: 156)	yaH Bagavan dAna pAramitAyAH vyayaH na sA dAna pAramitA, evam (PvsP1 2: 156)
   yaḥ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā, yaḥ	yaH SIla pAramitAyAH kzAnti pAramitAyAH vIrya pAramitAyAH DyAna pAramitAyA, yaH
   prajñāpāramitāyā vyayo na sā prajñāpāramitā iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca	prajQApAramitAyAH vyayaH na sA prajQApAramitA iti hi prajQApAramitA ca
   vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vyayo naiko	vyayaH ca advayam etat at vEDIkAram. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi vyayaH na ekaH 
   na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ pāramitānāṃ vyāyo natāḥ pāramitā.	na dvO na bahavaH na pRTak tasmAt yaH pAramitAnAm vyAyaH natAH pAramitA.
   yo bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā, iti hy	yaH Bagavan aDyAtma SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA aDyAtma SUnyatA, iti hi 
   adhyātmaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?	aDyAtma SUnyatA ca vyayaH ca advayam etat at vEDIkAram. tat kasya hetoH?
   tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yo	taTA hi vyayaH na ekaH na dvO na bahavaH na pRTak tasmAt yaH 
   'dhyātmaśūnyatayā vyayo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā evaṃ yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā	aDyAtma SUnya tayA vyayaH na sA aDyAtma SUnyatA evam yaH bahirDA SUnyatAyA
   vyayo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā, yo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā	vyayaH na sA bahirDA SUnyatA, yaH aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA
   dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā	DyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA yAvat yaH aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā iti hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA iti hi aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA ca vyayaH ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na	advEDIkAram. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi vyayaH na ekaH na dvO na bahavaH na
   pṛthak tasmād yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā	pRTak tasmAt yaH aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA.
   yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni, iti hi	yaH Bagavan smRti upasTAnAnAm vyayaH na tAni smRti upasTAna ani, iti hi
   smṛtyupasthānāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkaram. tat kasya hetoḥ?	smRti upasTAnAni ca vyayaH ca advayam etat advEDIkaram. tat kasya hetoH?
   tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ	taTA hi vyayaH na ekaH na dvO na bahavaH na pRTak tasmAt yaH
